paratransit_74_description: Pierce Transit Runner waxa uu bixiyaa adeega gaadiidka ee baahida loo qabo. Hadda, waxaan bixinaa JBLM, Ruston, Tideflats iyo Spanaway Runner. Si aad u codsato raacid, wac 253-270-1340 ama ballan qaado safarka GOIN' Rides dhammaan abka mobaylada.
transit_26_description:
Metrooga Degmada King waa wakaaladda gaadiidka dadweynaha ee ugu weyn gobolka Puget Sound. Metro waxay bixisaa bas, paratransit, vanpool, iyo adeegyada tagsiga biyaha, iyo qaar kaloo badan.
Noogu soo dir: 360-526-6555
Taleefan: 206-296-0100
Khadka bilaashka ah: 800-325-6165
Gudbinta TTY: 711
paratransit_87_description:
Community Van waa barnaamij rideshare ah oo ay kuu keentay King County Metro Transit. Waxay siisaa deganeyaasha bulshada ikhtiyaar la habeeyey oo ay ku soo wareegaan marka adeegga baska aanu dabooli karin baahidooda. Xubnaha bulshadu waxay si wada jir ah u safraan meelaha ay u socdaan maalinta, fiidkii, ama sabtida. Safarrada kooxda iyo joogsiga waxaa sii qorsheeyay (ugu yaraan laba toddobaad ka hor) Iskuduwaha Gaadiidka Bulshada.
Rakaabku waxay la xidhiidhaan Iskuduwaha Gaadiidka Beesha si ay ugu biiraan safarada Van Community ee horay loo qorsheeyay.
Safar kastaa waa inuu lahaadaa ugu yaraan laba rakaab ah marka lagu daro darawalka iskaa wax u qabso ah.
paratransit_84_description:
Community Van waa barnaamij rideshare ah oo ay kuu keentay King County Metro Transit. Waxay siisaa deganeyaasha bulshada ikhtiyaar la habeeyey oo ay ku soo wareegaan marka adeegga baska aanu dabooli karin baahidooda.

Sida ay u shaqeyso
Xubnaha bulshadu waxay si wada jir ah u safraan meelaha ay u socdaan maalinta, fiidkii, ama sabtida.
Safarrada kooxda iyo joogsiga waxaa sii qorsheeyay (ugu yaraan laba toddobaad ka hor) Iskuduwaha Gaadiidka Bulshada.
Rakaabku waxay la xidhiidhaan Isku-duwaha Gaadiidka Bulshada si ay ugu biiraan safarada Van Community ee horay loo qorsheeyay.
Safar kastaa waa inuu lahaadaa ugu yaraan laba rakaab ah marka lagu daro darawalka iskaa wax u qabso ah.
Qof kastaa wuxuu bixiyaa qiimaha Metro ee hal aag ah. Darawalku lacag ma bixiyo.
Rakaabku waxay codsan karaan safar cusub iyagoo soo gudbinaya foom onlayn ah ama la xidhiidha Iskuduwaha Gaadiidka Bulshada ee beeshooda.
Rakaabku waxa kale oo ay soo jeedin karaan safar ay ogyihiin in uu caan ku noqon doono saaxiibadood iyo deriskooda.
Vans Community la heli karo ayaa la heli karaa haddii la codsado. U sheeg Iskuduwaha Gaadiidka Bulshada baahiyahaaga safarkaaga ka hor.
Sida loo bixiyo
Qof kastaa wuxuu bixiyaa qiimaha Metro ee caadiga ah. Taasi waa $2.75 qof weyn oo caadi ah.

Isticmaal appka Tigidhada Tagitaanka Tareenka ee taleefankaaga
Isticmaal Kaarka ORCA
Isticmaal Tigidhada Warqadda ee Degmada King
paratransit_81_description: Barnaamijkeena Community Van waxa uu siiya baabuurka safarada horay loo sii qorsheeyay-darawal ahaan ama rakaab ahaan. Horey u sii qorshee safarkaaga ama si iskaa wax u qabso ah u wado deriskaaga ama qoyskaaga. Booqo shabakada Community Van si aad u hesho macluumaadka iyo lambarada lagala xidhiidho goob kasta oo adeeg ah, iyo macluumaadka ku saabsan gelitaanka iyo u-qalmitaanka.
paratransit_76_description: Barnaamijkeena Community Van waxa uu bixiyaa baabuurka safarada horay loo sii qorsheeyay-darawal ahaan ama rakaab ahaan. Horey u sii qorshee safarkaaga ama iskaa wax u qabso si aad deriskaaga ama qoyskaaga u wado. Booqo shabakada Community Van si aad u hesho macluumaadka iyo nambarada lagala xidhiidho goob kasta oo adeeg ah, iyo macluumaadka ku saabsan gelitaanka iyo u-qalmitaanka.
oneclick.pages.about_us.intro:
Raadi Raad raac, Nidaam-hal-wac/hal-guji

Tani waa goob tijaabo ah oo loogu talagalay qorsheha safarkayaga. Qorsheeyaha safarka tijaabada waxaa loogu talagalay Pierce, King iyo adeegyada gaadiidka Degmada Snohomish. Waad ku mahadsan tahay inaad nagu caawisay inaan tijaabinno qorsheeye safarka, taasoo qayb ka ah barnaamijkeena Hal Wicitaan/Hal-guji. Wax badan baro: https://www.kcmobility.org/ococ

Isbahaysiga Dhaqdhaqaaqa Degmada King

Wax badan baro: https://www.kcmobility.org

Hopelink

Wax badan baro: https://www.hopelink.org/

Hopelink Mobility Management

Wax badan baro: https://www.hopelink.org/need-help/transportation/mobility-management. /a>. Wixii su'aalo ah, fadlan iimayl u dir Mobility@hopelink.org ama wac 425-943-6760.
mode_paratransit_name: Gaadiidka Khaaska ah (qorsheyso adeegyada hore: jawaabta baahida, baahida, gaadiidka yar yar, iyo in ka badan)
paratransit_71_description:
Si aad u Codsato Raad kaxaynta Degmada King:
Boos nambarka: 800-923-7433
Boos sii qabsi Fakis: 425-644-9447
TDD/TTY khadka: 800-246-1646
Khadkayga Ride: 1-800-595-2172 - Jooji ama hubi heerka raacitaanka

Si aad u Codsato Raacid Degmada Snohomish:
Boos nambarka: 855-766-7433
Boos sii qabsi Fakis: 425-644-9447
TDD/TTY khadka: 800-246-1646
Khadkayga Ride: 1-888-913-2172 - Jooji ama hubi heerka raacitaanka

Booqo mareegahayaga si aad wax uga ogaato codsashada raacitaan fakis.
 Haddii aad tahay macmiilka u qalma Medicaid, Hopelink waxay ku siin kartaa kaarka Orca Card ama kaarka gaaska si ay u daboosho kharashyadaada aad ku tagi lahayd iyo ka soo noqoshada ballantaada caafimaad.

Hopelink waxay kaa caawin kartaa dib u celinta baarkinka, lacagaha biriijka, iyo/ama doonta la galay iyada oo qayb ka ah ballan caafimaad. Booqo mareegaha xogta lacag celinta.
paratransit_43_description:
Gaadiidka Dooxada Snoqualmie (SVT) waxay leedahay adeegyo badan oo noocya ah oo loogu talagalay dadka oo dhan. Gawaarida albaab-ilaa-Albaab waxay u baahan yihiin in horay loo sii hayo. Inta badan raacitaanka waa $1 ama ka yar. da'da 18 iyo wixii ka yar bilaash. Na soo wac si aad u ogaato sida uu adeeggu uga shaqeeyo aagga adeegga ee North Bend, Snoqualmie, Fall City, Preston (inta badan), Carnation, Duvall, iyo Monroe. Adeegani waxa kale oo uu kaa caawin karaa in lagugu xidho wadooyinka baska Metro.
Guryaha la dejiyo: Kursiga Curyaanka oo laablaaban, Kaalmada Darawalka, Jidka-jidka, Albaabka-Albaabka, Kursiga Curyaan ee la geli karo, Baaskiil sido
transit_42_description:
Iyada oo qayb ka ah Gaadiidka Dooxada Snoqualmie, Dooxada Dooxada waa bas-marin go'an. Dooxada Dooxada waxay ku wareegtaa dhammaan dooxada Snoqualmie laakiin sidoo kale waxay awood u leedahay in ay ka leexato dariiqa caadiga ah oo ay qabato adeegga albaab-ilaa-albaab haddii laba saacadood oo ogaysiis ah la bixiyo. Shuttle-ku wuxuu ku xidhaa raacayaasha joogsiyada baska Metro ee u dhexeeya North Bend, Snoqualmie, Fall City, Carnation, iyo Duvall. Si aad u aragto Khariidadda Shuttle-ka Dooxada iyo Jadwalka halkan guji.

Si aad u isticmaasho adeegan, si fudud u istaag mid ka mid ah joogsiga baska ee badan ee Metro. Markuu basku yimaado, iska hubi inaad darawalka ka xaqiijiso haddii uu baska u socdo dhanka waqooyi ama koonfurta. Darawalku wuxuu ku dhawaaqi doonaa joogsiga hadal ahaan markay yimaadaan. Haddii aad ku sugan tahay Duvall ama North Bend oo aad u baahan tahay baska inuu ka leexdo jidkiisa caadiga ah, fadlan horay u soo wac SVT waxay isku dayi doontaa inay kuu habayso.

Shuttle Dooxada kasta waxa ay leedahay raaga baaskiilka.
Waxaa laga yaabaa inaad wacdo Gaadiidka Dooxada Snoqualmie ugu yaraan 2 saacadood ka hor waxayna dejin doonaan weecsanaanta sida jadwalku oggol yahay.
paratransit_70_description:
Jiilka dhawaaqa - Gaadiidka iskaa wax u qabso
Wac jadwalka.
U-qalmitaanka Rider: Si aad ugu noqoto raace u qalma barnaamijkayaga Gaadiidka Iskaa wax u qabso ah, macaamiishu waa inay ahaadaan degane King County, WA da'doodu tahay 60 iyo ka weyn. Macmiilku waa inuu awood u leeyahay inuu ku wareejiyo baabuur gaar ah oo leh gargaar ugu yar, iyo qof weyn oo da' ah oo leh ikhtiyaar gaadiid xaddidan.
paratransit_65_description:
Ku saabsan Adeegga Gaadiidka Goose-ka Barafka
Bulshada Hawlgabka ee Lincoln Hill waxay adeeg cusub u furtay Camano, Stanwood, Smokey Point iyo aaga Arlington.

Barafka Goose Transit waxa uu isticmaalayaa 3 saddex iyo toban rakaab ah oo yar-bas ah (wiish la heli karo kursi-wheel) oo waxa uu ku shaqaynayaa "dariiq dabacsan." Jadwalka ka hor dareewalku wuu weecan karaa soo qaadis iyo dejin guri-ilaa- albaab ah. Adeegyada guri-ka-albaab, fadlan ballan 48 saacadood ka hor.

HIMILKEENA
Hadafka Barafka Goose Transit waa inuu siiyo gaadiid badbaado leh oo la isku halayn karo oo bulshada deegaanka ah. Waxaan diirada saarnaa dadka naafada ah, dadka waaweyn, iyo qoysaska dakhligoodu yar yahay. Caawinta bulshadeena si ay u helaan gaadiidka loo baahan yahay ee shaqada, ballamaha caafimaadka, ama dukaamada raashinka.
paratransit_61_description:
Adeegyada Beesha Katooliga waxay ku hanweyn yihiin inay bixiyaan adeegga albaabka laga soo galo waayeelka iyo dadka waaweyn ee naafada ah. Dadka isticmaali kara adeegga waa inay:

Waayeel dakhligoodu yar yahay (kuwa da'doodu tahay 60 iyo ka weyn) iyo/ama qof weyn oo itaal-daran (ku meel gaadh ah ama joogto ah)
Dadka aan iska bixin karin adeegyada
Dadka aan u qalmin adeegyada uu gobolku bixiyo
Iyo, dadka aan haysan qoys iyo saaxiibo diyaar u ah inay caawiyaan.
paratransit_18_description:
Barnaamijka Caawinta Gaadiidka Homage (TAP) waxay siisaa gaadiid baahi gaar ah oo loogu talagalay dadka waaweyn iyo dadka naafada ah meel ka baxsan aagga adeegga ee Transit Community Dial-a-Ride (DART). TAP waxay dadka ku xidhaa adeegyada, daryeelka caafimaadka, xarumaha waayeelka, dukaamaysiga, madadaalada iyo wax ka badan.

Waxaan tagnaa meel kasta oo Community Transit DART ama Everett Paratransit aysan tagin. (Miyiga)

Saacadaha shaqada ee la soo wacayo: 7:00 subaxnimo - 4:00 galabnimo.

Wac maanta si aad u dhamaystirto nidaamka codsiga oo aad u ogaato inaad xaq u leedahay.
paratransit_45_description:
Ka hor wac adeeggan.
Hyde Shuttles waa adeega Sound Generations, oo ah urur aan faa'iido doon ahayn oo dhamaystiran oo u adeega dadka waaweyn iyo dadka waaweyn ee naafada ah ee Degmada King. Hyde Shuttle waxay bixisaa adeega Van-ka-albaab ee degmada King oo dhan. Dareewalada saaxiibtinimada leh, daryeela waxay raacaan fuushannada ballamaha caafimaadka, farmashiyaha, xarumaha waaweyn, dukaamada raashinka, guriga saaxiibka, iyo meel kasta oo aad u baahan tahay.

Hyde Shuttles https://soundgenerations.org/our-programs/transportation/hyde-shuttle/
welcome_message: Soo dhawoow - La xidhiidh Raadi Raad-raac Gargaar
oneclick.pages.transportation_eligibilit: Markaad gujiso sanduuqan, Raadi Raad raac kuma sii wadi doonto inay ku tusto shaashaddan. Dhammaan macluumaadka waxa lagu kaydin doonaa inta ka dhiman casharkan iyo marka xigta ee aad gasho Ka Raadi Raad raac isla kombayutarka iyo browserka. Waxaan si aad ah kuugu dhiirigelinaynaa inaad abuurto akoon isticmaale adigoo gujinaya "Ma lihi xisaab" isku xirka "hamburger menu" ee ku yaal geeska sare ee midig. Markaad abuurto oo aad gasho akoonkaaga, Raadi Raad raac had iyo jeer waxay xasuusan doontaa dookhyadaada, xitaa marka aad nidaamka ka soo gasho kombiyuutar kale.

paratransit_29_description: Northshore Senior Centre waxay bixisaa adeegyo gaadiid oo la heli karo albaab-ilaa- albaab loogu talagalay dadka waaweyn iyo dadka naafada ah ee ku nool Waqooyiga King County/South Snohomish County. U kaxitaanka daryeelka caafimaadka, raashinka, ama hawlaha xarumahooda sare waxay ka hortagaan go'doominta waxayna wanaajiyaan tayada nolosha rakaabka.
transit_46_description:
Sound Transit waxa ay waddaa isku xirka tareenka fudud iyo dhowr waddo oo bas ah.

Link wuxuu ka socdaalaa Northgate, Jaamacadda Washington, magaalada hoose ee Seattle, koonfur-bari Seattle, SeaTac Airport iyo Angle Lake, 20 saacadood maalintii, 7 maalmood todobaadkii. Tareennada isku xidha waxay socdaan 8, 10 ama 15kii daqiiqoba iyadoo ku xidhan wakhtiga maalinta. Adeeggu waxa uu diyaar yahay 5 subaxnimo ilaa 1 subaxnimo Isniinta ilaa Sabtida iyo 6 subaxnimo ilaa saqda dhexe ee Axadaha iyo ciidaha.
paratransit_64_description:
Everett Para Transit waa adeeg albaab-ilaa ah oo loogu talagalay shakhsiyaadka jira 65 ama ka weyn, ama buuxiya shuruudaha u-qalmitaanka sababtoo ah naafo jireed ama garasho.

Waxyaabo yar oo ay tahay in la ogaado:

Paratransit waxa kaliya oo heli kara macaamiisha u qalma
Kaararka ORCA lagama aqbalo Paratransit
Kaqaybgalayaasha Daryeelka Shakhsi ahaaneed waxaa lagu soo dhawaynayaa korka Everett Para Transit iyada oo aan kharash dheeraad ah lagu bixin
Everett Para Transit
3225 Cedar St.
Everett, WA 98201

Taleefanka: 425-257-8801
Fakis: 425-257-6483
paratransit_60_description:
Adeegyada Beesha Katooliga waxay ku hanweyn yihiin inay bixiyaan adeegga albaabka laga soo galo waayeelka iyo dadka waaweyn ee naafada ah. Boggani wuxuu diiradda saarayaa barnaamijka ka socda Degmada Snohomish, laakiin mid kastaa wuxuu leeyahay shuruudo guud oo isku mid ah. Dadka isticmaali kara adeegga waa inay:

Waayeel dakhligoodu yar yahay (kuwa da'doodu tahay 60 iyo ka weyn) iyo/ama qof weyn oo itaal-daran (ku meel gaadh ah ama joogto ah)
Dadka aan iska bixin karin adeegyada
Dadka aan u qalmin adeegyada uu gobolku bixiyo
Iyo, dadka aan haysan qoys iyo saaxiibo diyaar u ah inay caawiyaan.
transit_28_description:
Qabiilka Muckleshoot waxa uu maro laba waddo oo Transit ah oo si guud loo heli karo oo ku teedsan Waddada Gobolka 164.

Jidka Boos sii qabsigu wuxuu dhex maraa beesha Qabiilka, wuxuuna joogsadaa koonfur bari ee Les Gove Park. Waxay socotaa 30kii daqiiqaba kasta laga bilaabo 7:00 subaxnimo. Waddada Auburn Express waxay ka socotaa Qabiilka iyada oo sii marta Magaalada Auburn, iyada oo ka dhigaysa joogsiga jidka. Waxay socotaa saacad kasta laga bilaabo 7:00 subaxnimo.

Si aad u aragto jidadka baska wakhtiga dhabta ah, soo deji app taleefoonka maanta!

Dalbashada kaliya waxay shaqeysaa Isniin-Jimco 8AM-5PM ilaa jadwalka ogolaanshaha mooyee.

Raadraaca Baska Gaadiidka: http://www.MuckleshootTransit.Ridesystems.net
oneclick.pages.transportation_eligibilit: Haddii aad jeclaan lahayd inaad aragto adeegyo gaadiid oo khaas ah oo laga yaabo inay buuxiyaan baahiyahaaga, fadlan muuji shuruudo dheeraad ah oo xaq u yeelashada oo aad buuxiso adiga oo dooranaya sanduuqyada saxda ah ee hoose. Qaar ka mid ah adeegyada gaadiidka gaarka ah ayaa xaddidaya u-qalmitaanka iyada oo lagu salaynayo hal ama in ka badan oo ka mid ah shuruudahan, iyo Raadi natiijooyinka raadinta raacitaanka kaliya waxaa ku jiri doona adeegyadan haddii aad muujisay inaad buuxisay shuruudaha khuseeya.

oneclick.pages.contact_us.intro:
Haddii ay kugu adag tahay isticmaalka Raadi Raad raac, waxaanu ku siin karnaa taageero mid-ka-mid ah si loo helo doorashooyin gaadiid oo gaar ah oo ku habboon baahiyahaaga! Waxaan kuugu socon karnaa tallaabo-tallaabo iyadoo loo marayo agabyada la heli karo ee sida ugu wanaagsan u shaqayn kara. Khadka Dhaqdhaqaaqa wuxuu furan yahay 9:00 subaxnimo - 4:00 galabnimo, Isniinta ilaa Jimcaha.

Haddii aan la heli karin, ka tag fariin cod ah waxaana ku soo celin doonaa wicitaankaaga laba maalmood oo shaqo gudahood. Si aad wax badan uga barato adeegan, ama aad u hesho caawimo xagga gaadiidka ah, fadlan nala soo xidhiidh sida hoos lagu xusay. Si aad u codsato agabka faafinta daabacan fadlan iimayl u dir Mobility@hopelink.org

veteran_question: Su'aasha muhiimka ah ee u-qalmitaanka ayaa maqan
transit_396_description:
Adeeg bixinta gaadiidka gudaha Magaalada Camarillo ee tafaariiqda iyo meelaha laga cunteeyo.

CORONAVIRUS XAALADDA GAAR AH EE CORONAVIRUS:
Adeeggii gaadiidka ee joogtada ahaa ayaa dib u bilowday.

AQOONSIYADA
Adeegyada Trolley waxay u furan yihiin qof walba waxaana la siiyaa hoy dadka naafada ah. Ma jiro codsi ama dukumeenti loo baahan yahay si loo isticmaalo adeeggan.

AAGA ADEEGA
Jidka baska trolleyga ah wuxuu ka bilaabmaa saldhiga tareenada ee Metrolink, wuxuu u socdaa galbeed ee Daily Drive, koonfurta ilaa wadada Las Posas, ka dibna bari ee Ventura Boulevard oo dib ugu noqda saldhigga Metrolink. Gawaadhidu waxay istaagtaa xarumaha wax iibsiga ee jidka oo dhan 30 daqiiqo oo jadwal ah.

FARES
Bilaash, ma jirto kharash lagu isticmaalo adeegyada Trolley.

Telefoonada
805-388-5340

Adeegyada lagu bixiyo luqadaha soo socda:
Ingiriis
paratransit_362_description:
Waxay siisaa gaadiidka albaabka laga soo galo ee gaadiidka caafimaadka ee aan degdega ahayn iyo dhaqdhaqaaqa nolol maalmeedka (ay ku jiraan dukaamaysiga, bangiyada, iwm) dadka degan Degmadda Daryeelka Caafimaadka Camarillo.



Dareewalada waxaa lagu tababaray CPR iyo Gargaarka Degdegga ah, waxayna leeyihiin tababar dheeraad ah oo ku saabsan qaadista dadka taagta daran, waayeelka garashada ku loolama iyo raacayaasha loolan adag. Baabuurtu waxay ku qalabaysan yihiin wiishash biyo-dharyo ah si ay u dajiyaan macaamiisha kursiga curyaanka, gasacadaha oksijiinta, iyo aaladaha kale ee dhaqdhaqaaqa dhaqdhaqaaqa caawiya. Haddii aad u baahan tahay gaadiidka curyaamiinta, kursi curyaan oo caadi ah ayaa lagu siin karaa inta aad raaceyso. Baabuurtu kuma qalabaysan inay qaadaan kuraasta curyaanka ah ee korontada ku shaqeysa, mootooyinka, ama kuraas kale oo la mid ah.



CORONAVIRUS XAALADDA GAAR AH EE CORONAVIRUS:
Adeeggu wuxuu u socdaa sidii caadiga ahayd; si kastaba ha ahaatee waxaa jiri doona shuruudo ka hor inta aanad fuulin baabuurka:
& dibi; Heerkulkaaga waxa lagu eegi doonaa heerkulbeeg aan xidhiidh lahayn, dareewalka, ka hor inta aanad gelin gaadhiga. Akhriska heerkulkaagu waa in uu ka yaraado 100 darajo farenheit si loo galo gaadhiga.
& dibi; Waxaa lagu weydiin doonaa haddii aad isku aragto calaamadaha COVID-19.
& dibi;Waxaa lagaa doonayaa inaad saxiixdo ka dhaafid ka hor inta aan adeegga gaadiidka la bixin.
& dibi; Shuruudaha fogeynta bulshada ayaa xaddidaya tirada rakaabka ee laga yaabo inay hal mar safraan. Fadlan u diyaar garow inaad fadhiisato meesha uu darawalku ku farayo inaad fadhiiso oo ku fadhiiso kursiga ilaa inta gaadhigu ka dhammaysanayo.
& dibi;Baabuurka si habboon ayaa loo nadiifiyaa ka dib marka la raaco.

AQOONSIGA:
Care-A-Van waxay u furan tahay dhammaan deganayaasha da'doodu tahay 18 iyo wixii ka weyn.

AAGA ADEEGA:
Raad raacyadu waa inay ka bilowdaan gudaha xuduudaha degmada oo ay ku jiraan Aagga Weyn ee Camarillo, Somis, iyo qaybo ka mid ah Dooxooyinka Las Posas iyo Santa Rosa. Meel kasta oo ka tirsan degmada Ventura. Qiimaha lagu raaco way kala duwanaan doontaa iyadoo ku xidhan rakaabka magaaladu u safrayo:



SAYADA:
Waxaa aad loogu talinayaa in la sameeyo boos celin ugu yaraan 2-3 maalmood ka hor. Adeeg maalinle ah ayaa suurtogal ah iyadoo lagu salaynayo helitaanka. Safarrada ka baxsan saacadaha shaqada waxaa lagu dejin karaa xaalado gaar ah.


& dibi; Bixinta kaadhka deynta waxaa lagu heli karaa taleefoon si ku habboon, lacag caddaan ah loo raaco.
& dibi; Waxaa lagu weydiin doonaa inaad sheegto magacaaga, lambarka taleefankaaga, goobta laga qaadayo, meesha aad u socoto iyo waqtiga aad u baahan tahay inaad halkaas joogto, haddii aad u baahan tahay kaalmada kursiga curyaanka iyo nooca kursiga curyaanka

Habka CODSIGA:
Looma baahna codsi

DOkumentiyada loo baahan yahay:
Midna.

FARES:
& dibi;Camarillo: $20 (hal waddo)
& dibi;Oxnard: $25 (hal waddo)
& dibi; Ventura: $30 (hal waddo)
& dibi; Daryeeluhu wuxuu fuulaa bilaash

Telefoonada:
Lambarka ugu weyn: 805-388-2529

SAACADAHA XAFIISKA DARYEELKA CAAFIMAAD EE DEGMADA CAMARILLO:
8:00 subaxnimo-4:30 galabnimo
paratransit_321_description:
ECTA CONNECT InterCity Dial-A-Ride waa adeeg gaadiid raacid la wadaago oo laga heli karo inta badan degmada Ventura ee bari oo bixisa safarka u dhexeeya aagagga adeega dial-a-ride. Adeegga ECTA wuxuu u jiraa inuu dhammaystiro, laakiin ma beddelo, maxalliga ah, adeegyada daba-galka ah ee gaarka ah ee magaalada. Sababtan awgeed, ECTA waxay bixisa adeega magaalada oo kaliya, taasoo la macno ah safaradu waa inay ka gudbaan xadka magaalada. Safarrada laguma bixiyo isla xadka magaalada ama inta u dhaxaysa Thousand Oaks iyo Westlake Village (kuwaaso ay bixiyaan adeegyada dial-a-ride ee bulsho kasta).



CORONAVIRUS XAALADDA GAAR AH EE CORONAVIRUS:

Adeegga wuu sii socdaa.



AQOONSIYADA

•Waayeellada da'doodu tahay 65 iyo wixii ka weyn

•Shakhsiyaadka shahaado haysta ee Maraykanka ee Naafada ah (ADA)

Gaadiidka Laxidhiidha Naafada ECTA: Haddii aad leedahay naafo ku meel gaar ah ama mid joogto ah oo kaa ilaalin karta inaad isticmaasho adeegga baska dariiqa go'an oo uu xaqiijin karo xirfadle daryeel caafimaad, waxaa laga yaabaa inaad u qalanto Shahaadada ADA. Ka eeg qaybta hoose ee gelitaan si aad u hesho macluumaad dheeraad ah oo ku saabsan sida loo codsado shahaadada ADA.

XAYAWAANADA ADEEGA
Xayawaanka adeegga waa loo ogol yahay baabuurta.

AAGA ADEEGA:

Adeegga ECTA waxa heli kara dadka degan Magaalooyinka Moorpark, Dooxada Simi, Kun Oaks, Tuulada Westlake, iyo Degmadda Ventura ee agagaaraha aan la wadaagin ee gudaha xuduudka magaalada (oo loo yaqaan Aagga Adeegga Aasaasiga ah).



SAYADA:
Boos celin ayaa loo baahan yahay ugu yaraan hal maalin ka hor safarka, waxaana laga yaabaa in la sameeyo ilaa laba toddobaad ka hor. Diiwaangelinta safarrada soo noqnoqda ayaa laga yaabaa in la codsado (iyadoo ku xiran xadka awoodda). Boos sii qabsi kasta waa inuu u dhexeeyaa ugu yaraan hal saac.
Saacadaha Xarunta Boos celinta:
& dibi; Isniin-Jimce 5:30 subaxnimo-7:30 galabnimo
& dibi;Sabti-Axad 7:30 subaxnimo-7:30 galabnimo
& dibi; Maalinta safarkaaga, fadlan diyaar u noqo 15 daqiiqo ka hor wakhtiga la qorsheeyay. Darawaliintu waxay sugi doonaan ugu badnaan 5 daqiiqo ka hor inta aysan dhoofin xitaa marka ay yimaadaan ilaa 15 daqiiqo ka hor.

WAREEJINTA: Safarrada aagga Go Access (iyada oo loo sii marayo barta marinka Camarillo) waxaa la habeeyaa Isniin-Sabti. U wareejinta Degmada Los Angeles iyada oo loo sii marayo aagga adeegga LA Access waa la heli karaa, laakiin waxaa loogu talagalay oo keliya kuwa haysta kaararka ADA. Macluumaad dheeri ah inta lagu jiro habka boos celinta ayaa loo baahan doonaa.

Habka CODSIGA:

& dibi; Wac boos celin safar.

DOCUMENTS LOO BAAHAN YAHAY

& dibi; Caddeynta da'da (65+) ama ADA (Americans with Disabilities) kaadhka shahaado

FARE:
& dibi; $6.00 jid kasta
& dibi; Rakaabku waxa ay keeni karaan wehel, sidoo kale waxa loo baahan doonaa lacag buuxa. Dadka haysta kaarka ADA waxa laga yaabaa inay keenaan Kaaliyaha Daryeelka Shakhsi ahaaneed (PCA) iyada oo aan wax lacag ah laga bixin.

Telefoon

& dibi; Lambarka ugu weyn: 805-375-5467 & dibi; Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) Weydiinta: 888-667-7001

LANGUAGES

Ingiriisi iyo Isbaanish, adeegyo tarjumaad ayaa diyaar u ah dhammaan luqadaha kale.

*Shahaadada Sharciga Naafada Maraykanka (ADA)*

Waa maxay shahaado ADA: Xeerka Maraykanka ee Naafada waa sharci federaal ah kaas oo mamnuucaya takoorka ku salaysan naafanimada xagga shaqada, adeegyada dadweynaha, gaadiidka, guryaha dadweynaha, iyo isgaarsiinta. Qaybta gaadiidka ee ADA waxay u baahan tahay in nidaamyada gaadiidka ee dariiqyada go'an ay tahay inay helaan kuwa naafada ah. Sharcigu waxa kale oo uu bixiyaa adeega paratransit kaaba haddii basaska aan la heli karin ama haddii naafanimadaada ama xaaladaadu ay kaa hortaagto isticmaalka gaadiidka dadweynaha ee mara jid go'an.

SHURUUDAHA LOOGU TALAGALAY SHAHAADADA ADA: Shakhsigu waa in uu leeyahay naafo ku meel gaadh ah ama joogto ah taas oo ka ilaalinaysa raacaha isticmaalka baska dariiqa go'an. Naafanimada waa in uu xaqiijiyaa xirfadle daryeel caafimaad.

Si aad u codsato shahaado ADA:

Shakhsiyaadka doonaya shahaadada ADA waxay buuxin karaan arjiga onlaynka ah https://www.goventura.org/getting-around/ada-certification/ ama wac Mobility Management Partners (MMP) 888-667-7001 si ay u codsadaan. Qiimaynta qof ahaan waa in la sameeyaa marka codsiga la gudbiyo
paratransit_363_description:
Magaalada Moorpark waxay siisaa adeegyo gaadiid oo gaar loo qorsheeyay oo loogu talagalay waayeelka da'doodu tahay 65+ iyo gaadiidka la xidhiidha naafanimada kuwa haysta Shahaadada Sharciga Naafada Maraykanka (ADA).

CORONAVIRUS XAALADDA GAAR AH EE CORONAVIRUS:

Adeegga wuu sii socdaa



AQOONSIGA:
U-qalmitaanka gaadiidka naafada ee Moorpark:
Adeegyada shaqsiyaadka naafada ah da' kasta oo wata shahaadada ADA. (Haddii aad leedahay xaddidaad ku meel gaar ah ama joogto ah, jireed, maskaxeed, muuqaal, garasho, ama xaddidaad kale oo naafada ah taas oo saameyn doonta awooddaada helitaanka adeegga baska dariiqa go'an, waxaa laga yaabaa inaad u qalanto Shahaadada ADA. Eeg qaybta hoose ee Gelitaankan wixii macluumaad dheeraad ah sida loo codsado shahaadada ADA.)
U-qalmitaanka Gaadiidka Sare ee Moorpark:
Shakhsiyaadka da'doodu tahay 65 iyo wixii ka weyn waxay u qalmaan gaadiidka Dial-A-Ride sida waayeelka. Waayeelka naafada ah waa lagu soo dhaweynayaa inay codsadaan shahaadada ADA.

XAYAWAANADA ADEEGA
Xayawaanka adeegga waa loo ogol yahay baabuurta.

AAGA ADEEGA:
Dhammaan raacitaannada waa inay 1) ka bilowdaan oo ku dhammaadaan Moorpark, 2) u wareejinta Los Angeles ACCESS ama nidaamka baska jid go'an, ama 3) u beddelashada adeegga baska VISTA. Safarrada kale ee u dhexeeya Moorpark iyo magaalooyinka kale waxay isticmaali doonaan adeegga ECTA Connect Dial-A-Ride.



SAYADA: Marka aad isdiiwaangeliso barnaamijka, wac ugu yaraan laba saacadood ka hor intaadan u baahnayn raacitaanka haddii aanu jirin qalab dhaqdhaqaaqa (ie. kursiga curyaanka). Wac ugu yaraan maalin ka hor haddii fuushanku uu yeelan doono qalab dhaqdhaqaaq. Markaad wacayso, u sheeg diraha inaad tahay Moorpark Dial-A-Rider.

WAREEJINTA:
Si loogu wareejiyo meel ka baxsan magaalada Moorpark, rakaabku waa inay maraan Isbahaysiga Transit County East (ECTA).
Adeegyada Isbahaysiga Transit County East (ECTA) InterCity CONNECT Dial-A-Ride kaas oo ah adeeg gaadiid raacid la wadaago oo laga heli karo inta badan degmada Ventura ee bari waxaana si gaar ah loogu talagalay in lagu ogolaado safarka ka baxsan aagagga adeega Dial-A-Ride.
& dibi; Boos celin waxa lagu samayn karaa iyadoo la waco ECTA, diraha ayaa kaa caawin doona abaabulka safarka.
& dibi; U wareejinta Los Angeles waa diyaar
& dibi; Qiimaha ECTA waa $6.00

Habka CODSIGA:
& dibi; laxidhiidha naafada - Hoos ka eeg macluumaad dheeraad ah oo ku saabsan codsashada ADA.
& dibi; Xidhiidh sare - La xidhiidh Simi Valley Transit.

DOkumentiyada loo baahan yahay:
& dibi; U qalmida iinta la xiriirta: ADA card, kaas oo la bixiyo marka la dhammeeyo codsiga ADA (eeg hoos wixii macluumaad dheeraad ah).
& dibi; Si aad ugu qalanto waayeel ahaan: Caddaynta da'da (65 iyo ka weyn).

FARES: Socdaalka gudaha magaalada Moorpark: $2.00

Telefoonada:
& dibi; Su'aalo/walaac ku saabsan barnaamijka Dial-A-Ride: 805-517-6257
& dibi; Boos celin/ECTA: 805-375-5467
& dibi; Codsiga VCTC ADA: 888-667-7001

Adeegyada lagu bixiyo luqadaha soo socda:
Ingiriis, Isbaanish

*Xeerka Naafada Ameerikaanka (ADA) Shahaadada*
Waa maxay shahaado ADA:Xeerka Naafada Ameerika waa sharci ka mamnuucaya takoorka ku salaysan naafanimada xagga shaqada, adeegyada dadweynaha, gaadiidka, hoyga dadweynaha, iyo isgaarsiinta. Qaybta gaadiidka ee ADA waxay u baahan tahay in nidaamyada gaadiidka ee dariiqyada go'an ay tahay inay helaan kuwa naafada ah. Sharcigu waxa kale oo uu bixiyaa adeega paratransit kaaba ah haddii basaska aan la heli karin ama haddii naafanimadaada ama xaaladaadu ay kaa horjoogsanayso isticmaalka gaadiidka dadweynaha ee go'an.
SHURUUDAHA LOOGU TALAGALAY SHAHAADADA ADA:Shakhsigu waa in uu leeyahay naafo ku meel gaadh ah ama joogto ah taas oo ka ilaalinaysa raacaha isticmaalka adeega baska dariiqa go'an. Naafadu waxay u baahan kartaa in uu xaqiijiyo xirfadle daryeel caafimaad.
Si loo codsado shahaado ADA:Shakhsiyaadka doonaya shahaadada ADA waxay ku buuxin karaan arjiga onlayn https://www.goventura.org/getting-around/ada-certification/ama wacMobility Management Partners (MMP) at 888-667-7001dalbo Qiimaynta shakhsi ahaaneed ayaa loo baahan karaa marka codsiga la gudbiyo.
transit_308_description:
Waxay bixisaa gaadiidka dadweynaha si loogu adeego baahiyaha kala duwan ee bulshada. Qiimaha la dhimay ee ay heli karaan shaqsiyaadka naafada ah iyo kuwa ka weyn da'da 65 sidoo kale. Dhammaan baabuurta waxaa lagu qalabeeyay in loogu adeego kuwa wata qalabka socodka. Gaadiidka baska waxaa lagu bixiyaa magaalooyinka Ojai, Oxnard, Port Hueneme, Ventura iyo aagagga gobolka ee aan la wadaagin ee u dhexeeya magaalooyinka.

- Wac ama booqo website-ka si aad u hesho macluumaad dheeraad ah oo ku saabsan qiimaha la dhimay iyo jadwalka baska hadda.

Adeegga macaamiisha ayaa diyaar u ah dhammaan su'aalaha Isniinta ilaa Jimcaha laga bilaabo 7:00 subaxnimo-7:00 galabnimo.
cateogories.help: Guji qaybta hoose si aad u hesho adeegyada bulshada ee kuu dhow.

paratransit_320_description:
City of Thousand Oaks waxay ka shaqeysaa barnaamijka Dial-A-Ride ee rakaabka da'doodu tahay 65 sano ama ka weyn iyo dadka qaba Americans with Disabilities (ADA) kaarka u socdaalaya gudaha magaalooyinka Thousand Oaks iyo Westlake Tuulada.


CORONAVIRUS XAALADDA GAAR AH EE CORONAVIRUS:

Adeegga wuu sii socdaa..


AQOONSIGA:

Adeegan waxa heli kara dadka da'da ah (shakhsiyaadka da'doodu tahay 65 iyo wixii ka weyn) iyo shakhsiyaadka da' kasta leh ee haysta shahaadada ADA.


(Haddii aad leedahay xaddidaad ku meel gaar ah ama joogto ah, jireed, maskaxeed, muuqaal, garasho, ama xaddidaad kale oo naafada ah taas oo saameyn doonta awooddaada helitaanka adeegga baska dariiqa go'an, waxaa laga yaabaa inaad u qalanto Shahaadada ADA. Eeg qaybta hoose ee Gelitaankan wixii macluumaad dheeraad ah sida loo codsado shahaadada ADA.)


.




XAYAWAANADA ADEEGA
Xayawaanka adeega waa loo ogolyahay baabuurka

AAGA ADEEGA:

Adeegga DAR waxa lagu bixiyaa gudaha Magaalada Thousand Oaks, Westlake Village, iyo aagagga aan la wadaagin ee degmada ee Newbury Park, Oak Park, Ventu Park, Lynn Ranch, Rolling Oaks, Dooxada Hidden iyo Lake Sherwood.


WAREEJINTA:

Adeegyada Isbahaysiga Gaadiidka ee Degmada Bari (ECTA) InterCity CONNECT Dial-A-Ride kaas oo ah adeeg gaadiid raacid la wadaago oo laga heli karo inta badan degmada Ventura ee bari waxaana si gaar ah loogu talagalay in lagu ogolaado safarka ka baxsan aagagga adeega Dial-A-Ride.< /p>
Ku socota Los Angeles: Kun Oaks Dial-a-Ride wuxuu bixiyaa wareejinta LA Helitaanka Dial-A-Ride ee saldhigga Tareenka Kun Oaks. Way fiicantahay inaad ka ballansato safarka laga bilaabo Thousand Oaks Transit Station ilaa meeshaad ku taal LA ilaa LA Access marka hore, ka dib si aad u ballansato barta aad ka bilowdo ee Thousand Oaks ilaa saldhigga taraafikada. Thousand Oaks Transit ayaa isku dubari doonta wakhtiga si uu rakaabku u joogo goobta wareejinta ee qaybta labaad ee safarka.


Habka CODSIGA:
& dibi;Naafanimada la xiriirta - Codsiga khadka tooska ah ama la xiriir Shuraakada Maareynta Dhaqdhaqaaqa.
& dibi; Xidhiidhka sare - La xidhiidh Thousand Oaks Transit.

DOkumentiyada loo baahan yahay:
& dibi; U qalmida iinta la xiriirta: ADA card, kaas oo la bixiyo marka la dhammeeyo codsiga ADA
& dibi; U-qalmitaanka waayeel ahaan: Caddeynta da'da (65 iyo ka weyn)

FARES:
& dibi;Ujeeddada guud; Qiimaha deegaanka (safar gudaha Kun Oaks): $4.00
& dibi; Qiimaha gobolka (kaarka ADA haysta iyo waayeelka 55+ kaliya): Camarillo ilaa magaalooyinka Gobolka Bari ee Ventura: $6.00

Telefoon:
Boos sii qabsasho, Su'aalo, Xog/ECTA: 805-375-5467

Waa maxay shahaado ADA:Xeerka Naafada Ameerika waa sharci ka mamnuucaya takoorka ku salaysan naafanimada xagga shaqada, adeegyada dadweynaha, gaadiidka, hoyga dadweynaha, iyo isgaarsiinta. paratransit_67_description:
Barnaamijka Pay Your Pal wuxuu kaa caawinayaa inaad u soo celiso deriskaaga, asxaabtaada ama kuwa kale ee ku siin kara kharashka safarkaaga.

Yaa U Qalma?

Haddii aad ku nooshahay miyiga Degmada Snohomish oo aad naafo tahay, haddana aad u baahan tahay inaad shaqo tagto, dugsi ama ballamaha caafimaadka oo aadan ku noolayn meel u dhow joogsiga baska, waxaa laga yaabaa inaan ku caawino magdhowga asxaabtaada, deriskaaga iyo xubnaha qoyskaaga ee kaa caawiya bixinta gaadiidka. adiga.
Yaa U Qalma?

Haddii aad ku nooshahay miyiga Degmada Snohomish oo aad naafo tahay, welina aad u baahan tahay inaad tagto shaqada, dugsiga ama balamaha caafimaadka oo aadan ku noolayn meel u dhow boosteejada baska, waxaa laga yaabaa inaan ku caawino magdhowga asxaabtaada, deriskaaga iyo xubnaha qoyskaaga ee kaa caawiya bixinta gaadiidka. adiga. * Kuma jiro aagga adeega DART
purpose_tap_homage_note: TAP waa barnaamijka gaadiidka miyiga ee Homage kaas oo siiya adeeg aan degdeg ahayn dadka da'doodu tahay 55 ama ka weyn, dadka naafada ah da' kasta, ama dadka dakhligoodu hooseeyo ee da' kasta oo ka baxsan aagga adeega DART (Dial a Ride).

paratransit_361_description:
Waxay bixisaa adeeg raacid si gaar ah loo qorsheeyay kaas oo rakaabka ka qaada halka ay ka yimaadeen ilaa meesha ay u jeedaan.

CORONAVIRUS XAALADDA GAAR AH EE CORONAVIRUS:

Adeegga wuu sii socdaa

AQOONSIYADA

Valley Express Dial-A-Ride adeegga waa u diyaar qof walba. Rakaabka da'doodu tahay 65+ ama haysta Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) shahaado waxaa lasiiyaa mudnaanta inta lagu jiro habka boos celinta.


(Haddii aad leedahay xaddidaad ku meel gaar ah ama joogto ah, jireed, maskaxeed, muuqaal, garasho, ama xaddidaad kale oo naafada ah taas oo saameyn doonta awooddaada helitaanka adeegga baska dariiqa go'an, waxaa laga yaabaa inaad u qalanto Shahaadada ADA. Eeg qaybta hoose ee Gelitaankan wixii macluumaad dheeraad ah sida loo codsado shahaadada ADA.)

XAYAWAANADA ADEEGA
Valley Express Bas iyo Dial-A-Ride waxay u ogolaataa adeega xoolaha loo tababaray inay caawiyaan dadka naafada ah.

AAGA ADEEGA
Aagga adeegga waxaa ka mid ah magaalooyinka Santa Paula iyo Fillmore iyo meelaha aan la wadaagin ee ka kooban Dooxada Heritage.

SAYADA:

Dadweynaha guud waxa kaliya oo ay codsan karaan fuulid maalinta la rabo. Dadweynaha guud ma ballansan karaan baabuurka ka hor maalinta safarka. Boos celin guud oo dadweyne waa in la sameeyaa ugu yaraan laba saacadood ka hor wakhtiga safarka ee la doonayo. Boos qabsi isla-maalin ah ayaa lagu bixin doonaa si ku saleysan meel bannaan oo keliya.


Waayeelka iyo ADA Paratransit Riders waxa laga yaabaa in ay kaydsadaan raacitaankooda ilaa hal usbuuc ka hor safarkooda.
Safarrada is-diiwaangelinta waxay diyaar u yihiin dadweynaha guud safarada dhaca waqti isku mid ah, isla maalmo. Adeeggan waxa lagu bixiyaa adeeg hore u soo horraysa, booskuna wuu xaddidan yahay.

Saacadaha Booska:
& dibi; Isniinta ilaa Jimcaha 5:45 subaxnimo-7:45 galabnimo
& dibi; Sabti iyo Axad 8:00 subaxnimo-6:00 galabnimo

WAREEJINTA:
Wareejinta Guud ee Dadweynaha: gudaha Fillmore/Piru AMA gudaha Santa Paula.
Dhibcaha wareejinta soo socda ayaa loo heli karaa KALIYA dadka da'da ah ee da'doodu tahay 65+ iyo kuwa haysta ADA shahaado waxay sidoo kale u safri karaan inta u dhaxaysa magaalooyinka:
& dibi; Buuxi wax dheeraad ah
& dibi;Santa Paula
& dibi;Saticoy
Goobaha laga soo dejiyo iyo meelaha laga soo qaadayo ee wareejinta ayaa diyaar ah oo ku hareeraysan Aagga Wareejinta Ceelasha. Wadooyinka soohdinta ee wareejinta waa:
& dibi; Wadada Saticoy iyo Waddada Los Angeles ee Galbeedka
& dibi; Waddada Foothill iyo West Telegraph Waddada Waqooyiga
& dibi; Wadada North Wells, Date Avenue, Apple Avenue, Silk Tree Avenue, Heather Way, Lilac Way iyo Campanula Avenue ee Bari
& dibi; Waddada Darling, Aster Street iyo Rosal Lane ee dhanka koonfureed

Habka CODSIGA:
Midna, ilaa aad codsato shahaadada ADA.

DOkumentiyada loo baahan yahay:
Shahaadada ADA ee kuwa u safraya magaalooyinka hoos yimaada shahaadada ADA Caddaynta da'da fuulitaanka Sare.

FARES:
Rakayaasha ADA: Kaalmada Daryeelka Shakhsi ahaaneed waxay ku raacaan bilaash.

Telefoon:
& dibi; Khadka Boos celinta: 805-933-2267
& dibi; Macluumaadka ama faallooyinka adeegga: 800-438-1112

CAAWIMAAD LAGA HELI KARO LUQADAHA SOO SOCOTA:
Ingiriis, Isbaanish

*Xeerka Naafada Ameerikaanka (ADA) Shahaadada*
Waa maxay shahaado ADA:Xeerka Naafada Ameerika waa sharci ka mamnuucaya takoorka ku salaysan naafanimada xagga shaqada, adeegyada dadweynaha, gaadiidka, hoyga dadweynaha, iyo isgaarsiinta. Qaybta gaadiidka ee ADA waxay u baahan tahay in nidaamyada gaadiidka ee dariiqyada go'an ay tahay inay helaan kuwa naafada ah. Sharcigu waxa kale oo uu bixiyaa adeega paratransit kaaba ah haddii basaska aan la heli karin ama haddii naafanimadaada ama xaaladaadu ay kaa horjoogsanayso isticmaalka gaadiidka dadweynaha ee go'an.
SHURUUDAHA LOOGU TALAGALAY SHAHAADADA ADA:Shakhsigu waa in uu leeyahay naafo ku meel gaadh ah ama joogto ah taas oo ka ilaalinaysa raacaha isticmaalka adeega baska dariiqa go'an. Naafadu waxay u baahan kartaa in uu xaqiijiyo xirfadle daryeel caafimaad.
Si loo codsado shahaado ADA:Shakhsiyaadka doonaya shahaadada ADA waxay ku buuxin karaan arjiga onlayn https://www.goventura.org/getting-around/ada-certification/ama wacMobility Management Partners (MMP) at 888-667-7001dalbo Qiimaynta shakhsi ahaaneed ayaa loo baahan karaa marka codsiga la gudbiyo.
paratransit_315_description:
Adeeggan waxa heli kara dadweynaha iyo adeegyada meel kasta oo ka mid ah xadka magaalada Camarillo. Boos qabsi looma samayn doono ardaydu si ay dugsiga ugu safraan kana soo laabtaan. Bacaha wax lagu kala iibsado waxay ku xaddidan yihiin saddex (3) bac qofkiiba.



CORONAVIRUS XAALADDA GAAR AH EE CORONAVIRUS:
Adeeggu wuxuu u socdaa sidii caadiga ahayd.

U-QALMAANSHAHA gaadiidka naafada ee Camarillo:
(Haddii aad leedahay xaddidaad ku meel gaar ah ama joogto ah, jireed, maskaxeed, muuqaal, garasho, ama xaddidaad kale oo naafada ah taas oo saameyn doonta awooddaada helitaanka adeegga baska dariiqa go'an, waxaa laga yaabaa inaad u qalanto Shahaadada ADA. Eeg qaybta hoose ee Gelitaankan wixii macluumaad dheeraad ah sida loo codsado shahaadada ADA.)

XAYAWAANADA ADEEGA
Xayawaanka adeega waa loo ogolyahay baabuurka.

AAGA ADEEGA:
& dibi;Safarro ka bilaabanaya kuna dhamaanaya gudaha Magaalada Camarillo waa u diyaar dadweynaha guud.
& dibi; Safarada gudaha magaalada Camarillo iyo qaar ka mid ah meelaha u dhow ee aan la wadaagin ayaa diyaar u ah shakhsiyaadka haysta sharciga Maraykanka ee Naafada (ADA) iyo waayeelka (55+).
& dibi; Shuruud degenaansho ma jirto

SAYADA:
Waxaa lagu talinayaa in la sameeyo boos celin ugu yaraan laba maalmood ka hor safarka. Boos qabsiyeedka 24 saacadood gudahood ee safarka waa la dammaanad qaaday (inkasta oo wakhtiga laga yaabo inuu u baahdo in laga wada xaajoodo). Boos qabsi isla maalinta ah ayaa laga yaabaa in la aqbalo laba saacadood ka hor safarka iyadoo ku xiran helitaanka. Safarrada waxa la samayn karaa laba toddobaad ka hor.


Markaad Boos qabsanayso, fadlan u diyaargarow inaad bixiso macluumaadka soo socda:
&dibi;Magacaaga iyo lambarkaaga taleefoonka.
&dibi;Goobta laga soo qaadayo.
& dibi;Waqtiga soo qaadida aad rabto.
& dibi; Meeshaada.
& dibi;Waqtiga aad u baahan tahay inaad joogtid meeshaad u socoto.
& dibi;Waqtiga soo noqoshada.
& dibi; Haddii aad u baahan tahay gargaar gaar ah ( lugeeyaha, kursiga lugaha, iwm.)

WAREEJINTA: U wareejinta adeegyada paratransit-ka deriska ah ayaa diyaar u ah raacayaasha 65 sano iyo ka weyn iyo shaqsiyaadka leh naafo la xaqiijin karo. Tan waxa ku jira u wareejinta Isbahaysiga Transit Alliance (ECTA) InterCity CONNECT Dial-A-Ride Service (oo u adeegaya bariga Ventura County, ECTA qiimaha: $6.00) iyo geynta Gold Coast Go Access (oo u adeegaya galbeedka Ventura County, qiimaha Gold Coast: $3.00).



Habka CODSIGA:
Wac dirista si aad u sii qabsato. Haddii rakaabku u baahan yahay caawimo shakhsi ah, shahaadada Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) ayaa loo baahan doonaa si loo keeno adeegaha daryeelka shakhsi ahaaneed.

DOCUMENTS LOO BAAHAN YAHAY

FARE:

Boos celin, su'aalo, macluumaad: 805-988-4228

paratransit_312_description:
[u-qalmitaanka iyo u-qalmitaanka., ilaa TO]

Adeegga Paratransit Naafada ee Moorpark wuxuu u shaqeeyaa sida Dial-A-Ride Senior oo leh adeeg dheeraad ah. Waxaa heli kara qof kasta oo u qalma naafo iyadoon loo eegayn da'da.

U-qalmitaanka:
Qof kasta oo haysta kaarka ADA wuu isticmaali karaa adeegga. Shuruud degenaansho ma jirto.
Si aad ugu qalanto, qofku waa inuu marka hore shahaado ku haystaa Xeerka Naafada Ameerikaanka (ADA). Codsiga waa in la buuxiyaa si loo galo barnaamijka kaas oo laga heli karo adigoo wacaya Magaalada Moorpark ama Guddiga Gaadiidka Degmada Ventura (VCTC).

Marka codsiga la dhammeeyo, wakiil ka socda Guddiga Gaadiidka Degmada Ventura ayaa la xiriiri doona codsadaha macluumaad dheeri ah oo ku saabsan wareysiga qiimeynta.

Kursiga curyaanka oo la heli karo ayaa diyaar ah. Haddii aad ku safrayso kursiga curyaanka, fadlan wac ugu yaraan maalin ka hor si aad u ballansato raacitaankaada.

DOkumentiyada loo baahan yahay:
-ADA shahaado kaarka, kaas oo la bixiyo marka la dhammeeyo codsiga iyo ansixinta.

Qiimaha:
- $2.00 waddo kasta oo loogu socdaalayo gudaha Moorpark.

WAREEJINTA:
[ Bayaanka ECTA]

XILDHIBAAN:
[ku habboon qoraallada sare]

TALEEFANADA:
Su'aalaha/walaaca ku saabsan barnaamijka Dial-A-Ride: 805-517-6257
Boos qabsasho: 805-375-5467
Codsiga VCTC ADA (kaas oo ka diiwaan gashan adeegga MV): 888-667-7001

ADEEGYADA LAGU BIXIYAY LUQADAHA SOO SOCOTA:
Ingiriis, Isbaanish
paratransit_358_description:
Adeega gaadiidka baska ee mara wadada go'an ee bilaashka ah kaas oo ku socdaala agagaarka dugsiyada xaafadaha iyo meelaha la dego ee u dhaw Waddada Kanan ee Oak Park iyo Agoura Hills.
Adeegyada waxaa ka mid ah wareejinta Metro Route 161 iyo basaska LADOT Commuter Express ee Thousand Oaks Blvd, Canwood Road, iyo Roadside Drive baska.

Baabuurtu waa ay heli karaan dadka naafada ah
Baabuurtu waxay ku qalabaysan yihiin rashyada baaskiilka (waxaa la heli karaa marka ugu horraysa ee la heli karo)
 Sababo badbaado awgeed baaskiilada laguma qaadi karo gudaha basaska

Dhammaan joogsiyada Kanan Shuttle-ka waxaa lagu calaamadeeyay calaamado leh calaamada libaaxa buurta. Hubi khariidada si aad u heshid joogsiyadaada iyo jadwalka wakhtiyada dariiqa.
Wac 805-375-5473 ama booqo https://www.toaks.org/departments/public-works/transit/kanan-shuttle wixii macluumaad dheeraad ah.
transportationagency_223_description: Iskaashatada magaalooyinka Ojai, Oxnard, Port Hueneme, Ventura iyo Degmada Ventura. GCT waxay bixisaa adeega baska iyo basaska deegaanka ee galbeedka degmada Ventura.
paratransit_57_description:
*Silver S.T.A.R.S. Gaadiidka Sare & Shuttle Madadaalada.
Magaalada Ontario iyo YMCA waxay soo bandhigaan Gaadiidka Sare ee Deganeyaasha Ontaariyo.
Ka soo qaadis iyo Deganaanshaha Ontaariyo. Soo degista Xarunta Sare ee Ontario.
Isniin - Jimce
8:30 subaxnimo - 4:30 galabnimo
Dhammaan wakhtiyada soo qaadista/dejinta waa la sii qorsheeyay.


* Shuttle balamaha dhakhtarka (masaafo xadidan)
Isniin, Arbaco iyo Jimco
10 subaxnimo - 4 galabnimo
Waa in horay u wac si loo soo qaado.

Si aad u ballansato gaadiidka, la xidhiidh YMCA oo fariin kaga tag (909) 988-1864.
transportationagency_264_description: Hay'adda dadwaynaha oo bixisa adeegyo caafimaad iyo fayoobi dadka degan degmada Ventura.
transportationagency_56_description: Magaalada waxay ka shaqeysaa xarun sare oo ujeedo badan leh oo bixisa adeegyada madadaalada, waxbarashada iyo bulshada ee bulshada.
transportationagency_263_description: Wakaalada degmada oo ka shaqeysa dariiq go'an, ADA-paratransit, iyo garaaca ujeedo-guud ee dooxada Heritage ee Degmada Ventura. Waxaa maamula oo maamula Guddiga Gaadiidka Degmada Ventura.

paratransit_20_description:
(CUSBOONAYSIINTA COVID-19: Dhammaan adeegyada dariiqyadu waa bilaash ilaa ogeysiis dambe.)

Ready Ride waa adeeg asal u ah halka loo socdo oo ay ugu horrayn heli karaan rakaabka waayeelka ah iyo kuwa naafada ah qiimo jaban laakiin waxaa diyaar u ah dhammaan rakaabka qiimo jaban. Waxaan ku weydiineynaa inaad sameyso boos celin 24 saacadood ka hor. Adeeggan waxaa laga heli karaa meelaha soo socda:
Dooxada YUCCA:

transit_311_description:
Waxay ku xidhaa Moorpark magaalooyinka Simi Valley iyo Thousand Oaks. Joogsiyada baska waxay ku yaalaan Saldhigga Tareenka ee Moorpark Metrolink, Princeton Avenue (oo u dhaw Campus Park Drive) iyo Moorpark College.

Xidhiidhiyaha VCTC Bari-Galbeed wuxuu ku xidhaa Moorpark iyo magaalooyinka Simi Valley, Thousand Oaks, Camarillo, Oxnard, iyo Ventura. Joogsiyada baska waxay ku yaalaan Saldhigga Tareenka ee Moorpark Metrolink iyo Kuliyada Moorpark.

Labada dariiqba waxay ku xidhmaan adeegyada kale ee VCTC, iyagoo bixinaya isku xidhka dhammaan magaalooyinka Gobolka Ventura iyo sidoo kale CSUCI, Santa Barbara iyo Xarunta Warner.

Qiimaha waa $1.25 ardayda iyo dadka waaweyn, iyo $.60 waayeelka iyo shakhsiyaadka naafada ah.

Luqadda: Ingiriisi, Isbaanish
transportationagency_226_description: Hay'adda dawlada hoose ee masuulka ka ah hawlaha dawlada hoose ee Dooxada Simi. Waxay bixisaa adeegyo gaadiid oo magaalada oo dhan ah.
paratransit_354_description:
7/22/20: Wax dhaqdhaqaaq la'aan ka dib wadahadalka Juan Jose Almenara & John DeLeon ee Pegasus. Pegasus waxa ay ka shaqaynaysaa dhanka garaacida adeega baabuurka, laakiin adeegyadooda hadda kuma haboona 211. Adeegyada nooca Paratransit wakhtigan waxa inta badan lagu maraa qandaraas w TriCounties.
Haddii Pegasus uu bilaabo garaaca adeegga raacitaanka ee bulshada, waxaan dib u eegi karnaa u-qalmitaanka, adeegga, iyo qiimaha ku darida 211. -Tanya

Waxay siisaa gaadiid kooxeed kuwa qaba naafanimada korriinka iyo sidoo kale mujaahidiinta naafada ah. Darawaliinta waxaa lagu shahaado CPR, Aid First, iyo VDDP (baabuur loogu talagalay dadka naafada ah) si loo hubiyo in dhammaan rakaabka si badbaado leh loo ilaaliyo ka hor inta aysan dhoofin.

-Baabuurta waxa qaada ilaa 20 rakaab ah waxaana ku jira wiishka kursiga curyaanka
- Qaado ilaa 4 rakaab ah oo kursiga curyaanka ah iyo 8 ambulatory,
-Dareewalada waxaa lagu tababaray CPR, Gargaarka Degdegga ah, iyo Gaadiidka loogu talagalay Dadka Naafada Koriinka ah (VDDP)

U-qalmitaanka:
-Si kastaba ha ahaatee, ma jiraan wax shuruudo ah oo ku saabsan adeegyada, si kastaba ha ahaatee, safarrada ayaa diyaar u ah labada kooxood ee rakaabka ah iyo kuwa keligood ah sidoo kale.

DOkumentiyada loo baahan yahay:


HABKA CODSIGA:
Si aad u bilowdo adeegyada, fadlan wac Tri-Counties kuwaas oo ka dibna u gudbi doona nidaamka codsiga.

Qiimaha:
Qiimaha waa kala duwan yahay iyadoo ku xiran hadba inta ay le'eg tahay kooxda, iyo masaafada la safray.

WAREEJINTA:

XILDHIBAAN:
Safarrada waa in la sii dhigaa ugu yaraan 72 saacadood ka hor.

TALEEFANADA:
Su'aalaha iyo macluumaadka dheeraadka ah 805-988-1540
Saddexda Gobol 805-485-3177

Baska jid go'an ee deegaanka ee gaadiidka guud. Waxaa jira laba wado oo go'an oo shaqeeya Isniinta ilaa Jimcaha marka laga reebo inta lagu jiro fasaxyada soo socda:

-Route 2 wuxuu shaqeeyaa laga bilaabo 6:15 subaxnimo ilaa 5:54 galabnimo wuxuuna ku wareegaa wareegga saacadda ee agagaarka magaalada.

paratransit_256_description:
Barnaamijka SB Loop (The Loop) vanpool waa adeega Maamulka Gaadiidka Degmada San Bernardino (SBCTA), wakaalad ka mas'uulka ah qorsheynta wadashaqeynta gobolka iyo sii wadida nidaamka gaadiidka kala duwan ee hufan ee gobolka oo dhan.

Barnaamijka Loop vanpool waxa uu siinayaa rakaabka u safraya aagga adeega SBCTA gaadiid macquul ah oo ka duwan wadista baabuurta kaas oo ka caawiya yaraynta saxmada taraafiga iyo wadarta mayl gadiidka la safray, taas oo gacan ka geysata hagaajinta wakhtiyada safarka iyo tayada hawada oo wanaagsan.
transportationagency_31_description:
Omnitrans waxay macaamiisheeda ka codsanaysaa inay fuulaan oo ay baska ka baxaan albaabka danbe. Macaamiisha isticmaala aaladda dhaqdhaqaaqa waxay sii wadi doonaan inay ka raacaan albaabka hore ee baska.
Inta lagu jiro muddadan, NO FARES lama qaadi doono laga bilaabo Maarso 21-April 5. Adeegga la dhimay sida soo socota, todobada maalmood ee usbuuca:
Waddooyinka shaqeeya 15kii daqiiqaba waxay shaqayn doonaan 30kii daqiiqoba
Waddooyinka shaqeeya 30kii daqiiqaba waxay shaqayn doonaan 60kii daqiiqoba
Waddooyinka shaqeeya 60 kii daqiqiba mar way sii shaqayn doonaan 60 kii daqiqiba
Fadlan booqo omnitrans.org ama wac 1-800-966-6428 wixii faahfaahin dheeraad ah.


Omnitrans waa wakaaladda gaadiidka dadweynaha ee u adeegta Dooxada San Bernardino, iyadoo bixisa badbaado, la isku halayn karo, la awoodi karo, saaxiibtinimo iyo gaadiid deegaan ahaan mas'uul ka ah.
Omnitrans hadda waxa ay ka shaqeysaa jidadka basaska maxalliga ah iyo kuwa degdega ah iyo sidoo kale adeegga gaadiidka baska ee degdegga ah ee sbX, adeegga basaska ee OmniGo hometown, iyo Access, adeegga paratransit ee naafada.
Qiimo dhimis loogu talagalay Halyeeyga, Waayeelka 65+, iyo naafada sita aqoonsi habboon
Halyeeyga waxa looga baahan yahay inay tusaan kaadhka aqoonsiga mujaahidiinta.

Wax badan oo ku saabsan waddooyinka iyo jadwalka, fadlan la xiriir:
 Macluumaadka Baska Omnitrans 1 (800) 9-OMNIBUS ama 1 (800) 966-6428, 7:00 subaxnimo ilaa 6:00 galabnimo maalmaha shaqada, 8:00 subaxnimo ilaa 5:00 galabnimo sabtida.
oneclick.pages.home.welcome_message_2: Ka hel adeegyada gaadiidka gudaha Bartamaha Puget Sound.
transportationagency_219_description:
Gaadiidka caafimaadka ee Care Wagon waa a
Adeegga Gaadiidka Caafimaadka ee Aan Degdegga ahayn
Gaadiidka caafimaadka ee Care Wagon waxa ay siisaa gaadiid caafimaad oo ay heli karaan dadka waayeelka ah iyo naafada ballamaha caafimaad ee aan degdega ahayn iyo sidoo kale meelaha ay maalin walba danta gaarka ah u aadi karaan taabashada daryeelka.

Bixinta kursiga curyaanka ee albaab ka-albaabka ah oo ay heli karaan adeegyo gaadiid caafimaad oo ay heli karaan dadka naafada ah ilaa ballamaha dhakhtarka aan degdega ahayn waa adeeg aad muhiim u ah si ay ugu fududeeyaan noloshooda iyo qoyskooda.


Gaadiidka curyaanka ah ee la heli karo ee aan degdega ahayn waa uun mid ka mid ah adeegyada badan ee waayeelka ee loo baahan yahay si loo caawiyo waayeelka deegaanka si ay u ahaato mid firfircoon oo madax banaan intii suurtagal ah. Care Wagon waxay halkan u joogtaa inay bixiso gaadiidkaas iyo sidoo kale inay ka caawiso qaar ka mid ah baahiyaha la xidhiidha.

Barnaamijka Gaadiidka waxa loo qaabeeyey sidii ka jawaabida dalabka/barnaamij wadaaga Wadaagista ee dadka waayeelka ah ee Fontana (55 iyo ka weyn) iyo deganayaasha caafimaad ahaan naafada ah. Adeegani wuxuu dadka deegaanka ku qaadaa inta u dhaxaysa xadka magaalada:

Xafiisyada Dhakhaatiirta

si kor loogu qaado madax-banaanida, amniga iyo wanaagga bulshada, iyadoo xoogga la saarayo balse aan ku koobnayn baahiyaha muwaadiniinteena waayeelka ah.
transportationagency_14_description: Morongo Basin Transit Authority waa wakaalada gaadiidka ee u adeega Morongo Basin ee Degmada San Bernardino, California. Waa awood awood wadaag ah oo ka dhaxaysa Dooxada Yucca, Twentynine Palms, iyo Degmada San Bernardino
transit_6_description:
Transit Mountain waxay bixisaa adeegga Dial-a-Ride iyo Fixed Route ee dhammaan miyiga San Bernardino Mountain bulshooyinka Dooxada Bear ee Big Bear, Crestline, Lake Arrowhead, iyo Running Springs. Transit Mountain waxa kale oo ay bixisaa adeega rakaabka ka baxsan buurta ee u dhexeeya bulshooyinkan iyo magaalada San Bernardino, samaynta isku xidhka Omnitrans, Metrolink, Greyhound, iyo joogsiyo kale oo kala duwan. Transit Mountain waxay ka shaqeysaa adeega Trolley Weekend oo bixisa gaadiidka u dhaxeeya maqaayadaha maxaliga ah, huteelada, meelaha barafka lagu ciyaaro, iyo goobaha wax iibsiga ee magaalada Big Bear Lake.

* Qiimaha waa $5.00 qofkiiba/$2.50 Waayeel & Naafo ah dhamaadka todobaadka oo dhan. Carruurta 5 iyo wixii ka hooseeya waa bilaash. Kaararka waxaa laga iibsan karaa Northwoods, Marina Resort, xafiiska MARTA (Isniin-Jimce) ama Conductor-ka Trolley. Saacadaha 10ka subaxnimo ilaa 4pm iyo Fasaxyada
transit_267_description:
Basasku waxay baxayaan 15-kii daqiiqoba mar, ma jirin wakhti ku habboon oo aad ku raaci lahayd mid ka mid ah waddooyinka RTA ee ugu degdegsan oo leh qiime kaa dhigi doona dhoola cadeyn. Kharashka guud ee lagu raacayo waa $1.75 oo keliya, oo la mid ah jidadka kale ee basaska maxalliga ah ee RTA, oo lagu daray basaska jiilka cusub ee RTA waxay la yimaadaan fadhi raaxo leh, dekedaha ku dallacaadda USB iyo adeegga Wi-Fi-ga oo had iyo jeer bilaash ah. RapidLink waxay la timaadaa qaab u gaar ah ee basaska iyo joogsiga, iyagoo u adeegaya 14 goobood oo caan ah oo ku teedsan wadooyinka Magnolia iyo Jaamacada - ka fakar Jidka 1 oo leh adeeg dheereeya iyo joogsiyo yar.
Isniin - Jimco: 6:30 - 8:30 subaxnimo iyo 1:30 - 5:30 galabnimo.

6:30 subaxnimo - 8:30 subaxnimo
Baska u dambeeya ee bari u socdaa wuxuu ka baxaa Corona 8:30 a.m. wuxuuna yimaadaa UCR 9:38 a.m
1:30 duhurnimo - 5:30 galabnimo
Baska u socda bari ee u dambeeya wuxuu ka baxaa Corona 5:30 galabnimo oo yimaada UCR 6:45 p.m. iyo baska u dambeeya ee galbeedka u socdaa wuxuu ka baxaa UCR 5:30 galabnimo wuxuuna yimaadaa Corona 6:40 p.m.
transportationagency_39_description: Wasaaradda U Reach Transit waxay siisaa gaadiid shan maalmood usbuucii dadka waayeelka ah iyo kuwa qaba naafanimada jireed. Adeegeena wuxuu siiya hab ay kooxahani ku helaan ballamaha caafimaadka iyo ilkaha ee aadka loogu baahan yahay, dukaamaysiga, bangiyada, ama booqashada qoyska ama saaxiibada. Nasiib darro, ma jirto wax loogu talagalay kuraasta curyaamiinta, macaamiishu waa inay kaligood geli karaan kana bixi karaan baabuur.
transportationagency_63_description: Magaaladu waxay ka hawlgashaa xarun ujeedooyin badan leh oo bixisa adeegyada iyo hawlaha bulshada, madadaalada iyo caafimaadka la xidhiidha dadka waaweyn.
oneclick.global.error_messages.auth_need: Fadlan saxiix ka hor intaadan sii wadin.
transportationagency_4_description: waxay bixisaa barnaamijyo iyo adeegyo kala duwan oo awood u siinaya macaamiisha saddexda degmo si ay u maareeyaan yoolalkooda caafimaad ee mustaqbalka fog. Daawaynta isku dhafan iyo maaraynta daryeelka joogtada ah, oo lagu lammaaniyo qorshaynta guriyaynta iyo wacyigelinta, waxay siisaa qalab badan oo loogu talagalay dadka la nool HIV/AIDS si ay u noolaadaan waqti dheer, caafimaad badan, iyo nolol xasilloon.
transportationagency_25_description: Degmadu ay maamusho baska iyo adeega para-transit ee bixiya adeega tareenada ee Metrolink, xarunta cashuuraha ee 91 Express Lanes, adeegyada gargaarka darawalada, sharciga adeega tagaasida, iyo wadooyinka xorta ah, wadooyinka iyo mashaariicda horumarinta wadooyinka.
accommodation_wheelchair_lift_equipped_n: Waxaan u baahanahay baabuur leh wiish kursiga curyaanka ah.
paratransit_226_description:
Waxaa lagugula talinayaa inaad horay u sii qabsato adeegga Dial-a-Ride - ugu yaraan hal maalin ka hor, si kastaba ha ahaatee, waxaad wici kartaa ilaa hal usbuuc ka hor wakhtiga si aad u ballansato safarkaaga.

Dial-a-Ride wuxuu u shaqeeyaa xoogaa ka duwan kan raacitaanka dalabka ama adeegga tagsiga. Boos qabsi waa in la sameeyaa ugu yaraan laba (2) saacadood ka hor wakhtiga qaadida aad rabto, markaa horay u sii qorshey!

Gawaarida Dial-a-Ride waxay kaliya ku bixin karaan adeega soo qaadis/dejinta kuwaas oo ay heli karaan wadooyin laami ah oo dayactiran. Ma ku wadi karno waddooyin qarda-jeex ah ama ma jiidi karno meelaha baarkinka alwaax ah.

Dial-a-Ride Darawalada looma ogola inay rakaabka ka soo saaraan guryahooda, xafiisyada dhakhaatiirta, makhaayadaha, ama iwm.

Rakaabka Dial-a-Ride waa inay awoodaan inay naftooda ka soo galaan kana soo degaan baabuurka DAR ee ka leexan ama ay soo kaxaystaan adeegaha iyaga. Markaad wacdo boos celin u diyaar garow inaad bixiso macluumaadka soo socda:

Magaca iyo tirada rakaabka
Soo qaado goobta iyo meesha aad u socoto
Soo wac lambarka taleefanka

U sheeg soo diraha haddii goobta laga qaadayo ay adag tahay in la galo haddii adiga (ama rakaabka) aad u baahan tahay gargaar, ama haddii ay tahay inaad joogtid
meel loo socdo waqti go'an.

Adeegga Dial-a-Ride waxa la bixiyaa Isniinta ilaa Axadda oo dhan
aagga RIM oo ay ku jiraan bulshooyinka:
Cedar Pines, VOE, Crestline, Twin Peaks, Crest Park, Rimforest, Lake Arrowhead, Cedar Glen, Sky Forest, Springs Running, Arrowbear, Blue Jay.
Waayeelka (60+) iyo dadka naafada ah
Qof kasta oo ku nool in ka badan 3/4 mayl u jirta Buur Transit ee joogsiga jid go'an, laakiin gudaha aagga adeegga Dial-a-Ride
Rakaabku waa in ay ka soo degi karaan kana soo degi karaan baabuurka cidhifka ama ay soo kaxaystaan adeege iyaga ah
Kaadhka Aqoonsiga Naafada Buur- Transit wuxuu u oggolaanayaa dadka naafada ah inay raacaan dhammaan adeegyada qiimo jaban, iyo inay isticmaalaan adeegga Dial-a-Ride

Soo deji Codsiga Kaarka Aqoonsiga Naafada, ama ka soo qaado nuqul ka mid ah xafiisyadayada Crestline ama Big Bear
transportationagency_227_description:
Magaalada Moorpark waxay siisaa adeegyo gaadiid oo gaar loo qorsheeyay oo loogu talagalay waayeelka da'doodu tahay 65+ iyo gaadiidka la xidhiidha naafanimada kuwa haysta Shahaadada Sharciga Naafada Maraykanka (ADA).

CORONAVIRUS XAALADDA GAAR AH EE CORONAVIRUS:

Adeegga wuu sii socdaa, laakiin qiimaha waa la dhaafay wakhtigan.



AQOONSIGA:

U-qalmitaanka Gaadiidka Sare ee Moorpark:
Shakhsiyaadka da'doodu tahay 65 iyo wixii ka weyn waxay u qalmaan gaadiidka Dial-A-Ride sida waayeelka. Waayeelka naafada ah waa lagu soo dhaweynayaa inay codsadaan shahaadada ADA.

XAYAWAANADA ADEEGA
Xayawaanka adeegga waa loo ogol yahay baabuurta.

AAGA ADEEGA:
Dhammaan raacitaannada waa inay 1) ka bilowdaan oo ku dhammaadaan Moorpark, 2) u wareejinta Los Angeles ACCESS ama nidaamka baska jid go'an, ama 3) u beddelashada adeegga baska VISTA. Safarrada kale ee u dhexeeya Moorpark iyo magaalooyinka kale waxay isticmaali doonaan adeegga ECTA Connect Dial-A-Ride.



SAYADA: Marka aad isdiiwaangeliso barnaamijka, wac ugu yaraan laba saacadood ka hor intaadan u baahnayn raacitaanka haddii aanu jirin qalab dhaqdhaqaaqa (ie. kursiga curyaanka). Wac ugu yaraan maalin ka hor haddii fuushanku uu yeelan doono qalab dhaqdhaqaaq. Markaad wacayso, u sheeg diraha inaad tahay Moorpark Dial-A-Rider.

WAREEJINTA:
Si loogu wareejiyo meel ka baxsan magaalada Moorpark, rakaabku waa inay maraan Isbahaysiga Transit County East (ECTA).
Adeegyada Isbahaysiga Transit County East (ECTA) InterCity CONNECT Dial-A-Ride kaas oo ah adeeg gaadiid raacid la wadaago oo laga heli karo inta badan degmada Ventura ee bari waxaana si gaar ah loogu talagalay in lagu ogolaado safarka ka baxsan aagagga adeega Dial-A-Ride.
& dibi; Boos celin waxa lagu samayn karaa iyadoo la waco ECTA, diraha ayaa kaa caawin doona abaabulka safarka.
& dibi; U wareejinta Los Angeles waa diyaar
& dibi; Qiimaha ECTA waa $6.00

Habka CODSIGA:
& dibi;La xidhiidh Gaadiidka Dooxada Simi.

DOkumentiyada loo baahan yahay:

& dibi;Caddaynta da'da (65 iyo ka weyn).

FARES: Socdaalka gudaha magaalada Moorpark: $2.00

Telefoonada:
& dibi; Su'aalo/walaac ku saabsan barnaamijka Dial-A-Ride: 805-517-6257
& dibi; Boos celin/ECTA: 805-375-5467
& dibi; Codsiga VCTC ADA: 888-667-7001

Adeegyada lagu bixiyo luqadaha soo socda:
Ingiriis, Isbaanish

*Xeerka Naafada Ameerikaanka (ADA) Shahaadada*
Waa maxay shahaado ADA:Xeerka Naafada Ameerika waa sharci ka mamnuucaya takoorka ku salaysan naafanimada xagga shaqada, adeegyada dadweynaha, gaadiidka, hoyga dadweynaha, iyo isgaarsiinta. Qaybta gaadiidka ee ADA waxay u baahan tahay in nidaamyada gaadiidka ee dariiqyada go'an ay tahay inay helaan kuwa naafada ah. Sharcigu waxa kale oo uu bixiyaa adeega paratransit kaaba ah haddii basaska aan la heli karin ama haddii naafanimadaada ama xaaladaadu ay kaa horjoogsanayso isticmaalka gaadiidka dadweynaha ee go'an.
SHURUUDAHA LOOGU TALAGALAY SHAHAADADA ADA:Shakhsigu waa in uu leeyahay naafo ku meel gaadh ah ama joogto ah taas oo ka ilaalinaysa raacaha isticmaalka adeega baska dariiqa go'an. Naafadu waxay u baahan kartaa in uu xaqiijiyo xirfadle daryeel caafimaad.
Si loo codsado shahaado ADA:Shakhsiyaadka doonaya shahaadada ADA waxay ku buuxin karaan arjiga onlayn https://www.goventura.org/getting-around/ada-certification/ama wacMobility Management Partners (MMP) at 888-667-7001dalbo Qiimaynta shakhsi ahaaneed ayaa loo baahan karaa marka codsiga la gudbiyo.
paratransit_231_description:
Lacag-celinta Gaadiidka ee Barnaamijka Shakhsiyaadka (TRIP) waxay siisaa dhiirigelin darawaliinta iskaa wax u qabso ah (sida caadiga ah saaxiibbada ama deriska) si ay u caawiyaan shakhsiyaadka xaqa u leh ee aan awoodin inay wadaan ama galaan gaadiidka dadweynaha iyagoo siinaya lagama maarmaan, gaadiid la galbiyay. Ka qaybqaatayaasha waxay helayaan lacag ay ku soo celiyaan darawalka iskaa wax u qabso ah iyo in la dhimo kharashka la xidhiidha bixinta gaadiidka.

Sidee u shaqeysaa?
Haddii aad u qalanto, waa inaad aqoonsataa qof diyaar u ah inuu darawal kuu noqdo. (Waxaad yeelan kartaa wax ka badan hal darawal.)
Waxaad la socotaa safarradaada iyo mayliyada lagu wado si laguu qaado.
Dhammaadka bisha, waxaad gudbisaa xogtaada.
Waanu kuu soo celinaynaa (ilaa inta maalgelin la heli karo), ka dibna waxaad dib u soo celinaysaa darawaliintaada.
*Lacagta dib-u-celinta waxaa lagu bixin doonaa dhigaal toos ah; cadadka lacag celinta si toos ah ayaa loogu shubi doonaa akoonkaaga bangiga. Jeegaga warqadda lama isticmaali doono. Si aad u hesho lacag celin, WAA INAAD bixisa lambarka akoontiga bangiga.
Waxaa laga yaabaa inaad u qalanto haddii aad:
Waa naafo, tabar daran, ama aan awoodin in uu baabuur wado;
Aan awoodin inay isticmaalaan noocyada kale ee gaadiidka (sida basaska)
Ku noolow degmada San Bernardino ee miyiga, buuraha, ama bulshooyinka saxaraha ah
Kuwa isticmaalaya TRIP isku mar ma wada isticmaali karaan adeega VVTA Direct Access, kaas oo ah adeega paratransit ADA oo dhameystiraya
paratransit_42_description:
Kaabaya adeega baska dariiqa go'an, VVTA waxa ay bixisaa xayn qiimo jaban si loo xakameeyo adeega shaqsiyaadka buuxiya shuruudaha Sharciga Naafada Maraykanka (ADA) lana shahaado. Boos qabsigu waa in la sameeyaa ugu yaraan 24 saacadood ka hor, qiimahana waxaa lagu go'aamiyaa aagga safarka uu ka yimid iyo meesha uu u socdo.
Sharciga Naafada Mareykanka (ADA) wuxuu hubinayaa in dadka naafada ah ay helaan "fursadaha adeegga gaadiidka dadweynaha ee qof kasta oo kale uu helo." Kuwa helay shahaadada ADA, VVTA Direct Access waxay siisaa adeegyada baska sida dariiqa ugu dambeeya ee adeegyadeeda baska ee la awoodi karo.
Boos qabsi waxa la samayn karaa laga bilaabo 1 maalin ilaa 14 maalmood ka hor.
Booqashooyinka waxaa la qaadaa 8 subaxnimo ilaa 5 galabnimo Isniinta - Axada. ( Boos celinta la dhigay Axadda waa la duubi doonaa waxaana la xaqiijin doonaa Isniinta soo socota.)
Adeegaha daryeelka shakhsi ahaaneed ee diiwaangashan ayaa ku raaci kara bilaash.
VVTA iyo Helitaanka Tooska ah waxay dhawraan fasaxyo isku mid ah.
Wehel kastaa wuxuu bixiyaa lacag gelitaanka tooska ah.
Saxaabadu waa in aanay barakicin raacayaasha Gelitaanka Tooska ah.
Riders la aqoonsan yahay ayaa wici kara (760) 244-4000 si ay boos celis u sameeyaan.
Boos celin ayaa la qabtaa Isniin-Axad 8 subaxnimo-5 galabnimo
Ka hor intaysan rakaabku bilaabin isticmaalka adeegga tooska ah ee VVTA, shahaadada u-qalmitaanka ADA ayaa loo baahan yahay. Si aad u bilowdo nidaamka codsiga u-qalmitaanka, guji halkan ama wac 1-877-ADA-RIDE.
Tababarka Safarka Shakhsi ahaaneed waxa kale oo diyaar u ah dhammaan kuwa danaynaya inay helaan kalsooni dheeraad ah marka ay baska raacayaan.
 Wehel kastaa wuxuu bixiyaa lacag gelitaanka tooska ah.
transit_263_description:
Barnaamijka GoSmart waa barnaamij qiimo dhimis ah kaas oo Omnitrans ay kala xaajooto qiimaha ururada ay wada shaqaynta leeyihiin. ... Ardeyda horay ugu sii qalmatay adeegga OmniAccess ADA waxay helayaan qiimo dhimis 20% ah iibsashada tigidhada qiimaha saldhigga ah ee Access one way. Ardayga waa in si firfircoon looga diiwaan galiyo hal ama in ka badan si uu ugu qalmo.

Waa inuu haystaa Kaarka Aqoonsiga Ardayga oo firfircoon
Waa in uu hadda ka diiwaan gashan yahay Jaamacadda Gobolka California ee San Bernardino, Kulliyadda San Bernardino Valley, Chaffey College ama Crafton Hills College

Adeegga basku wuxuu shaqeeyaa todobada maalmood ee usbuuca, sida ugu horaysa 3:45 subaxnimo iyo ilaa 11pm iyadoo ku xidhan jidka
transportationagency_153_description:
Gaadhitaanku waa jid-ka-jiro-jiid-raac la wadaago Gaadiidka adeegga. Adeegga raacitaanka wadaagga ah wakhtigaaga socdaalku wuxuu la mid noqon doonaa kan baska-jidka-go'an, ma aha baabuur ama taksi.
Haddii aad tahay macmiil Access oo ka diiwaan gashan oo aad u baahan tahay inaad ballan samaysato safar:
TOLL FREE:1800-883-1295
Toos:(213)-488-1748
Si aad u noqoto macmiil Access ka diiwaan gashan:
TOLL FREE:1800-827-1359
Lacagtaada hal-jidka ah waxay ku salaysan tahay masaafada aad ku safarto ugu badnaan $3.50 (marka laga reebo ka/ka yimid iyo gudaha Antelope iyo Santa Clarita Valleys).
MUHIIM: Gelitaanku waxa laga yaabaa in aanay awoodin in lagu qaado kursiga curyaanka ama qalabka dhaqdhaqaaqa ka weyn 30"ballaaran iyo 48" dheer oo miisaankiisu ka badan yahay 600 rodol marka la qabsado. Si aad u noqoto macmiil Access diiwaangashan.

BARNAAMIJKA RIDKA (Taksi ama Lyft)
Waxay ku siisaa ciyaar bille ah iyadoo loo marayo kaadhka deynta waayeelka xaqa u leh iyo shakhsiyaadka naafada ah ee isticmaala tagaasida dhaqameed ama adeegyada Lyft si ay u tagaan ballamaha, shaqada, socodsiinta hawlaha iyo safarrada kale.

YAA U QARAN?
Waayeelka (62+) iyo shakhsiyaadka naafada ah ee deggan

transportationagency_185_description:
InnovAge waxay ku siisaa gaadiid laga soo qaado gurigaaga oo taga xarunta PACE iyo ballamaha caafimaadka ee goobta ka baxsan.
Laga soo bilaabo wakhtiga ka qaybgalayaasha lagu soo qaaday guriga ilaa wakhtiga loo galbiyay xarunta InnovAge PACE, waxa ku hareeraysan dadka PACE ka qaybqaatayaasha boodhadhka InnovAge baska kuwaas oo ixtiraamaya oo ku dhiirigeliya inay ka faa'iidaystaan khibradooda PACE.

Darawalada InnovAge aad bay u tababaran yihiin waana xubno muhiim ah oo ka tirsan kooxdaada daryeelka. Darawaladayada xirfada leh ayaa dawooyin iyo sahayda caafimaadka geeyaan gurigaaga. Way ku baran doonaan waxayna kaa caawinayaan inay hubiyaan inaad haysato wax kasta oo aad u baahan tahay maalintaada xarunta ama ballantaada caafimaad.
paratransit_258_description: Waxay siisaa safar badbaado leh, badbaado leh carruurta guriga, dugsiga, xarunta xannaanada, ama daawaynta gudaha San Clemente.
transportationagency_184_description: Xarun sare oo magaaladu maamusho oo bixisa adeegyo caafimaad iyo fursado madadaalo dadka waaweyn.

Waxay siisaa gaadiid jaban dhammaan dadka waaweyn ee Irvine kuwaas oo aan awoodin inay kaxeeyaan sababtoo ah naafo jireed ama garasho. Gaadiidka waxaa lagu bixin karaa gudaha magaalada Irvine iyo magaalooyinka ku xeeran. Da'da loo adeegay waa 18 sano iyo ka weyn. Codsiga waa in la buuxiyaa ka hor isticmaalka TRIPS. Wac si aad u hesho macluumaad faahfaahsan.

paratransit_123_description:
Waxay siisaa gaadiid bilaa kharash ah waayeelka San Clemente si ay u doortaan dukaamada raashinka iyo Xarunta Sare ee San Clemente. U qalmida waa 60 sano iyo ka weyn. Waa in uu degan yahay San Clemente. Codsiyada ayaa loo baahan yahay Safarrada waxaa lagu bixiyaa qoondo saddex saacadood ah.

Waayeellada deggan San Clemente waxaa laga soo qaadi doonaa guryahooda subaxda inta u dhaxaysa saacadaha 8:00 subaxnimo iyo 9:30 subaxnimo waxaana loo qaadi doonaa xarunta. Waayeelka waxa la siiyaa safar ka soo noqosho ah oo ay kaga imanayaan xarunta sare ilaa guryahooda San Clemente inta u dhaxaysa saacadaha 1:00 galabnimo iyo 2:30 duhurnimo.
paratransit_257_description: Waxay siisaa gaadiid lagu tago dukaamada tafaariiqda, goobaha qurxinta, maktabadaha, iyo baayacmushtarka maxalliga ah oo u jira 10-mayl rafaadka guryaha dadka waaweyn ee Brea. Balamo ayaa loo baahan yahay. Codsiga baabuurka waa in la qorsheeyaa 3 maalmood oo shaqo ka hor (Arbaca ka horreysa taariikhda adeegga Isniinta).

transportationagency_37_description:
Xarunta Sare ee Chino waxay ku taal bartamaha ka soo horjeedka Hoolka Magaalada oo u dhow Maktabadda Chino.

Xaruntu waxay bixisaa hawlo kala duwan, barnaamijyo, safarro, iyo adeegyo bulshada waayeelka ah, 50 sano iyo ka weyn.

Meeshu waa meel ay ka dhacaan farxad diiran, sheeko saaxiibtinimo, iyo munaasabado bulsho.

Ka qaybgalayaasha Xarunta Sare waxay marin u heli karaan shaybaadhka kombiyuutarka, qolka billiards, maktabad, qolalka jimicsiga iyo qadada maalinlaha ah. Qadada waxaa la bixiyaa 11:30 a.m. Waxaa jira deeq la soo jeediyay oo ah $3 qofkiiba da'da 60 iyo ka weyn iyo $6 qofkiiba da'da 60 sano iyo ka yar.
paratransit_108_description:
Waxay siisaa boonooyin socdaal caafimaad oo aan degdeg ahayn dadka waaweyn ee ku nool gudaha Laguna Woods oo keliya. Foojarrada safarka waxay badbaadiyaan dadka deggan inta u dhaxaysa 50% iyo 87% kharashka safarrada tagaasida ee ka bilaabmaya ama ku dhammaanaya Laguna Woods ilaa ama ka imanaya ballamaha caafimaadka xarun kasta oo ku taal Orange County ama Isbitaalka Long Beach Veterans Hospital. U-qalmitaanka waa 60 sano iyo ka weyn waana inuu ahaadaa degane Laguna Woods. Dukumeentiyada loo baahan yahay waa caddaynta deganaanshaha gudaha xadka magaalada iyo aqoonsiga dawladda. Wac macluumaad faahfaahsan oo ku saabsan habka codsiga.

Kharashyada Barnaamijka:
Kharashyadu way kala duwan yihiin. Lacagaha waxa lagu bixin karaa lacag caddaan ah ama jeeg kaliya.

paratransit_88_description: Barnaamijka Community Van wuxuu bixiyaa 6-rakaab iyo 12-rakaab ah oo loogu talagalay raacitaanka horay loo qorsheeyay -- hal mar ama mid soo noqnoqda -- oo ku lug leh ugu yaraan laba rakaab ah iyo darawal tabaruc ah. Goobaha safarku waxay ahaan karaan meel kasta oo baabuur laba saacadood ah u jirta Kirkland waxayna dhici kartaa inta lagu jiro maalinta, fiidkii, iyo maalmaha fasaxa ah. Tani waa hab ay xubnaha bulshadu u qorsheeyaan safarada la habeeyey marka adeega baska aanu dabooli karin baahidooda. Ka faa'iidayso Community Van safarrada garoonka, ballamaha, hawl-qabadka, iyo bannaanbaxyada! Sidoo kale fadlan tixgeli inaad saxiixdo inaad noqoto darawal tabaruc ah
paratransit_78_description: Barnaamijkeena Community Van waxa uu siiya baabuurka safarada horay loo sii qorsheeyay-darawal ahaan ama rakaab ahaan. Horey u sii qorshee safarkaaga ama si iskaa wax u qabso ah u wado deriskaaga ama qoyskaaga. Booqo shabakada Community Van si aad u hesho macluumaadka iyo lambarada lagala xidhiidho goob kasta oo adeeg ah, iyo macluumaadka ku saabsan gelitaanka iyo u-qalmitaanka.

Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (65+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan Magaalada Glendale. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeega, booqo website-ka ama wac 818-548-3960 si aad u hesho faahfaahinta codsiga. Isticmaalayaasha diiwaangashan waxay kaydsan karaan raacitaanka iyagoo wacaya 818-247-0691. Waxaa laga yaabaa in baabuurka la qorsheeyo ilaa laba toddobaad ka hor, laakiin aan ka yarayn 24 saacadood ka hor.
taxi_259_description:
Waxay siisaa adeegyada gaadiidka dadka waaweyn ee ku nool magaalada Lake Forest. Adeegga gaadiidka waxa lagu bixiyaa Ingiriis oo keliya. U qalmida waa 60 sano iyo ka weyn, waa in uu ahaado qof degan harada Lake Forest, waana in aanu wadan ama lahayn baabuur. Wac si aad u hesho macluumaad faahfaahsan oo ku saabsan habka codsiga ama booqo website-ka si aad u codsato kaarka aqoonsiga Taxi Kadib markaad codsato kaarka aqoonsiga Barnaamijka Taxi, waxay qaadan doontaa ilaa 7 maalmood oo shaqo in la helo kaarka. Marka la helo Kaarka Aqoonsiga Taxiga, darawalka waxaa si toos ah loogu bixin karaa lacag caddaan ah ama kaarka deynta. Dukumentiyada loo baahan yahay waa caddaynta deganaanshaha gudaha Lake Forest, caddaynta da'da, iyo shatiga darawalnimada hadda.

Kharashyada Barnaamijka:
$1.50 foojar tagsi hal jid ah oo ku socda ama ka imanaya Senior Scene Clubhouse ama Beerta Isboortiga ee Lake Forest iyo Xarunta Madadaalada
$3 foojar hal jid ah gudaha magaalada Lake Forest waxay xadidaysaa balamaha caafimaadka ee aan degdega ahayn, qaadashada daawooyinka, isdhexgalka, filimada, iwm.
$7 hal waddo oo lagu tago ama looga yimaado Isbitaalka Saddleback Memorial, Khabiirka Lafaha ee Degmada Koonfur, Isbitaalka Kaiser ee Irvine, Hoag Hospital ee Irvine, ama Isbitaalka Mission Viejo ee ballamaha caafimaadka ee aan degdega ahayn

paratransit_234_description: Barnaamijka Gaadiidka Sare (55+) waxaa loogu talagalay in lagu daboolo baahiyaha gaadiidka ee waayeelka iyo naafada ee Bulshada Redlands. Wixii macluumaad dheeraad ah wac (909) 798-7579. Adeeggu wuxuu ku salaysan yahay boos celin-kaliya. Boos qabsi waa in la sameeyaa 48 saacadood ka hor.
