paratransit_233_description: InnovAge's Program ee Daryeelka Loo Dhanyahay ee Waayeelka (PACE) waa beddelka xarumaha kalkaalinta. Waayeelka (55+) waxay ku helaan daryeel caafimaad iyo taageero bulsho oo u dhow xarunta PACE. InnovAge waxay ku siisaa gaadiid laga soo qaado gurigaaga ilaa xarunta PACE iyo ballamaha caafimaadka ee goobta ka baxsan. Darawalada InnovAge aad bay u tababaran yihiin waana xubno muhiim ah oo ka tirsan kooxdaada daryeelka. Darawaladayada xirfada leh ayaa dawooyin iyo sahay caafimaad ku keena gurigaaga. Way ku baran doonaan waxayna kaa caawinayaan inay hubiyaan inaad haysato wax kasta oo aad u baahan tahay maalintaada xarunta ama ballantaada caafimaad.
paratransit_225_description: Santa Clarita Dial-a-Ride - Dadweynaha Guud waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku salaysan boos sii qabsi hore. Adeegani waxa uu gaadiid siiya dhamaan dadka degan Magaalada Santa Clarita. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeega, booqo website-ka ama wac 661-294-9327 si aad u hesho faahfaahinta codsiga. Isticmaalayaasha diiwaangashan waxay kaydsan karaan raacitaanka iyagoo wacaya 661-294-9327 inta u dhaxaysa saacadaha 6:00 subaxnimo iyo 6:00 galabnimo, Isniinta ilaa Jimcaha. Baadhitaannada waxaa la sii hayn karaa hal ilaa toddobo maalmood ka hor.
paratransit_253_description:
TABABBARKA SAFARADA
Barnaamijka Tababarka Safarku wuxuu bixiyaa kaalmo-hal-hal ama kooxeed waayeelka (da'da 62+) iyo shakhsiyaadka naafada ah barashada sida loo raaco nidaamka baska Omnitrans markii ugu horeysay. Barnaamijku waa bilaash in laga qaybqaato, waxaana diyaar u ah dadka da'da ah (da'da 62+) iyo shakhsiyaadka naafada ah ee deggan aagga adeegga Omnitrans. Barnaamijka Tababarka Safarku waxa uu siinayaa ka qaybgalayaasha macluumaadka iyo xirfadaha ay ku raacaan baska si kalsooni leh oo ay uga faa'iidaystaan faa'iidooyinka.

MAXAAN KA BARAN DOONAA?
Tababarka Safarku waxa uu bixiyaa caawimo habaysan oo ku salaysan baahiyaha gaarka ah ee ka qaybgale kasta, taas oo u ogolaanaysa inay bartaan xirfadaha looga baahan yahay inay si badbaado leh oo raaxo leh ugu safraan gaadiidka dadweynaha. Inta lagu jiro tababarka, waxaad baran doontaa sida loo:
- Aqoonso waddooyinka, joogsiyada baska, iyo calaamadaha
Isticmaal buug baska oo qorshee safar
Si badbaado leh uga soo deg oo uga soo deg boosteejooyinka baska
-La xidhiidh wadayaasha baska
-Bixi qiimaha oo iibso kaadhadhka
-U fuul, raac, oo baska uga bax si nabad ah
-U wareeji basaska kale
-U socdaalo meelo kala duwan oo bulshada dhexdeeda ah

XAGEE U SAFRI KARAA?
Tababarayaasha safarku waxay ku tusi karaan sidaad ugu safri lahayd xarumaha caafimaadka, suuqyada laga dukaameysto, xarumaha waayeelka, dugsiga, shaqada, ama aad u booqato qoyska iyo asxaabta. Tababarahaagu wuxuu samayn doonaa qorshe tababar oo ku salaysan meelaha aad jeceshahay inaad u safarto.

SIDEE ISKU DIIWAAN KARAA?
Kala xidhiidh Adeegyada Gaadiidka Gaarka ah (909) 379-7341 ama ctsa@omnitrans.org si aad isu diiwaangeliso barnaamijka.
transportationagency_228_description: Urur gaadiid oo faa'iido doon ah oo leh in ka badan 70 basas tababareyaal ah, charter, iyo shuttles gudaha Degmada Ventura.
paratransit_2_description:
ADEEGGA HELIDDA: Waxay siisaa adeegyada gaadiidka ka-horjeeda ee dadka naafada ah ee aan isticmaali karin baska waddada go'an ee Omnitrans. Gelitaanku waa boos sii qabsi hore, adeeg raacid la wadaago. Waqtiyada soo qaadista waxaa lagu balamay 40-daqiiqo gudahood.

Waxaa jira nidaam codsi. Raad raacayaashu waa in la diwaan galiyo oo ay la kulmaan shuruudaha u-qalmitaanka paratransit ADA:
Waa inuu keenaa Aqoonsiga ADA Shahaadaysan ee ay bixiso Omnitrans wakhtiga adeega
transportationagency_218_description:
Xarunta Sare ee Beesha Fontana waxaa loogu talagalay inay wax siiso xubnaha bulshada ee jira 55 sano iyo wixii ka weyn. Gudahan quruxda badan ee laba dabaq ah, 43,000 oo lagu daray xarunta cag labajibbaaran, waxa jira qolal badan oo buuxiya oo ka sarreeya baahiyaha waayeelka Fontana halkaas oo bulshada waayeelka ahi ay uga qayb qaadan karto fasallada iyo nashaadaadka, iyo sidoo kale qolalka madadaalada sida:
Qolka farshaxanka iyo farshaxanka
gallery farshaxan
Qolalka cashada iyo shirarka
Qolka Billiards iyo qolka kaadhka
Shaybaadhka kumbuyuutarka iyo masraxa dhijitaalka ah
Maktabadda iyo meelaha la fadhiisto
Xarunta jimicsiga
Sariiraha
Cunta fudud
Salon quruxda
paratransit_265_description:
sbX Adeegga Gaadiidka Degdegga ah
Waxay siisaa adeeg rakaab oo degdeg ah meelaha waaweyn ee magaalooyinka San Bernardino iyo Loma Linda. VA Cisbitaalka joogsi waa la heli karaa.

wuxuu sbX Khadka Cagaaran wuxuu ku socdaa waddo 15.7 mayl ah oo ku taal Waddada E Street, laga bilaabo Cal State University San Bernardino ee waqooyiga ilaa Jaamacadda Loma Linda & Xarunta Caafimaadka ee koonfurta. Adeeggu waa maalmaha shaqada iyo Sabtida. Adeegga maalinlaha ah wuxuu shaqeeyaa 10kii daqiqo kasta inta lagu jiro saacadaha ugu sarreeya iyo 15-kii daqiqo kasta inta lagu jiro saacadaha shaqada ka baxsan. Wakhtiga ugu badan ee maalmaha shaqada ee dhanka waqooyi waa laga bilaabo 6:00 AM ilaa 9:00 subaxnimo iyo laga bilaabo 3:00 P.M. ilaa 6:00 galabnimo Muddada ugu sarraysa ee maalmaha shaqada ee koonfur-galbeed waa laga bilaabo 6:00 AM ilaa 9:00 subaxnimo laga bilaabo 2:00 duhurnimo ilaa 6:00 galabnimo Adeegga Sabtida waxa uu socdaa 20 daqiiqo kasta.
paratransit_145_description:
Barnaamijka waxaa loo sameeyay si loo siiyo waayeelka helida balamo caafimaad oo aan degdeg ahayn oo ay ku jiraan laakiin aan ku xaddidnayn sifeynta, daawaynta, dhakhtarka ilkaha, soo-qaadista dhakhtar qoray, shaybaadhka shaybaarka, raajooyinka, iwm.

Shuruudaha Adeegga:
Buuxi foom codsi ah oo fudud oo ku soo celi boostada ama fakis si aad u hesho lambarkaaga aqoonsiga.
Gaadiidka waa in la qorsheeyey ugu yaraan 5 maalmood ka hor. Wacitaanka 5 maalmood ka hor ma dammaanad qaadayso ballan. Balamo isla maalinta ah waxay ku xiran tahay helitaanka.
paratransit_243_description:
TREP waa adeeg gaadiid magdhow ah oo masruufka ah oo bogaadinaya gaadiidka dadweynaha. Dareewalada iskaa wax u qabso ah ayaa u qaadi doona waayeelka, dadka naafada ah, dadka dakhligoodu yar yahay iyo kuwa xaddidan iyo sidoo kale dadka kale ee nugul adeegyada caafimaadka, dukaamaysiga, bangiyada iyo meelo kale oo muhiim ah.

MBTA waxay ku dadaalaysaa inay sii wado bixinta marinka iyo dhaqdhaqaaqa dadka deggan Morongo Basin. Barnaamijka Booqashada Dib-u-celinta Gaadiidka (TREP) waxay siisaa dhiirigelin darawaliinta iskaa wax u qabso ah si ay u caawiyaan shakhsiyaadka xaqa u leh ee aan awoodin inay galaan gaadiidka dadweynaha ama wadista iyagoo siinaya lagama maarmaan, gaadiid la galbiyay.
Ka qaybqaatayaasha waxay helayaan lacag ay ku soo celiyaan darawalka iskaa wax u qabso ah oo ay u dhimaan kharashaadka la xidhiidha bixinta doorashadan gaadiidka.

SIDEE BARNAAMIJKU U SHAQEEYAA?
Haddii aad u qalanto, waa inaad aqoonsataa qof diyaar u ah inuu darawal kuu noqdo (haa, waxaad yeelan kartaa wax ka badan hal darawal).
 Waxaad la socotaa safarradaada iyo maylalka lagu wado in lagu qaado
 Dhamaadka bisha, waxaad soo gudbisaa xogtaada.
 Waanu kuu soo celinaynaa (ilaa inta maalgelin la heli karo), ka dibna waxaad dib u soo celinaysaa darawaladaada.
 Waxaan bixinaa .25 senti halkii mile, ugu badnaan 250 mayl bishii
Ma u qalmaa?
Shaqaalaha go'aaminta xaq u yeelashada ayaa go'aamin doona inaad u qalanto iyo in kale. Waxaa laga yaabaa inaad u qalanto haddii aad:

 Waa naafo, tabar daran, ama aan awoodin in uu baabuur wado
 Aan awoodin isticmaalka noocyada kale ee gaadiidka (Adeegyada MBTA); iyo
 Ku noolow deegaanka miyiga ee Degmada San Bernardino ee ku dhexyaala Morongo Basin (ay ku jirto Johnson Valley, Pioneertown, Wonder Valley)
 Kuwa isticmaala TREP isku mar isku mar ma wada isticmaali karaan MBTA Ready Ride, kaas oo ah adeegga jawaabta dalabka ee ADA
transportationagency_179_description: Peppermint Ridge waxay siisaa nolol la degganaansho adeegyo taageero oo loogu talagalay shakhsiyaadka qaba naafo maskaxeed iyo korriin, oo ku hagta dadka deggan madaxbannaani weyn iyo ka-qaybgal bulsho oo buuxda. Barnaamijkani waxa uu caawiyaa shakhsiyaadka awooda in ay iskood u noolaadaan laakiin ka faa'iidaysta hagida marka ay horumariyaan xirfadahooda nololeed ee madaxa banaan. Tababaruhu wuxuu la shaqeeyaa 1: 1 shakhsiga si loo xoojiyo aqoonta maareynta lacagta, xiriirka dadka dhexdooda, helitaanka gaadiidka, dhamaystirka hawlaha guriga, iwm.
paratransit_102_description:
Waxay siisaa qado dadka waaweyn ee ku jira goob la isugu yimaado. Gaadiidka barnaamijka cuntada waxa la siin karaa dadka degan Tustin ee u qalma.

Kharashyada Barnaamijka:
$3 deeq ah ayaa la codsaday shaqsiyaadka da'doodu tahay 60 sano iyo wixii ka weyn
$5 khidmad dadka da'doodu ka yar tahay 60 sano
confirm_remove_trip: Ma hubtaa inaad doonayso inaad ka saarto safarkan?
paratransit_242_description:
Adeegga Gaadiidka Veterans (VTS) waa barnaamij VA loogu talagalay in lagu kordhiyo helitaanka daryeelka caafimaad ee ay maalgeliso VA iyada oo loo marayo gaadiid. Si ka duwan shuruudaha u-qalmitaanka safarka ee la xidhiidha gaadiidka lagu soo celiyo Safarka Ka faa'iidaystayaasha, VTS ma laha wax shuruudo ah oo u-qalmitaanka ah marka laga reebo Halyeeyga u baahan gaadiid daaweyn caafimaad iyo ballan caafimaad oo VA ah.

VTS waxay u shaqeysaa sida soo socota:

Saacadaha Xafiiska: 5 subaxnimo ilaa 9:30 galabnimo, Isniin ilaa Jimce
Boos sii qabsi ayaa loo baahan yahay oo la qorsheeyay iyadoo ku saleysan baahida
Hayso raacitaankaaga isla marka aad samaysato ballantaada caafimaad oo aan ka dambayn afar maalmood oo shaqo ka hor
Wakhtiga soo qaadida ee la qorsheeyay waxa laga yaabaa in uu aad uga soo horreeyo marka la codsado si aad u daboosho Askarta kale ee loo adeegayo.
Wadayaasha baabuurtu waa inay awood u yeeshaan inay baabuurtooda ku baarkin karaan meel nabdoon oo aan xannibayn ama xannibayn gaadiidka, waxay u oggolaatay wadayaasha inuu ilaaliyo aragga baabuurka mar kasta oo leh waddo la geli karo
Waxa aad u baahan tahay inaad ogaato:

Halyeeyga kale ayaa la wadaaga raacitaanka
Baabuurtu waxay u socdaali karaan dhowr jiho inta lagu jiro safarkaaga oo waxay istaagi karaan si ay ugu adeegaan halyeeyada kale
Waqtiga safarku wuu kala duwanaan doonaa iyadoo lagu saleynayo masaafada safarka, xaaladaha gaadiidka iyo askarta kale ee loo adeegayo
Fadlan u diyaargaroobo inaad baxdo wakhtiga laguu qorsheeyay
Halyeeyada waxa lagula talinayaa in ay keenaan daawooyin iyo cabbitaan/cunto fudud oo ku filan sida loo baahan karo maalinta oo dhan
paratransit_241_description:
Barnaamijka Gaadiidka
ADEEGYADA GAADIIDKA LIFT waxay bixisaa gaadiid aan degdeg ahayn oo bilaash ah oo lagu tago ballamaha caafimaadka dooxada oo dhan. Vans waa kursi curyaan oo la heli karo; adeegyadu waxay ku kooban yihiin bukaanka iyo daryeelaha. Fadhi badbaadada carruurta da'da ku habboon waa in la siiyaa carruurta. Adeegyadu waa ballan la qorsheeyay oo keliya.

Si aad u ballansato gaadiidka, naga soo wac 760.366.LIFT (760.366.5438) ama iimayl u soo dir Transportation@MBHDistrict.org

Mu'asasadu waxay raadinaysaa inay iibsato baabuur dheeraad ah si ay u balaariso adeegyada gaadiidka ee ka jira gudaha Morongo Basin, iyo inay siiso gaadiid bukaanada u safra dooxada Coachella si loogu daweeyo ama daryeel heer sare ah.
paratransit_240_description:
Waxaan bixinaa gaadiid guri-ila- albaab ah oo ballamaha caafimaadka, fadhiyada daawaynta iyo daawaynta baxnaaninta oo ay ku jiraan: Sifaynta, Chemotherapy, Bedelka xarumaha dhexdooda, booqashooyinka qalliinka ka dib, gaadiidka sare, caafimaadka dabeecadda, booqashooyinka dhakhaatiirta caadiga ah, Stroke & adeegyada baxnaaninta, maalinta qaangaarka adeegyada daryeelka iyo qaar kaloo badan.
Waxaan bixinaa adeeg isla maalin ah ama horay loo qorsheeyay
Waxaan aqbalnaa caymisyada intooda badan, kaararka deynta
iyo lacagaha gaarka ah.
paratransit_239_description:
Adeegyada Gaadiid La Heli Karo ee Kursiga Curyaanka
Ballamo Caafimaad oo Aan Degdeg ahayn iyo Baahiyaha Shaqsiyeed ee Maalinlaha ah
Qiimayaashu way kala duwan yihiin iyadoo loo eegayo nooca adeegyada, saacadaha adeegyada, masaafada iyo doorsoomayaasha kale.
Fursadaha Lacag-bixinta: Visa ~ MasterCard ~ Soo saar ~ Debit ~ Lacag caddaan ah
Fadlan horay u sii ballanso ballanta gaadhiga daryeelka haddii ay suurtogal tahay. Adeeg isku maalin ah ayaa la heli karaa marka jadwalku ogolaado.
paratransit_10_description:
Iyadoo la ilaalinayo himiladeena, Care Connexxus, Inc. waxay siisaa adeegyo maalinle ah oo kala duwan oo loogu talagalay dadka waaweyn ee maskax ahaan, jir ahaan, ama bulsho ahaan naafada ka ah oo u baahan in laga caawiyo hawlaha nolol maalmeedka, laakiin aan u baahnayn daryeel kalkaalin waqti buuxa ah. . Care Connexxus, Inc. waxay ku takhasustay daryeelka dadka waaweyn ee qaba cudurka Alzheimers iyo Dementia ama noocyada kale ee xusuusta daciifka ah. Waxaan si sharaf leh u aqbalnaa caymiska Medi-Cal iyo VA.

Wakaaladu waxay ka shaqeysaa laba xarumood oo shati leh oo adeega maalinta dadka waaweyn ah, mid ku taal Magaalada Riverside oo u adeegta bulshooyinka Riverside, Jurupa, Moreno Valley iyo nawaaxigeeda. Annagu ma sii haysanno xarun ku taal Sun City-Menifee, si kastaba ha ahaatee, waxaan bixinaa gaadiid maalinle ah oo taga kana soo baxa Xaruntayada Riverside
transportationagency_28_description: Care Connexxus waxay kaliya siisaa adeegyada gaadiidka macaamiisha ka diiwaangashan barnaamijkooda daryeelka caafimaadka maalinta dadka waaweyn
transportationagency_29_description: Adeegga basaska sare waa adeeg gaadiid guri-ilaa- albaab u gaar ah oo ay heli karaan dhammaan waayeelka deggan Norco 50 sano iyo wixii ka weyn, dagaalyahannada Norco degganaa oo awood leh 50 jir iyo ka weyn, iyo dadka deggan Norco ee da' kasta ah. Gaadhigu waxa uu ku qaadaa dadka degan masaafo 30-mile ah oo ka baxsan xadka magaalada Norco si ay u iibsadaan raashinka lagama maarmaanka ah, booqashooyinka caafimaadka, helitaanka warqadaha daawoyinka, bixinta biilasha, adeegyada boostada, bangiyada, iyo si ay ugu tagaan ugana yimaadaan Xarunta Sare ee Rose M. Eldridge ee hawl maalmeedka.
paratransit_237_description:
Kharashka Dib-u-celinta Gaadiidka iyo Barnaamijka Galbinta (TREP) waxaa maamula Waaxda Adeegyada Dadka Waaweyn iyo Waayeelka ee Degmada San Bernardino (DAAS). DAAS waxay qabanqaabin doontaa lacag-celinta safarrada xaqa loo leeyahay iyada oo loo marayo Sanduuqa Sare iyo Naafada ee San Bernardino Co. (SDF)

TREP waxay ka shaqeysaa 3 degmo:
1- Dooxada Victor
2- Saxaraha Waqooyi iyo.
3-Morongo Basin.
Barnaamijka TREP wuxuu u oggolaanayaa ka qaybgalayaasha xaqa u leh inay helaan magdhowga safarka u qalma. Ka qaybgalayaasha xaqa u leh waxaa lagu soo celiyaa 48 senti halkii mayl. U qalmida waxaa go'aamiya DAAS. Ka qaybqaatayaasha ayaa mas'uul ka ah inay hubiyaan darawalkooda.

paratransit_236_description:
La xidhiidh Xarunta Sare ee James L. Brulte wixii macluumaad dheeraad ah (909) 477-2780; Booqo Xarunta Sare ee James L. Brulte ee 11200 Base Line Road (map) si aad u buuxiso codsiga.

Magaalada Rancho Cucamonga iyo YMCA waxay iska kaashadeen inay gaadiid siiyaan waayeelka degan Rancho Cucamonga iyo 60 sano iyo wixii ka weyn. 15-kan rakaabka ah ee ADA ay ogolaatay ayaa soo qaadi doona waayeelka subaxii, waxa uu geyn doonaa Xarunta Sare ka dibna ku celin doona waayeelka guryahooda galabtii. Waxa jira khidmad sanadle ah oo ah $25.00 wakhtiga diiwaangelinta Xarunta Sare ee James L Brulte.

oneclick.pages.resend_email_confirmation: Si aad dib ugu dirto xaqiijinta iimaylka oo aad u dhamaystirto isdiiwaangalintaada, gali ciwaanka iimaylka Waxaa laguu soo diri doonaa iimayl wata faahfaahinta xaqiijinta cusub.
paratransit_232_description:
Barnaamijka VVTA Regional Vanpool wuxuu u ogolaanayaa kooxaha todoba ama ka badan inay ku safraan ugu yaraan $35 todobaadkii. Vanpool waa ku haboon tahay, raaxo leh, waxayna ku badbaadisaa lacag iyada oo loo marayo kabida ilaa $400 bishii. U-qalmitaanka BARNAAMIJKA
Waddooyinka VVTA Vanpool waa inay bilaabaan ama ku dhammaadaan gudaha Victor Valley iyo gobolka Barstow
Codsadaha VVTA Vanpool waa inuu noqdaa kireystaha gaariga (darawalka koowaad ama rakaabka kale ma codsan karaan)
VVTA Vanpool waa in loo istcimaalaa safarka iyo ka soo noqoshada shaqada
Baabuurta waa in lagu kireeyaa VVTA Vanpool ay ogolaatay wakaalada kiraynta
Baabuurtu waa in ay ilaashadaan ugu yaraan 70% kursiga baabuurka
Baabuurtu waa in ay safraan ugu yaraan 30 mayl safar wareeg ah
Kuraasta la heli karo waa inay ahaadaan kuwo ay dadweynuhu heli karaan
Kireeyaha baabuurka (codsade) iyo darawalka koowaad waa inay ahaadaan tabaruceyaal oo ay ogolaadaan dhammaan shuruudaha iyo shuruudaha VVTA Vanpool
SHURUUDAHA BARNAAMIJKA
Si loo joogteeyo diiwaan gelinta oo loogu qalmo kabka Barnaamijka VVTA Vanpool, vanpools waa inay u hoggaansamaan kuwa soo socda:

Si degdeg ah oo sax ah uga jawaab VVTA Vanpool iyo codsiyada wakiilka kiraynta
U soo gudbi warbixinnada vanpool bishii kasta iVanpool.org
Cusbooneysii wixii isbeddel ah ee jidka, jadwalka, rakaabka, iyo goobta iVanpool.org shan maalmood oo shaqo gudahood
Ilaali ugu yaraan boqolkiiba 70 gaadhiga
U hoggaansan shuruudaha iyo shuruudaha VVTA Vanpool
transportationagency_3_description: Barnaamijka Voucher Taxi wuxuu bixiyaa adeegga tagaasida gudaha dooxada Coachella 50% qiimo dhimis ah kuwa u qalma. Foojarrada tagaasida waxa loo isticmaalaa qiimaha tagsiga oo keliya. Qiimaha waxaa lagu dhejiyaa kaadhka smart

paratransit_56_description: Safarka Riverside County California waa 24saac/7 maalmood asbuucii si gaar ah is-hagidda, masruufka dib u celinta adeegga gaadiidka dadweynaha iyadoo lagu dhiirigelinayo saaxiibada mutadawiciinta iyo deriska si ay u qaadaan dadka waaweyn iyo dadka naafada ah si ay u helaan adeegyo caafimaad iyo ujeedooyin kale oo aan lahayn gaadiid. adeeg ayaa jira ama marka qofku aad u daciif yahay, buko, ama aanu awoodin inuu isticmaalo gaadiidka dadweynaha sababo kale dartood. Rakaabka waxaa la siiyaa gunnada masaafada bilaha ah si loogu isticmaalo socdaalkooda billaha ah.
transportationagency_23_description:
Rakaabku waxay qortaan darawalkooda. Hoyga la heli karo waxay ku xiran tahay cidda
darawalku waa iyo waxa ay isticmaalaan si ay u bixiyaan gaadiidka. Wadayaasha tabaruca
sida caadiga ah la joog qofka fuushanaya mar kasta oo wakhtiga safarka ah.
transportationagency_261_description: Qoyska Rancho Cucamonga & Fontana YMCA waxay leeyihiin barnaamijyo kala duwan oo loogu talagalay kooxo da'o kala duwan leh. Laga soo bilaabo Xannaanada Ilmaha ilaa Gaadiid Sare, waxaanu gacan ka geysanaynaa sidii aanu bulshadeena u ilaalin lahayn firfircooni iyo hawlgelin!
paratransit_228_description: Haddii adiga ama qofka aad jeceshahay aad u baahan tihiin in aad hawl-gashaan, aad tagtaan ballanta dhakhtarka, ama dhacdada qoyska, Daryeel-bixiyeyaashayada si xirfadaysan u tababaran ayaa halkaa kugu wadi kara.
transportationagency_177_description: Waxay bixisaa gaadiid lagu tago balamaha caafimaadka iyo ilkaha, socodsiinta hawlaha, iyo dhacdooyinka qoyska.
paratransit_227_description:
Barnaamijka Dirawalka Tabarucaha ee TRIP ayaa laga yaabaa inuu ku caawiyo.
Rakaabku waxay dooran karaan oo qori karaan darawalkooda iskaa wax u qabso ah asxaabta iyo deriska ay garanayaan oo ay ku kalsoon yihiin.
Gaadiidka waxaa lagu bixiyaa baabuurta tabaruca ee darawalka.
 Dareewalada iskaa wax u qabso ah waxa ay rakaabka ka helaan lacag-celinta masaafada.
Rakaabku waa u bilaash.

paratransit_235_description:
(COVID-19 UPDATE) Gaadiidka ayaa diyaar u ah ballamaha dhakhtarka, safarrada farmashiyaha, iyo booqashooyinka bangiga oo keliya.
Isniin, Talaado,
Khamiista, iyo Jimcaha
laga bilaabo 9:00 subaxnimo - 1:00 galabnimo

balamaha 24 saac gudahood
hore u mari.

Gaadiid albaab-ilaa- albaab ah oo bilaash ah oo loogu talagalay dadka waayeelka ah ee Chino, 50+. Gaadiid ilaa laga soo qaado Xarunta Sare, ballamaha dhakhtarka, dukaamaysiga raashinka, iyo soo qaadashada farmashiyaha ee gudaha xadka magaalada. Safarada soo laabashada waxay bilaabmaan barnaamijka Qadada Xarunta Sare ka dib.
*Codsiga loo baahan yahay*
transportationagency_16_description:
Transit Mountain waxay bixisaa adeegga Dial-a-Ride iyo Fixed Route ee dhammaan miyiga San Bernardino Mountain bulshooyinka Dooxada Bear ee Big Bear, Crestline, Lake Arrowhead, iyo Running Springs.

Bayaanka Aragtida
Ikhtiyaarada gaadiidka aan dadaalka lahayn ee deganayaasha, xoogsatada iyo martida bulshooyinka kala duwan ee Buurta San Bernardino.

Bayaanka Ergada
La shaqee bulshooyinka, ganacsiyada iyo ururada si ay u horumariyaan, u bixiyaan una horumariyaan xalal gaadiid oo cusub oo waara safarka iyo agagaarka buurta San Bernardino.
paratransit_133_description: Adeegyada caafimaadka iyo shaqada ee dadka la nool HIV/Aids. Ballanta waa in uu qorsheeyaa Maamulaha Kiis ama Wakiilka Wakaalada waana in la qorsheeyaa ugu yaraan 48 saacadood ka hor. Ballamaha waxaa la qorsheeyay in marka hore ay yimaadaan waxayna ku saleysan tahay helitaanka waqtiga codsiga.
paratransit_230_description:
Barnaamijka Gaadiidka waxa loo qaabeeyey sidii ka jawaabida dalabka/barnaamij wadaaga Wadaagista ee dadka waayeelka ah ee Fontana (55 iyo ka weyn) iyo deganayaasha caafimaad ahaan naafada ah. Adeegani wuxuu u qaadaa deganayaasha (xuduudaha magaalada gudaheeda)

Xafiisyada Dhakhaatiirta
Fontana Community Senior Center
Isbitaalada
Xarumaha wax iibsiga
Xarumaha Jirdhiska
Macluumaadka gaadiidka, fadlan la xidhiidh (909) 854-5175

Isniinta ilaa Jimcaha 8:00 AM-5:00 galabnimo
paratransit_101_description: Waxay siisaa waxqabadyada madadaalada iyo bulshada ee dadka waaweyn. Sidoo kale waxay bixisaa kombuyuutar dadweyne iyo marin internet. Gaadiidka xarunta waxaa la siin karaa dadka degan Tustin. U qalmida waa 55 sano iyo ka weyn.
paratransit_52_description: Gaadiidka Caafimaadka ee Victorville wuxuu bixiyaa jid-goynta iyo sidoo kale adeegyada gaadiidka albaabka albaabka loogu talagalay ambalaayada, kursiga curyaanka iyo rakaabka gurney. Waxaan ugu horreyn ka hawlgalnaa Los Angeles, Orange, San Bernardino, Riverside iyo Degmooyinka Kern (Magaalada Ridgecrest), 24 saacadood iyo 7 maalmood usbuucii. Waxaan ka soo qaadnaa macaamiisha guryahooda ama guryaha dadka lagu xanaaneeyo daawadooda caafimaad ee socota sida sifeynta, kemotherabi, daawaynta jireed, ballamaha dhakhaatiirta, ama meel kasta oo shirkadahooda caymisku oggolaadaan. Adeegani wuxuu u baahan yahay boos qabsi hore wuxuuna u baahan yahay nidaamka isdiiwaangelinta ka hor inta aan gaadiidka la bixin, fadlan wac 877-777-7153 wixii macluumaad dheeraad ah.
paratransit_141_description: Waxay siisaa qado dadka waaweyn ee ku jira goob la isugu yimaado. Gaadiidka xarunta waxa laga yaabaa in ay heli karaan dadka degan San Clemente ee u qalma.
paratransit_221_description: Tuulada Westlake Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsiyeedka ay maamusho Kun Oaks Transit. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (65+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee deggan Tuulada Westlake. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeega, booqo website-ka ama wac 818-706-1613 si aad u hesho faahfaahinta codsiga. Isticmaalayaasha diiwaangashan waxay kaydsan karaan raacitaanka iyagoo wacaya 805-375-5467. Dhammaan wadayaasha waxaa looga baahan yahay inay kaarka aqoonsiga Dial-a-Ride ka soo qaataan Hoolka Dawladda Hoose. Kaadhku waxa kale oo uu u ogolaadaa isticmaalaha in uu bilaash ku raaco nidaamka Basaska Transit Thousand Oaks.
paratransit_222_description: Dial-a-Ride Peninsula Palos Verdes Peninsula Dial-a-Ride waa xannibaad lagu xakameynayo adeegga tagsiga iyadoo lagu salaynayo boos sii qabsi ay maamusho Palos Verdes Peninsula Transit Agency (PVPTA). Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka waayeelka (62+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan magaalooyinka Rancho Palos Verdes, Palos Verdes Estates, iyo Rolling Hills Estates. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeega, booqo website-ka ama wac 310-544-7108 si aad u hesho faahfaahinta codsiga. Isticmaalayaasha diiwaangashan waxay kaydsan karaan raacitaanka iyagoo wacaya adeegga tagsiga ee 800-400-2924 oo isu aqoonsanaya inaad tahay Palos Verdes Dial-A-Ride ama Dial-A-Lift. Rakaabku waxa laga yaabaa inay sugaan 15-20 daqiiqo si ay u fuulaan. Safarrada ka baxsan Jasiiradda waxay diyaar u yihiin arrimo caafimaad oo keliya lacag dheeraad ah.
paratransit_220_description: West Hollywood Barnaamijka Caawinta Tagaasida waa socdaal gaar ah, ka hor istaagid si loo xakameeyo adeegga tagsiga oo ku salaysan boos sii qabsi hore. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (62+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan Magaalada Galbeedka Hollywood. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeega, wac 310-981-9303 si aad u hesho macluumaadka codsiga. Isticmaalayaasha diiwaangashan waxa la siinayaa kaadhka jiidka kaas oo lagu shuban karo $50 oo taksi ah qiimahiisuna yahay $8. Qiimo kasta oo ka badan hadhaaga kaadhka jiidh ee la heli karo waxa masuul ka ah wadayaasha. Isticmaalayaashu waxay sii haysan karaan raacitaanka iyagoo la xiriiraya mid ka mid ah adeegyada taksiyada ee soo socda: Shirkadda Bell Cab (800-666-6664), Shirkadda Beverly Hills Cab (800-273-6611), Shirkadda Checker Cab (800-300-5007), City Cab (888-248-9222), Shirkadda Madaxa-bannaan ee Cab (800-521-8294), United Independent Cab Company (800-822-8294), ama Yellow Cab (323-808-1000).
paratransit_219_description: Galbeedka Hollywood Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, albaab ilaa albaab ku salaysan boos sii qabsi hore. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (62+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan Magaalada Galbeedka Hollywood. Waxa kale oo la heli karaa adeegga Dial-a-Ride "TLC" kaas oo ay ka shaqeeyaan shaqaale si uu uga caawiyo raacayaasha inay u soo baxaan oo ay ka soo degaan gurigooda oo ay u gudbaan. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeega, booqo website-ka ama wac 800-447-2189 si aad u hesho faahfaahinta codsiga. Isticmaalayaasha diiwaangashan waxay kaydsan karaan raacitaanka iyagoo wacaya 800-447-2189. Ballamaha caafimaadka waxa la samayn karaa ilaa 2 toddobaad ka hor.
oneclick.pages.sign_in.error_messages.la: Kani waa isku daygii ugu dambeeyay ee aad ku gasho ka hor intaan akoonkaaga si ku meel gaar ah loo xidhin. Fadlan xaqiiji isticmaalahaaga iyo eraygaaga sirta ah ka hor intaadan isku dayin mar kale.
paratransit_218_description: Adeegga Inglewood Van waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku salaysan boos sii qabsi hore. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (60+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan magaalooyinka Inglewood, Hawthorne, ama aagga aan la wadaagin ee Lennox. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeega, wac 310-412-4382 si aad u hesho faahfaahinta codsiga. Baadhitaannada waxaa lagu kaydin karaa adigoo wacaya 310-412-4378. Rakaabku waa inay jadwaleeyaan safarada 24 saacadood ka hor.
paratransit_217_description: Inglewood Dial-a-Taxi waa raacid gaar ah, ka hor istaagid si loo xakameeyo adeegga tagaasida oo ku saleysan boos sii qabsi. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (60+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan magaalooyinka Inglewood, Hawthorne, ama agagaarka Lennox. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeega, wac 310-412-4382 si aad u hesho macluumaadka codsiga. Buugaag kuuba waa $5, qiimahooduna waa $30. Kuubboonnada Taxikaab waxa loo isticmaali karaa beddelka $15 ee ugu horreeya ee kharashka safar kasta. Qiimo kasta oo ka badan $15 ayaa mas'uul ka ah darawalka. Isticmaalayaasha diiwaangashan waxay sii haysan karaan raacitaanka iyagoo la xiriiraya mid ka mid ah adeegyada taksiyada soo socda: All Yellow (800-900-0033), United Independent (800-411-0303), ama Yellow Cab (888-200-0011).
paratransit_155_description: Bellflower Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku salaysan boos sii qabsi hore. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (55+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan Magaalada Bellflower. Si aad u codsato raacid, wac 562-865-7433 inta u dhaxaysa 9:00 subaxnimo iyo 5:00 galabnimo, Isniin ilaa Jimce. Codsiyada safarka waa in la xafidaa ugu yaraan 48 saacadood ka hor.
paratransit_192_description: Beverly Hills Taxi Coupon Program waa raacid gaar ah, oo lagu xakameynayo adeega tagaasida oo ku saleysan boos sii qabsi. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (62+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan Magaalada Beverly Hills. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeega, wac 310-981-9318 si aad u hesho macluumaadka codsiga. Kaadhadhka dabacasaha ee dib loo rari karo waxa la rari karaa bishiiba iyadoo wata ilaa $24 oo taksi ah $6. Ugu badnaan $12.00 ayaa laga yaabaa in la isticmaalo taksi kasta. Isticmaalayaasha diiwaangashan waxay sii haysan karaan raacitaanka iyagoo la xiriiraya mid ka mid ah adeegyada taksiyada ee soo socda: Beverly Hills Cab (800-273-6611), Taxi Madaxbanaan (800-521-8294), ama United Independent Taxi (800-822-8294).
paratransit_216_description: Go West Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga iyadoo lagu saleynayo boos sii qabsi hore. paratransit_215_description: Walnut Way Dial-a-Cab waa fuulid gaar ah, ka hor istaaga si loo xakameeyo adeegga tagsiga oo ku salaysan boos sii qabsi hore. paratransit_213_description: La Puente Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi. paratransit_212_description: La Habra Heights Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (60+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan Magaalada La Habra Heights. Si aad isaga diiwaan geliso adeega, booqo website-ka ama wac 562-694-6302 si aad u hesho faahfaahinta codsiga. Baadhitaannada waxaa lagu kaydin karaa adigoo wacaya 562-698-3013. Boos celinta waxaa la aqbalayaa todoba maalmood ka hor ilaa 6:00 galabnimo maalinta ka horeysa safarkaaga. Waxaa lagu talinayaa in la jadwaleeyo baabuurka ugu yaraan laba maalmood ka hor wakhtiga.
paratransit_214_description: Paramount Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga iyadoo lagu saleynayo boos sii qabsi hore. paratransit_211_description: La Caada Flintridge Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, adeega albaabka ilaa albaab ku salaysan boos sii qabsi hore. paratransit_209_description: Dheeman Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, ka-hortagga adeegga ku salaysan boos sii qabsi hore. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeega, booqo website-ka ama kala xidhiidh 909-839-7045 wixii tafasiixa codsiga ah. Baadhitaannada waxaa lagu kaydin karaa adigoo wacaya 800-578-6555. Rakaabku waxa laga yaabaa inay jadwaleeyaan safarrada isla maalintaas, wax boos celin ah looma baahna.
paratransit_208_description: Cerritos Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku salaysan boos sii qabsi hore. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (55+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan magaalada Cerritos. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeega, booqo website-ka ama kala xidhiidh Horumarinta Bulshada ee Cerritos 562-916-1202 wixii tafasiixa codsiga ah. Baadhitaannada waxaa lagu kaydin karaa adigoo wacaya 562-402-7433. paratransit_207_description: Calabasas Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, albaab ilaa albaab ku salaysan boos sii qabsi hore. Raaditaanka waxaa lagu kaydin karaa adigoo wacaya 818-632-6211 laga bilaabo 7:30 subaxnimo ilaa 4:00 galabnimo, Isniin ilaa Jimce. Boos qabsi waa in la sameeyaa ugu yaraan 24 saacadood ka hor.
partneragency_51_description: 211 waxa ay haysaa macluumaadka adeegyada askarta, cuntada degdega ah, hoyga, Cal fresh (Food Stamps) Program. Sidoo kale macluumaadka kaalmada kirada, daryeel caafimaad oo la awoodi karo oo lacag la'aan ah, xannaano-maalmeed iyo barnaamijyada Headstart, shaqada, kooxaha taageerada, la-talinta, u gudbinta barnaamijyada kaalmada utility iyo agabka waayeelka. 211 Inland Empire Ride share waxay bixisaa ikhtiyaaro gaadiid oo kala duwan oo loogu talagalay taxi-ga baska, Dial-a-Ride, barnaamijyada darawalnimada tabaruca, rideshare tareenada iyo gaadiidka gaarka ah.
paratransit_206_description: Avalon Transit Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka waayeelka (55+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan Magaalada Avalon. Si aad isaga diiwaan geliso adeega, booqo website-ka ama kala xidhiidh Avalon Transit 310-510-0081 wixii tafasiixa codsiga ah. Raaditaanka waxaa lagu kaydin karaa adigoo wacaya 310-510-0081 laga bilaabo 6:45 subaxnimo ilaa 5:00 galabnimo, Isniin ilaa Axad. Boos qabsi hore ilaa 7 maalmood ayaa lagu talinayaa in la helo.
oneclick.pages.sign_in.error_messages.de: Dhibaato baa ka dhacday soo galida
paratransit_173_description: Waxay siisaa adeegyo caafimaad iyo madadaalo dadka waaweyn oo ay ku jiraan; nashaadaadka jirdhiska maskaxda iyo jidhka, xiisado waxbarasho, la tashi sharci oo kooban, hawlaha bulshada iyo dhacdooyinka gaarka ah, kooxaha taageerada la talinta murugada. Ma jiro wax gaadiid ah oo lagu tago xarunta bulshada.
paratransit_168_description: Long Beach Transit Dial-a-Lift waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku salaysan boos sii qabsi hore. Adeegani waxa uu gaadiid siiya dadka naafada ah (18+) kuwaas oo si joogto ah u naafo ah socodka oo aan awoodin inay isticmaalaan nidaamka baska Long Beach oo degan magaalooyinka Long Beach, Lakewood, ama Signal Hill. Codsadayaashu waa inay marka hore xubno ka ahaadaan Adeegyada Helitaanka, bixiyaha adeegga ADA. Adeegyada gelitaanka waxa laga yaabaa in lagala xidhiidho 800-827-0829. Si aad u codsato adeega, wac Long Beach Transit 562-591-8753, Isniin ilaa Jimce, 8:00 subaxnimo ilaa 4:30 galabnimo. Marka xubin ka mid ah, raacitaanka waxaa lagu kaydin karaa adigoo wacaya 562-435-0115 inta u dhaxaysa saacadaha 6:30 subaxnimo iyo 5:00 galabnimo, toddoba maalmood usbuucii iyo ilaa 7 maalmood ka hor safarka.
paratransit_167_description: Waxay siisaa tareen u socda oo laga soo qaado xarunta sare iyo meelaha kale ee ku hareeraysan Costa Mesa ee daryeelka shakhsi ahaaneed, dukaamaysiga iyo dalxiisyada madadaalada. Codsiga waa in lagu xareeyaa Xarunta Sare ee Costa Mesa midkuna waa inuu ahaado degane Costa Mesa.
paratransit_166_description: Waxay siisaa gaadiid lagu tago oo laga soo qaado ballamaha caafimaadka ee dadka waaweyn ee deggan Costa Mesa. Ma bixiyo gaadiid loogu talagalay hababka bukaan-socodka ama noocyada qalliinka kale ee hababka. Codsiga waa in lagu xareeyaa Xarunta Sare ee Costa Mesa waana inuu ahaadaa degane Costa Mesa.
paratransit_165_description: Compton Dial-a-Ride waa wadista la wadaago, ka joojinta adeega ku salaysan boos sii qabsi hore. Adeegani waxa uu siiya gaadiidka waayeelka (55+) iyo dadka naafada ah (21+) ee degan Magaalada Compton. Dhammaan rakaabka waa in laga diiwaan geliyo Dollarhide Neighborhood Senior Center oo ku taal 1108 North Oleander Avenue ee Magaalada Compton. Xaqiijinta da'da iyo degenaanshaha ayaa loo baahan yahay wakhtiga diiwaangelinta. Dadka naafada ah waa inay tusaan Machadka Braille I.D., Kaarka Medicare ama DMV Placard I.D. sawir leh si loo buuxiyo shuruudaha u-qalmitaanka. Si aad u codsato raacid, wac 310-537-4890 oo la hadal dire ama fariin ugu dhaaf adeega jawaabta 24 saac. Safarrada waa in la qorsheeyaa ugu yaraan 24 saacadood ka hor waxaana la sii hayn karaa ilaa hal toddobaad ka hor. Adeeg isku maalin ah ayaa ku xiran helitaanka.

paratransit_161_description: Magaalada Bell Dial-a-Ride - Ujeeddada Guud waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi hore oo u adeega waayeelka (60+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee deggan magaalada Bell. paratransit_157_description: Whittier Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga iyadoo lagu saleynayo boos sii qabsi hore. paratransit_154_description: Norwalk Dial-a-Taxi waa raacid gaar ah, ka hor tag si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi hore oo u adeega waayeelka (60+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan magaalada Norwalk. Xubnuhu waxay bixiyaan kharashka dhabta ah ee ka diiwaan gashan mitirka tagaasida iyagoo isticmaalaya kuubannada foojarka sida lacag caddaan ah oo kale, AAN ka badnayn $15 raacid kasta. paratransit_144_description: Adeegga Gaadiidka La Mirada waa raacitaanka la wadaago, ka hor-istaagga adeega ku salaysan boos sii qabsi hore oo u adeega dadka degan Magaalada La Mirada. paratransit_106_description: Waxay siisaa gaadiidka dadka waaweyn ee u socda iyo ka soo celinta ballamaha caafimaadkooda, baadhis caafimaad, daawaynta ama jimicsiga caafimaadka iyo dhaqdhaqaaqa, ballamaha ilkaha iyo soo-qaadista daawada. paratransit_138_description: Dial-a-Ride Commerce waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi hore oo u adeega waayeelka (50+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan magaalada Ganacsiga. Waxay siisaa taageero fac-ilaa- faca ah, macluumaad iyo u-diritaan mujaahidiinta iyo hawl-galka millatariga si ay u helaan:
Fursadaha waxbarasho ee halyeyga shaqada ee ardayga

Kaalmada kala-guurka
Gaadiidka
Gargaarka cuntada degdega ah
Qiimaynta faa'iidooyinka
Daryeelka/la-talinta caafimaadka maskaxda
Xayawaanka adeegga
Khayraadka alaabta guriga
Khayraadka guryaha

U-qalmitaanka waa in mid ka mid ah uu ahaado 18 jir iyo ka weyn iyo ruug-caddaa Maraykan ah. Kala xidhiidh wixii macluumaad dheeraad ah

Barnaamijka waxaa loo sameeyay si loo siiyo waayeelka helida balamo caafimaad oo aan degdeg ahayn oo ay ku jiraan laakiin aan ku xaddidnayn sifeynta, daawaynta, dhakhtarka ilkaha, soo-qaadista dhakhtar qoray, shaybaadhka shaybaarka, raajooyinka, iwm.

Shuruudaha Adeegga:
Buuxi foom codsi ah oo fudud oo ku soo celi boostada ama fakis si aad u hesho lambarkaaga aqoonsiga.
Gaadiidka waa in la qorsheeyey ugu yaraan 5 maalmood ka hor. Wacitaanka 5 maalmood ka hor ma dammaanad qaadayso ballan. Balamo isla maalinta ah waxay ku xiran tahay helitaanka.
paratransit_92_description: Waxay siisaa qado dadka waaweyn ee ku jira goob la isugu yimaado. Gaadiidka xarunta waxa la siin karaa deganayaasha u qalma. U qalmida waa 60 sano iyo ka weyn. Boos qabsi waa in la sameeyaa 10:00 subaxnimo, hal maalin ka hor inta aan la qorsheynin ka qaybgalka Barnaamijka Cuntada.
paratransit_131_description: Waxay siisaa macluumaadka iyo u gudbinta bulshada, madadaalada, waxbarashada, gaadiidka iyo adeegyada la xidhiidha caafimaadka iyo hawlaha gudaha Magaalada Irvine ee dadka waaweyn. Xaq u yeelashada waa 50 sano iyo ka weyn. Boos qabsi waxaa lagu sameeyaa Xarunta Sare ee Lakeview.
accommodation_motorized_wheelchair_acces: Ma u baahan tahay baabuur intii aad boos ka heli lahayd kursiga curyaanka ee matoorka leh?
paratransit_128_description:
Waxay siisaa adeegyo caafimaad iyo madadaalo dadka waaweyn oo ay ku jiraan, caafimaadka iyo waxbarashada fayoqabka, helitaanka interneedka dadweynaha, nashaadaadka bulshada iyo dhacdooyinka gaarka ah, qolka jimicsiga iyo nashaadaadka. Gaadiidka xarunta waxa laga yaabaa in ay heli karaan dadka degan San Clemente ee u qalma. Xaq u yeelashada waa 50 sano iyo ka weyn.

Waayeellada deggan San Clemente waxaa laga soo qaadi doonaa guryahooda subaxda inta u dhaxaysa saacadaha 8:00 subaxnimo iyo 9:30 subaxnimo waxaana loo qaadi doonaa xarunta. Waayeelka waxa la siiyaa safar ka soo noqosho ah oo ay kaga imanayaan xarunta sare ilaa guryahooda San Clemente inta u dhaxaysa saacadaha 1:00 galabnimo iyo 2:30 duhurnimo.

Waa inaad wacdaa 310-965-8848 ugu yaraan 24 saacadood ka hor inta aan la qaadin si aad ballan u samayso. Kaaliyaha caawinaya rakaab naafada ah wuxuu ku socdaa lacag la'aan; si kastaba ha ahaatee, qofka u baahan kaaliyaha waa inuu haystaa kaarka aqoonsiga ee qeexaya baahida adeega kaaliyaha.
paratransit_132_description: Arcadia Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi hore oo u adeega waayeelka (62+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee deggan Arcadia. Boos sii qabsi isla maalin ah ayaa laga yaabaa in lagu sharfo iyadoo lagu salaynayo helitaanka. Booska waxa la samayn karaa laga bilaabo 7:00 subaxnimo ilaa 9:00 galabnimo, Isniin ilaa Jimce, iyo 7:00 subaxnimo ilaa 7:00 galabnimo. Sabtiyada iyo Axadaha.
paratransit_22_description: Barstow Route 5 wuxuu bixiyaa adeega degmada Dial-A-Ride (DAR) todobada maalmood ee u dhexeeya Barstow iyo bulshooyinka aan la wadaagin ee Daggett, Newberry Springs, iyo Yermo. Waxay siisaa qado dadka waaweyn ee ku jira goob la isugu yimaado. Gaadiidka barnaamijka cuntada ayaa laga yaabaa in la siiyo deganayaasha u qalma. U qalmida waa 60 sano iyo ka weyn.

paratransit_129_description: Waxay siisaa adeegyo caafimaad iyo madadaalo dadka waaweyn oo ay ku jiraan; fasalada qoob-ka-ciyaarka iyo jimicsiga, bingo iyo billiards, aqoon-is-weydaarsiyo caafimaad, farshaxan dhaqameed iyo waxqabadyo farshaxan. Gaadiid geynaya iyo ka soo qaadida xarunta waxa laga yaabaa inay heli karaan dadka waaweyn ee ka wayn 60 sano iyo kuwa degan Santa Ana. Waraaqaha loo baahan yahay waa aqoonsi sawir. Kharashku waa kala duwan yahay.
paratransit_127_description: Hadafkayagu: In la taageero, shaqaaleysiiyo, oo beddelo nolosha dadka naafada ah. Waa in uu ahaado macmiil OPARC ka haysta ogolaanshaha gaadiidka ee Xarunta Gobolka
transportationagency_40_description: Barnaamijyada Gaarsiinta waxaa ka mid ah Barnaamijka Daryeel Bixinta Iskaa wax u qabso ee Diimaha iyo Barnaamijka Gaadiidka. Barnaamijka Daryeel Bixinta iskaa wax u qabso ee diimaha kala duwani waxa uu u dhigmaa mutadawiciinta dadka da'da ah iyo kuwa naafada ah. Ilaa 2005, adeegyadeenu waxay caawiyeen waayeelka iyo dadka naafada ah Twentynine Palms oo keliya. Laga bilaabo Janaayo 2006, Reach Out waxay go'aansatey inay ku fidi doonto dhammaan Morongo Basin.
search_description: Geli ciwaano buuxa ama calaamado caan ah. Haddii aad jirran tahay iska ilaali isticmaalka gaadiidka dadweynaha, raac wadaagga ama adeegyada tagaasida. Qaar ka mid ah adeegyada raacitaanka ayaa saameeyay COVID-19 dartii. Hore u wac adeega wixii ku saabsan isbedel kasta oo suurtogal ah ee saacadaha shaqada, qiimaha, ama shuruudaha u-qalmitaanka. Adeegga baska ayaa ku socda dhimis ku meel gaar ah walina waxa uu shaqaynayaa adeegyada qaarkood.
lyft_80_description: Lyft waa codsi gaar ah oo ku salaysan talefanka gacanta.
paratransit_119_description:
GoGo waxay u rogtay shirkadaha gaadiidka baahida sida Lyft adeegyo la geli karo oo lala socon karo taleefan la'aan.
Isku qor GoGo adiga oo halkan gujiya ama wac 1 (855) 464-6872.
Tallaabada 2:
Wac 1 (855) 464-6872 oo sug inaad maqasho: "Waad ku mahadsan tahay wacitaanka GoGo"
Tallaabada 3:
Riix 1 si aad isla markiiba u codsato Lyft ama Uber gurigaaga.
Riix 2 si aad u codsatid Lyft ama Uber meesha aan kugu dejinnay ugu dambeyntii.
RIIX 3, 4 ama 5 si aad u codsato Lyft ama Uber goobta laga soo qaadayo (marka aad isdiiwaangeliso fadlan na soo wac si aad kuwan u dejiso).
Riix 6 si aad u codsato Lyft ama Uber oo wata hawlwadeen.
RIIX 0 si aad ula hadasho hawlwadeen wax ku saabsan jadwalka codsiyada hore ama wax kale.

Dareewalada TNC ee loo qoondeeyay waxay badanaa ku yimaadaan 15 daqiiqo gudahood waxayna kugu qaadi karaan ilaa 100 mayl jiho kasta (ama safarada rakaabka sida San Diego ilaa LA).

paratransit_117_description: Waxay siisaa gaadiid qiimo jaban dadka waayeelka ah ee gudaha Yorba Linda iyo ilaa hal mayl ka baxsan xadka magaalada si ay u adeegaan, caafimaadka, iyo baahiyaha shakhsi ahaaneed. U-qalmitaanka waa 60 sano iyo ka weyn waana inuu ahaado degane Yorba Linda. Codsi ayaa loo baahan yahay Ballan ayaa loo baahan yahay waana in la sameeyaa 1 usbuuc ka hor. Dukumeentiyada loo baahan yahay waa aqoonsiga aqoonsiga dawladda iyo caddaynta deganaanshaha gudaha aagga caymiska. Daryeel bixiyayaasha ka weyn 18 sano iyo wixii ka weyn waxay ku wataan lacag la'aan. *Dadka aan deganayn way isticmaali karaan adeega gaadiidka,laakin waa in ay isu geyn karaan xarunta sare.*
partneragency_100_description: 211 Degmada San Bernardino waa isha dhexe ee bixinta macluumaadka bilaashka ah iyo sirta ah iyo gudbinta dhammaan adeegyada caafimaadka iyo bini'aadmiga ee Degmada San Bernardino iyada oo loo sii marayo shabakadeena 211sb.org, qoraal, ama khadka wicitaanka 2-1-1. Khadadka teleefankeena waxay furan yihiin 24 saacadood maalintii, 7da maalmood ee usbuuca, oo ay wataan La-taliyayaasha Ilaha Bulshada ee tababaran, oo loo diyaariyey inay bixiyaan macluumaad waxtar leh xaalad kasta, wakhti kasta - hadday tahay dhaqaale, guri, caafimaad, ama masiibo la xidhiidha.
transportationagency_74_description: Magaalada ay maamusho dhalinyarada iyo xarunta sare oo bixisa qado kulul/qabow, adeegyo caafimaad, waxqabadyo iyo adeegyo bulsho.

paratransit_118_description:
Waxay siisaa qorshe caymis caafimaad dadka waaweyn oo ay ku jiraan dhammaan adeegyada daryeelka degdegga ah iyo kuwa muddada-dheer ee ay daboolaan Medicare iyo Medi-Cal. Qorshaha waxaa loo qorsheeyay in dadka waaweyni ay si madaxbanaan ugu noolaadaan bulshada dhexdeeda. Adeegyada waxaa ka mid ah daryeelka caafimaad ee joogtada ah iyo daryeelka takhasuska leh, adeegyada bulshada, daryeelka gaarka ah ee guriga iyo xarunta maalinta PACE, hawlaha bulshada iyo cunto nafaqo leh. Sidoo kale waxay bixisaa gaadiid ballamaha caafimaadka la xiriira.
U-qalmitaanka waa in qofku helayaa Medicar iyo Medi-Cal, ama Medi-Cal oo keliya, oo buuxiya shuruudaha u-qalmitaanka xarunta kalkaalinta ee uu dejiyay Gobolka California, oo awood u leh inuu si badbaado leh ugu noolaado guriga ama taageerada bulshada, oo uu yahay 55 sano iyo dalbo.
paratransit_120_description: Waxay siisaa adeegyo caafimaad iyo madadaalo dadka waaweyn oo ay ku jiraan; La talinta sharciga, waxbarashada badbaadada darawalka, ciyaaraha bingo iyo kaararka, internetka, iyo isticmaalka kombuyuutarka. Gaadiidka xarunta sare waxa la siin karaa dadka u qalma Dana Point. U qalmida waa 60 sano iyo ka weyn. Wac macluumaad faahfaahsan oo ku saabsan habka codsiga. Kharashyadu way kala duwan yihiin.

Tabarucayaasha barnaamijka ayaa ku shaqeeya barnaamijka sidaa darteed helitaanka gaadiidku wuu kala duwanaan karaa. Ballanta waxaa loo baahan yahay in la sameeyo ugu yaraan afar maalmood ka hor. paratransit_82_description:
Waxay siisaa gaadiid dukaameysi, balamo caafimaad iyo ganacsi gaar ah oo loogu talagalay waayeelka Laguna Hills gudaha iyo hareeraha Laguna Hills, Mission Viejo iyo Laguna Woods. U-qalmitaanka waa 60 sano iyo waayeel ka weyn waana inuu ahaadaa degane Laguna Niguel. Codsiga waa in la buuxiyaa ka hor isticmaalka adeegga. Aqoonsiga dawladda iyo caddaynta deganaanshaha ayaa loo baahan doonaa.

Saacadaha Barnaamijka:
Adeegga waxaa lagu heli karaa ballan 24 saacadood, 7 maalmood todobaadkii

Kharashyada Barnaamijka:
$5.00 safar hal jid ah
$10.00 dollar safar wareeg ah
$16.00 Madaarka John Wayne (hal jid)


Joogsiyada dheeriga ah waxaa ka mid ah:
John Wayne Airport
Xarunta Kalkaalinta Kaynta ee Lake Forest iyo Tuulada Xoriyadda
Irvine iyo Laguna Niguel Metrolink Station
Hoag Hospital iyo Kaiser Hospital
Irvine Spectrum
transportationagency_35_description: Wakaaladani waxay bixisa Khadka Caawinta Sare, Hel Wax ku saabsan Gaadiidka, Barnaamijka Saaxiibka Sare, Bulshooyinka Foothill RSVP, Barnaamijka Taageerada Daryeel Bixiyaha Qoyska, Barnaamijka Maalinta Dadka Waaweyn ee Xarunta Kobcinta, Isbahaysiga Adeegyada Waayeelka, Wararka Dooxada ee waayeelka iyo hagaha ilaha sare.
paratransit_66_description:
Waxay siisaa adeeg tagsi la dhimay oo loogu talagalay waayeelka 60 sano iyo ka weyn gudahooda xadka magaalada Rancho Santa Margarita ee nafaqeynta, dukaamaysiga, ballamaha caafimaadka caadiga ah, iyo daryeelka shakhsi ahaaneed. Wax lacag ah malaha dadka degan RSM ee gudaha xadka magaalada - ilaa lix safar oo hal jid ah bishii. Qofka waayeelka ah waa inuu soo waco oo uu horay isu diiwaangeliyaa.

Hoyga:
Kursiga curyaamiinta ee mootada ah ee la heli karo iyo gawaadhida wiishka curyaamiinta, waxa jira ogeysiis 72 saacadood ah oo ay tahay in la bixiyo ka hor ballanta.

Saacadaha Adeegga:
24 saacadood, 7 maalmood usbuucii

paratransit_77_description: Barnaamijkeena Community Van waxa uu siiya baabuurka safarada horay loo sii qorsheeyay-darawal ahaan ama rakaab ahaan. Horey u sii qorshee safarkaaga ama si iskaa wax u qabso ah u wado deriskaaga ama qoyskaaga. Booqo shabakada Community Van si aad u hesho macluumaadka iyo lambarada lagala xidhiidho goob kasta oo adeeg ah, iyo macluumaadka ku saabsan gelitaanka iyo u-qalmitaanka.
paratransit_83_description:
Ku soo dhawoow barnaamijka gaadiidka beesha Pacific/Algona!

Kani waa barnaamij tijaabo ah oo cusub oo la keenay xaafadaha Baasifigga iyo Algona oo uu keenay King County Metro, iyadoo lala kaashanayo Magaalada Baasifigga iyo Magaalada Algona si xubnaha bulshada loo siiyo hab cusub oo ay ku wadaagaan raacitaanka. Adeegani waxa uu bixiyaa safaro la wadaago, hal mar ama soo noqnoqda, meelaha caanka ah oo la heli karo maalinta oo dhan, fiidka, iyo maalmaha fasaxa ah si loo siiyo deganayaasha ikhtiyaaro habaysan oo ay ku soo wareegaan marka adeega basku aanu dabooli karin baahidooda. Safarrada waa in horay loo sii qorsheeyaa iyada oo loo marayo Iskuduwaha Gaadiidka Bulshada ee deegaanka (CTC).

paratransit_72_description:
Buug raacida adoo isticmaalaya Metro Flex app ama adoo wacaya 206-258-7739.
Metro Flex waa adeeg gaadiid oo la rabo oo bixiya raacitaanka xaafado badan oo degmada King ah. U hel meesha aad u baahan tahay inaad ku raacdo baabuurta yar yar ee casriga ah, raaxada leh hal qiimo jaban oo kaliya. Tag dukaameysi, la kulan saaxiibada qadada, u soco balamaha - dhib ma leh meeshaad u socoto, Metro Flex ayaa ku geyn doonta halkaas.

Metro Flex waxay beddeshaa Community Ride, Ride Pingo to Transit iyo Via to Transit.

U isticmaal hal app aag kasta oo adeega Flex Metro, oo ay ku jiraan Juanita, Kent, Othello, Rainier Beach, Renton Highlands, Sammamish, Skyway iyo Tukwila.
paratransit_79_description: Barnaamijka Community Van wuxuu bixiyaa 6-rakaab iyo 12-rakaab ah oo loogu talagalay raacitaanka horay loo qorsheeyay -- hal mar ama mid soo noqnoqda -- oo ku lug leh ugu yaraan laba rakaab ah iyo darawal tabaruc ah. Goobaha safarku waxay ahaan karaan meel kasta oo baabuur laba saacadood ah u jirta Kirkland waxayna dhici kartaa inta lagu jiro maalinta, fiidkii, iyo maalmaha fasaxa ah. Tani waa hab ay xubnaha bulshadu u qorsheeyaan safarada la habeeyey marka adeega baska aanu dabooli karin baahidooda. Ka faa'iidayso Community Van safarrada garoonka, ballamaha, hawl-qabadka, iyo bannaanbaxyada! Sidoo kale fadlan tixgeli inaad saxiixdo inaad noqoto darawal tabaruc ah.

paratransit_39_description:
Barstow Route 5 wuxuu bixiyaa adeega degmada Dial-A-Ride (DAR) todobada maalmood ee u dhexeeya Barstow iyo bulshooyinka aan la wadaagin ee Daggett, Newberry Springs, iyo Yermo. Si aad u ballansato qaadis gudaha aagga adeegga ee waddada, wac ugu yaraan saddex saacadood ka hor wakhtiga qaadista aad rabto. Taleefannada waxaa laga jawaabaa 6:00 subaxnimo ilaa 7:00 galabnimo. todobo maalmood todobaadkii.

*Diiwaan galinta Loo Baahan Yahay
Codsiga waxaa laga heli karaa onlayn ama wac ADA Ride 877-232-7433
paratransit_49_description:
Barnaamijka gaadiidka sare waxaa loogu talagalay inuu daboolo baahiyaha waayeelka iyo kuwa naafada ah ee bulshada Redlands.
 Boos qabsi waa in la sameeyaa 24 saacadood ka hor. Booqashooyinka ballamaha caafimaadka waxa la samayn karaa isla marka aad hesho. Boos celin ayaa laga yaabaa in la sameeyo Isniinta ilaa Jimcaha laga bilaabo 8:00 subaxnimo ilaa 4:00 galabnimo. Adigoo wacaya 909-307-7316 ama kala xiriir Vickie at (909) 435-5419.
Qaadashada ugu horreysa ee la qorsheeyay 8:00 subaxnimo waxay soconaysaa nus saac kasta ilaa 3:00 galabnimo.
paratransit_46_description:
(* COVID-19 cusboonaysiin*)
LA HELI KARO MAALMAHA TALAADA IYO KHAMIISTA OO KALIYA. WAC MACLUUMAAD DHEERAAD AH

Wasaaradda Gaadiidka ee UReach/ACTS waxay siisaa gaadiid shan maalmood usbuucii dadka da'da ah iyo kuwa qaba naafo jireed. Adeegeena wuxuu siiya hab ay kooxahani ku helaan balamo caafimaad iyo ilko oo aad loogu baahan yahay, dukaamaysi, bangi, ama booqanaya qoyska ama saaxiibada. Nasiib darro, ma jirto wax loogu talagalay kuraasta curyaamiinta, macaamiishu waa inay kaligood geli karaan kana bixi karaan baabuur.

Aagga Adeegga: UReach/ACTS Transit waxay u adeegtaa Loma Linda, Redlands, Colton, iyo bulshooyinka Grand Terrace.

Haddii aad xiisaynayso isticmaalka adeegga UEach/ACTS Transit, fadlan soo gudbi arjiga gaadiidka ka dibna wac xafiiskayaga si aad u ballansato qaadistaada ugu horreysa, ama wac oo codso codsi (909) 796-8357.
paratransit_41_description:
Beaumont Dial A Ride waa xannibaad dhammaystiran si loo xakameeyo adeegga baska waddada go'an. DAR waxay ku qaadaa rakaab u qalma gudaha magaalooyinka Beaumont, Cherry Valley oo aan la wadaagin iyo qaybo ka mid ah Banning. Dhammaan safaradu waa inay ka soo bilowdaan Magaalada Beaumont ama Dooxada Cherry.

Rakaabka u qalma waxa ka mid ah Waayeelka (65+), dadka naafada ah iyo dadka lagu caddeeyey Xeerka Naafada Maraykanka (ADA). Boos qabsi ayaa loo baahan yahay ugu yaraan 24 saacadood ka hor adeegga la rabo.

Aagga adeega DAR waa 3/4 mayl labada dhinac ee wado go'an ee Beaumont Pass Transit inta lagu jiro wakhtiga uu jidkaasi ku jiro.
transit_14_description:
Khadka Dungeness, oo ay maamusho Greyhound Lines waxay bixisaa laba safar maalinle ah inta u dhaxaysa Port Angeles, Sequim, Discovery Bay, Port Townsend iyo Kingston, ilaa iyo laga soo bilaabo Edmonds, badhtamaha Seattle, iyo Madaarka Caalamiga ah ee Seattle Tacoma. Qiimaha lagu raaco waxa ka mid ah raacitaanka quruxda quruxda badan ee macalimiintayada raaxada ah.
MACLUUMAADKA XIRIIRKA
Taageerada Taleefanka:
360-417-0700

Saacadaha (PST):
Isniin - Jimco: 9 subaxnimo - 5 galabnimo
Sabti iyo Axad: 9 subaxnimo - 1 galabnimo
paratransit_7_description:
Barnaamijka Gaadiidka Qaabka Gaarka ah wuxuu bixiyaa u-qalmitaanka marka si caafimaad ahaan loo tilmaamo oo loo oggolaado u safridda iyo ka-soo-kabashada daryeelka caafimaadka VA, ama VA-da la oggolaaday ee aan VA ahayn.
Gaadiidka Qaabka Gaarka ah (SMT) - waxaa lagu qeexaa ambalaas, ambalaas, ambalaas hawada, kursiga curyaanka ee ku xiran/kursiga, ama qaab kale oo gaadiid si gaar ah loogu talagalay in lagu qaado qof naafada ah. Tan kuma jiraan qaab gaadiid oo aan si gaar ah loogu talagelin in lagu qaado dadka naafada ah, sida baska, tareenada dhulka hoostiisa mara, taksi, tareen, ama diyaarad.
Habka Ansixinta
Dhammaan oggolaanshaha SMT waxay ku bilaabmayaan La-talinta-Travel Consult ee uu soo gudbiyo Bixiyaha Daryeelka Koowaad (PCP). Marka xafiiska Bene-Travel uu dib u eego la tashiga, ama waa la diidi doonaa oo lagu celin doonaa PCP si dib loogu eego ama loo ansixiyo. Marka la ansixiyo, Halyeeyga waxaa lala xiriiri doonaa tilmaamo dheeri ah oo ku saabsan qorsheynta gaadiidkooda balamaha caafimaadka. Wada tashi kastaa wuxuu yeelan doonaa taariikh dhicis. Waa ku waajib inuu Mujaahidku la kulmo PCP-gooda si uu u cusboonaysiiyo la-tashigooda haddii loo baahdo.
paratransit_47_description:
Barnaamijkan gaadiidku waxa uu bixiyaa adeega isgoysyada bilaashka ah ee dadka waayeelka ah ee da'doodu tahay 60 iyo ka weyn ee degan Montclair. Adeegga waxaa ku jira gaadiidka Xarunta Sare iyo hawlaha guud ee gudaha xadka magaalada Montclair. Adeegga ka baxsan Montclair wuxuu ku xaddidan yahay ballamaha caafimaadka oo keliya.

Ka qaybqaatayaasha waa in horay loo diiwaan geliyay oo ay haystaan ka-dhaafitaan masuuliyadeed oo saxeexan oo ku jira faylka ka hor intaysan ka qaybgelin barnaamijka.

Boos celin ayaa loo baahan yahay ugu yaraan laba maalmood iyo ugu badnaan laba toddobaad ka hor. Boos sii qabsashadu waxay ku salaysan tahay timaaddada koowaad, ee saldhigga koowaad ee loo adeego.

Saacadaha Shaqada: 9:30 subaxnimo ilaa 2:30 galabnimo Isniin ilaa Jimce. Macluumaad ama ballan ka wac Iskuduwaha Gaadiidka (909) 625-9452.
*Kaarka ganacsiga waxa la siin doonaa soo dhawaynta caafimaadka si dirawalka loogu yeedho adeega soo celinta guriga ka qaybqaataha.
paratransit_9_description: Adeegga basaska sare wuxuu u furan yahay dhammaan waayeelka deggan Norco 50 sano iyo ka weyn, karti leh oo deggan Norco dagaalyahannada milatariga 50 sano iyo ka weyn, iyo dadka naafada ah ee deggan Norco da' kasta. Gaadhigu waxa uu ku qaadaa dadka degan masaafo 30-mile ah oo ka baxsan xadka magaalada Norco si ay u iibsadaan raashinka lagama maarmaanka ah, booqashooyinka caafimaadka, helitaanka warqadaha daawoyinka, bixinta biilasha, adeegyada boostada, bangiyada, iyo si ay ugu tagaan ugana yimaadaan Xarunta Sare ee Rose M. Eldridge ee hawl maalmeedka.

paratransit_205_description: Artesia Express Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (60+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan Magaalada Artesia. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeega, kala xidhiidh Artesia Park 562-860-3361 wixii tafasiixa codsiga ah. Baadhitaannada waxaa lagu kaydin karaa adigoo wacaya 800-909-7433.
paratransit_202_description: Claremont Dial-a-Ride ee Dadweynaha Guud, oo ay maamusho Hay'adda Gaadiidka Dooxada Pomona (PVTA), waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi. Adeegani waxa uu gaadiid siiya dhammaan dadka degan iyo kuwa soo booqda Magaalada Claremont. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeegga, la xidhiidh 909-621-9900 inta u dhaxaysa 9:00 subaxnimo iyo 4:00 galabnimo, Isniin ilaa Jimce wixii faahfaahin ah ee codsiga ah. Baadhitaannada waxaa lagu kaydin karaa adigoo wacaya 909-623-0183. Boos qabsi hore ayaa la aqbalayaa ilaa 7 maalmood ka hor.
paratransit_203_description: Claremont Dial-a-Ride for Seniors and Disabled, oo ay maamusho Maamulka Gaadiidka Dooxada Pomona (PVTA), waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda lagu xakameynayo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (60+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan magaalada Claremont. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeegga, la xidhiidh 909-621-9900 inta u dhaxaysa 9:00 subaxnimo iyo 4:00 galabnimo, Isniin ilaa Jimce wixii faahfaahin ah ee codsiga ah. Baadhitaannada waxaa lagu kaydin karaa adigoo wacaya 909-623-0183. Boos qabsi hore ayaa la aqbalayaa ilaa 7 maalmood ka hor.
paratransit_201_description: Dooxada Antelope Transit Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi. Adeegani waxa uu gaadiid siiya waayeelka (65+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan Dooxada Antelope. Si aad isaga diiwaan geliso adeegga, dadka deegaanka waa in ay sidoo kale haystaan kaarka TAP-ga la dhimay oo ansax ah. La xidhiidh 661-945-9445 si aad u hesho faahfaahinta codsiga oo dhamaystiran. Xubnaha diiwaangashan waxay wici karaan 855-833-8541 inta u dhaxaysa 8:00 subaxnimo iyo 5:00 galabnimo, Isniinta ilaa Axada si ay u sii wataan. Safarradu waxay ku salaysan yihiin soo-hor-jeed, adeegga koowaad waxaana laga yaabaa in la sii hayo ilaa laba maalmood ka hor. Qiimaha safarka wuxuu u dhexeeyaa $3.00 iyo $6.00, taasoo ku salaysan masaafada la safray.
paratransit_200_description: Helitaanka Paratransit waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku salaysan boos sii qabsi hore. Adeegani waxa uu gaadiid siiya dadka degan Degmada Los Angles ee naafada ah kuwaas oo naafonimadooda darteed aan awoodin inay isticmaalaan adeegyada basaska iyo tareenada fudud. U qalmida waxaa lagu go'aamiyaa qiimeyn shaqsi ah. Booqo website-ka ama wac Xarunta Adeegga Macmiilka ee Helitaanka 800-827-0829 (TDD 800-827-1359) wixii macluumaad dheeraad ah ee codsiga. Xubnaha diiwaangashan waxaa la siin doonaa kaarka aqoonsiga Rider si ay u helaan adeegyada. Ka wac khadka boos celinta 800-883-1295 (TDD 800-826-7280) ugu yaraan 24 saacadood ka hor si aad u sii haysato baabuurka. Qiimuhu wuxuu u dhexeeyaa $2.00 ilaa $7.00, taasoo ku salaysan masaafada la safray. Boos sii qabsigu wuxuu xaqiijin doonaa qiimaha marka safarka la qorsheeyay. Aagga adeeggu wuxuu ka bilaabmaa Dooxada Antelope ee waqooyiga ilaa San Pedro oo ku taal koonfurta, iyo laga bilaabo Malibu ee galbeedka ilaa Claremont ee bari.
paratransit_199_description: Santa Fe Springs Taxi Voucher Program waa raacid gaar ah, xannibaysa si loo xakameeyo adeegga tagaasida oo ku salaysan boos sii qabsi hore. Adeegani waxa uu gaadiid siiya waayeelka (60+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan Santa Fe Springs. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeega, wac 562-409-7572. Foojarrada qiimihiisu yahay ilaa $7 ee qiimaha tagsiga waa $1 midkiiba waxaana laga iibsan karaa Xarunta Xaafada ama Hallka Magaalada.
paratransit_198_description: Gaadiidka Caafimaadka ee Santa Fe Springs waa raacitaan la wadaago, xannibaad lagu xakameynayo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi hore. Adeegani waxa uu gaadiid siiya waayeelka (60+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan Santa Fe Springs. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeegga oo aad u sii xejisato, wac 562-409-7572. Boos qabsi waa in la sameeyaa ugu yaraan 24 saacadood ka hor.
paratransit_197_description: Torrance Community Transit waa raacitaanka gaarka ah, ka hor taga si loo xakameeyo adeegga tagsiga iyadoo lagu salaynayo boos sii qabsi hore. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (65+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan Magaalada Torrance. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeega, wac 310-618-2536 si aad u hesho macluumaadka codsiga. Xubnaha diiwaangashan waxa la siin doonaa kaadhka la jiido oo lagu shuban karo ilaa 12 dhibco raacid sannadkii. Waayeelku waxay bixiyaan $1 ilaa $5 credit credit ku salaysan dakhliga, iyo dadka naafada ah waxay bixiyaan $1 credit kasta. Dhibcaha raacitaanka kasta wuxuu leeyahay qiime dhan $13. Safarrada ka badan $13 waxaa lagu bixin karaa jeebkaaga ama iyadoo la isticmaalayo credit credit wadista labaad. Dhowr adeegyo taksi ayaa diyaar ah si loo sii xejisto raacitaanka: Dhammaan Taksiyada Jaallaha ah (310-807-8888), Bell Cab (800-999-9977), ama South Bay Yellow (866-400-4103). Ka qaybgalayaasha aan ambalaayada ahayn waa inay ku wargeliyaan adeegga tagsiga in loo baahan yahay gaadhi qalabaysan wiish. Boos qabsashada baabuurta wiishka waa in la sameeyaa ugu yaraan 24 saacadood ka hor.
paratransit_196_description: Covina Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga iyadoo lagu saleynayo boos sii qabsi hore. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (60+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan magaalada Covina. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeega, wac 626-384-5520 si aad u hesho macluumaadka codsiga. Xubnaha diiwaangashan waxay wici karaan 877-858-5556 si ay u sii wataan. Boos qabsi waxa la samayn karaa ilaa 7 maalmood ka hor. Codsiyada adeegga isla maalintaa waa la sharfi karaa iyadoo lagu salaynayo helitaanka. Safarada lagu tagayo lagana imanayo Covina City Hall iyo Joslyn Senior Center waa bilaash.
paratransit_195_description: Xeebta Redondo "The WAVE" Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku salaysan boos sii qabsi hore. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (62+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan magaalooyinka Redondo Beach iyo Hermosa Beach. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeega, wac 310-937-6660 si aad u hesho macluumaadka codsiga. Xubnaha diiwaangashan waxay wici karaan 310-802-7684 inta u dhaxaysa 6:00 subaxnimo ilaa 8:30 galabnimo, 7 maalmood usbuucii si ay u sii wataan. Boos qabsi waxa la samayn karaa ilaa 7 maalmood ka hor. Codsiyada adeegga isla maalintaa waa la sharfi karaa iyadoo lagu salaynayo helitaanka.
paratransit_194_description: Azusa Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku salaysan boos sii qabsi hore. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (55+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan magaalada Azusa. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeega, wac 626-812-5206 si aad u hesho macluumaadka codsiga. paratransit_193_description: Lakewood DASH waa raacitaanka la wadaago, ka hor istaagida adeega ku salaysan boos sii qabsi hore. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka waayeelka (60+) iyo dadka naafada ah (18+) ee degan Magaalada Lakewood. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeega, wac 562-924-0149 si aad u hesho macluumaadka codsiga.
paratransit_191_description: Beverly Hills Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (62+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan Magaalada Beverly Hills. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeega, wac 310-285-6842 wixii macluumaad ah ee codsiga ah. Xubnaha diiwaangashan waxay wici karaan 310-275-2791 si ay ballan u sameeyaan. Ballan-qaadista ballamaha caafimaadka waxa la samayn karaa ilaa hal bil ka hor iyo safarrada aan caafimaadka ahayn ilaa hal toddobaad ka hor. Adeeggu wuxuu bixiyaa gaadiidka meelaha qaarkood ee ku dheggan magaalada balamaha caafimaadka oo keliya.
paratransit_186_description: South Pasadena Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (55+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan Magaalada South Pasadena. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeega, wac 626-403-7398 si aad u hesho macluumaadka codsiga. Xubnaha diiwaangashan waxay wici karaan 626-403-7368 si ay ballan u sameeyaan. Safarrada waa in la sii dhigaa ugu dambayn 24 saacadood ka hor. Safarada bisha la qorsheeyay ayaa la bixiyaa: Target, Walmart, Santa Anita Mall, iyo Alhambra Costco. Ka eeg shabakada jadwalka.
paratransit_185_description: BurbankBus Senior iyo Disabled Transit waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi. Xubnaha diiwaangashan waxay wici karaan 818-238-5360 inta u dhaxaysa 8:30 subaxnimo iyo 2:00 galabnimo, Isniinta ilaa Jimcaha si ay ballan u qabsadaan. Safarrada waa in la sii dhigaa ugu dambayn 24 saacadood ka hor.

Si aad isu diiwaan geliso, wac Xafiiska Waaxda Adeegyada Bulshada 626-355-5278 inta u dhaxaysa 7:30 subaxnimo iyo 5:30 galabnimo, Isniinta ilaa Khamiista si aad u hesho macluumaadka codsiga. Wac 626-355-3873 si aad boos u qabsato. Safarrada waa in la qorsheeyaa ugu yaraan 48 saacadood ka hor.
paratransit_183_description: Pico Rivera Dial-a-Van waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi. Adeegani waxa uu gaadiid siiya waayeelka (55+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan Magaalada Pico Rivera. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso adeega ama aad u sii xejisato, wac Xarunta Sare 562-948-4844 wixii macluumaad ah. Safarrada waa in la qorsheeyaa ugu yaraan todoba maalmood ka hor.
paratransit_182_description: Pasadena Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (60+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan magaalooyinka Pasadena, San Marino, iyo Altadena. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso, wac 626-744-4094 wixii macluumaad ah ee codsiga ah. Marka kaadhka xubinimada la bixiyo raacitaanka waxa lagu kaydin karaa adigoo wacaya 626-791-7200 inta u dhaxaysa 8:00 subaxnimo iyo 5:00 galabnimo. Safarrada waxaa la qorsheeyay ilaa shan maalmood ka hor, waana in la qorsheeyaa ugu yaraan 24 saacadood ka hor wakhtiga boos celinta ee la doonayo.
paratransit_179_description: Alhambra Senior Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku salaysan boos sii qabsi hore. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (60+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan magaalada Alhambra. Si aad isu diiwaangeliso, wac 626-570-5088 si aad u hesho macluumaadka codsiga. Marka xubin ka mid ah, raacitaanka waxaa lagu sii haysan karaa adigoo wacaya xarunta boos celinta 626-289-7433. Waxaa lagu talinayaa in aad ballansato safar ugu yaraan 3 maalmood ka hor.
paratransit_180_description: South El Monte Paratransit Program waa raacasho la wadaago, xannibaad lagu xakameynayo adeegga iyadoo lagu saleynayo boos sii qabsi hore. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (60+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan Magaalada South El Monte. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso, wac 626-448-0131 si aad u hesho macluumaadka codsiga iyo si aad u xejisato raacitaanka. Safarrada waa in la qorsheeyaa ugu yaraan 24 saacadood ka hor.
paratransit_169_description: Waxay siisaa qado dadka waaweyn ee ku jira goob la isugu yimaado. Gaadiid taga ama laga soo qaado xarunta waxa la siin karaa deganayaasha u qalma. Boos qabsi waa in la sameeyaa hal saac ka hor inta aan cuntada la qaybin.
paratransit_178_description: Magaalada Temple Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga iyadoo lagu saleynayo boos sii qabsi hore. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka waayeelka (60+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan Magaalada Macbadka. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso, wac 626-285-2171, ext. 4515 macluumaadka codsiga. Markaad xubin ka noqoto, raacitaanka waxaa lagu sii hayn karaa adigoo wacaya xarunta boos celinta 626-286-2456. Xarunta boos celinta waxa la heli karaa 7:00 subaxnimo ilaa 8:00 galabnimo Isniinta ilaa Jimcaha; 9:00 subaxnimo ilaa 7:00 galabnimo Sabtida; iyo 8:30 subaxnimo ilaa 6:30 galabnimo Axad. Safarrada waxa la sii hayn karaa ilaa 7 maalmood ka hor.
paratransit_177_description: Culver City Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi. Adeegani waxa uu gaadiid u fidiyaa dadka degan Magaalada Culver ee qaba naafanimada takhtarka xaqiijiyay, kaas oo ka hortagaya isticmaalka gaadiidka dadweynaha ee caadiga ah. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso, wac 310-253-6729 si aad u hesho macluumaadka codsiga. Markaad xubin ka noqoto, raacitaanka waxa lagu kaydin karaa adigoo wacaya dirista 310-253-6580.
paratransit_175_description: El Segundo Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi. Adeegani waxa uu gaadiid siiya waayeelka iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan Magaalada El Segundo. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso, wac 310-524-2700 si aad u hesho macluumaadka codsiga. Markaad xubin ka noqoto, raacitaanka waxa lagu kaydin karaa adigoo wacaya dirista 310-524-2704. Diritaanka waxa la heli karaa 8:00 subaxnimo ilaa 5:00 galabnimo Isniinta ilaa Jimcaha; 9:00 subaxnimo ilaa 1:00 galabnimo Sabtida; iyo 11:00 subaxnimo ilaa 4:00 galabnimo Axad. Codsiyada raacitaanka waxa la samayn karaa ilaa laba toddobaad ka hor. Raacitaanku waa bilaash, laakiin waxaa jira $5 khidmad sanadle ah oo loogu talagalay jardiinooyinka iyo kaarka xubinnimada ee kaydinta.
paratransit_174_description: Waxay siisaa qado dadka waaweyn ee ku jira goob la isugu yimaado. Gaadiidka xarunta waxa laga yaabaa inay diyaar u yihiin dadka degan San Juan Capistrano. U qalmida waa 60 sano iyo ka weyn.
paratransit_172_description: Carson Dial-a-Ride waa fuulid gaar ah, xannibid si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku salaysan boos sii qabsi hore. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (60+), iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan Magaalada Carson. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso, wac 835-0212 ext. 1489 macluumaadka codsiga. Markaad xubin ka noqoto, raacitaanka waxaa lagu kaydin karaa adigoo wacaya 877-435-6111. Codsiyada raacitaanka waxa la samayn karaa 24 saacadood 7 maalmood usbuucii. Marka lagu daro $2.00 khidmadda safarka, raacuhu waa inuu bixiyaa faraqa haddii safarku dhaafo $20.00.
paratransit_150_description: Huntington Park Dial-a-Ride waa tagsi gaar loo leeyahay, xannibaya si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi. Adeegani waxa uu gaadiid siiya waayeelka (65+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan Huntington Park. Si aad u codsato raacid, wac 866-486-8775. Codsiyada safarka waxa la sii hayn karaa ilaa laba toddobaad ka hor. Boos sii qabsi isla maalin ah ayaa laga yaabaa in lagu sharfo iyadoo lagu salaynayo helitaanka.
paratransit_171_description: Monterey Park Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga iyadoo lagu saleynayo boos sii qabsi hore. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (55+) iyo dadka naafada ah ee degan Magaalada Monterey Park. Si aad isaga diiwaan geliso adeegga, dadka deegaanka waa in ay buuxiyaan arji oo ay keenaan caddaynta deganaanshaha oo wata shatiga darawalnimada sawir ama aqoonsiga hadda. Codsiyada waxaa laga heli karaa Xarunta Langley: 400 W. Emerson Ave., Monterey Park CA 91754. Wixii macluumaad dheeraad ah, kala xiriir Dial-a-Ride 626-307-1396 Isniinta ilaa Jimcaha, 8:00 subaxnimo ilaa 4:00 galabnimo . Xubnaha diiwaangashan waxay wici karaan 626-307-1395 si ay u sii wataan. Ballamaha caafimaadku waxay u baahan yihiin in la sameeyo ugu yaraan 5 maalmood ka hor, ballamaha caadiga ahna waa in la sameeyaa ugu yaraan 3 maalmood ka hor. Adeegga la bixiyo marka ugu horraysa ee loo adeego.
paratransit_170_description: Montebello Dial-a-Taxi Program waa raacid gaar ah, xannibaad si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi. Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiidka dadka da'da ah (62+), dadka haysta kaarka Medicare, iyo/ama dadka naafada ah ee degan magaalada Montebello. Si aad isu diiwaan geliso wac 323-558-1625 Isniinta ilaa Jimcaha, 8:00 subaxnimo ilaa 5:00 galabnimo si aad u codsato foomka u-qalmitaanka Rakaabka. Markaad xubin ka noqoto, raacitaanka waxaa lagu kaydin karaa adigoo wacaya 323-558-1810. Codsiyada raacitaanka waxa la samayn karaa 24 saacadood 7 maalmood usbuucii. Kaliya ballamaha maalinta oo kale ayaa diyaar ah. Wac ugu yaraan 30 daqiiqo ka hor wakhtiga qaadista la codsado. Haddii aad isticmaasho kursiga curyaanka, kula tali diraha inaad u baahan tahay van la heli karo (waxa laga yaabaa inay ku qaadato wax ka badan saacad gaadhiga kursiga curyaanka).
paratransit_313_description:
[haddii juqraafi ahaan loo ballaariyo Vta bilow iyo dhammaad:] Moorpark Dial-A-Ride Safarrada waa in ay ka bilowdaan kuna dhammaadaan magaalada Moorpark. Safarradu waxay fududayn karaan safarrada meelaha kale iyadoo la isku xidha raacayaasha tareenka iyo saldhigyada basaska ee Moorpark ee u safra meelaha kale.

[ Bayaanka ECTA]

Adeegga gaadiidka ee deganeyaasha Moorpark da'da 65 iyo ka weyn.

U-qalmitaanka:
-Waa inuu jiraa 65 jir iyo ka weyn

HABKA CODSIGA
Waa in aad buuxisaa arjiga laga heli karo Hall-ka Magaalada, Xarunta Dadka Waaweyn ee Moorpark, adoo wacaya Moorpark transit, ama onlayn adigoo booqanaya https://www.moorparkca.gov/238/Specialized-Transportation.

DOkumentiyada loo baahan yahay:
-Ma jiro (codsaduhu wuxuu iskii u caddeeyaa da'da codsiga)

Qiimaha:
Socdaalka gudaha magaalada Moorpark: $2.00

WAREEJINTA:
[ Bayaanka ECTA]

XILDHIBAAN:
Marka aad isdiiwaangeliso barnaamijka, wac ugu yaraan laba saacadood ka hor intaadan u baahnayn raacitaanka haddii aanu jirin qalab dhaqdhaqaaqa (ie. kursiga curyaanka). Wac ugu yaraan maalin ka hor haddii fuushanku uu yeelan doono aalad dhaqdhaqaaqa. Markaad wacayso, u sheeg diraha inaad tahay Moorpark Dial-A-Rider.

TALEEFAN:
Su'aalaha, macluumaadka, iyo codsiyada: 805-517-6257
Boos qabsasho: 805-375-5467

ADEEGA LAGU BIXIYAY LUQADAHA SOO SOCOTA:
Ingiriis, Isbaanish
