transit_317_description:
Simi Valley Transit (SVT) waxay siisaa badbaado, qiimo jaban, adeegyo gaadiid dadweynaha safarka ah.
Adeegga Jidka go'an wuxuu ku xidhaa METRO ee degmada Los Angeles ee Chatsworth. Sidoo kale isku xidha
Bulshooyinka ku dhex jira Degmada Ventura ee leh waddooyinka Guddiga Gaadiidka Degmada Ventura.

Rakaabku waxay ku bixin karaan lacag caddaan ah oo keliya safarrada keli ah markay baska fuulayaan. Darawaliintu ma awoodaan inay bixiyaan isbeddel. Maalin kasta, bille, iyo kaarka raacitaanka bulk ee la dhimay waxaa laga iibsan karaa Hall Hall iyo inta badan dugsiyada dhexe iyo sare. Kaliya xayawaanka adeega shahaado haysta, ama xoolaha ku xidhan xambaara xoolaha la ansixiyay, ayaa loo ogol yahay baabuurta SVT. Dhammaan basaska SVT waxay ku qalabaysan yihiin baaskiilada.

Waayeelka da'da 65 iyo ka weyn iyo shakhsiyaadka naafada ah waxay u qalmi karaan qiimo dhimis iyagoo booqanaya website-ka soo socda si ay u dalbadaan:
https://www.simivalley.org/departments/community-services/simi-valley-transit#FR

Qiimaha: $1.50 dadka waaweyn iyo ardayda
$0.75 loogu talagalay Waayeelka da'doodu tahay 65 ama ka weyn ama kuwa u qalma Xeerka Naafada Ameerikaanka (ADA).
paratransit_309_description:
GO ACCESS waa adeeg cidhiidhi ah oo loogu talagalay shakhsiyaadka ka weyn da'da 65 iyo shakhsiyaadka si joogto ah ama si ku meel gaar ah u naafo ah. Ma jiraan wax xaddidan oo ku saabsan tirada safarrada.


Waxay u adeegtaa magaalooyinka Ojai, Oxnard, Port Hueneme, Ventura, iyo meelaha aan la wadaagin. Sidoo kale waxay bixisaa isku xidhka wareejinta Camarillo, Thousand Oaks, iyo adeega paratransit Santa Paula.

•Duulayaasiintu waxay u isticmaali karaan ACCESS ujeeddo kasta oo safar ah oo ay ku tagayaan meel kasta oo ku dhex taal Aagga Adeegga ee Degmada Transit District (GCTD).

& dibi ;Duulleyda waxaa laga soo kaxeeyaa/dejiyaa gurigooda ama goobta ay ka yimaadeen, badiyaa dhanka jidka.

& dibi; Raacitaanku waxay kaydiyaan safarrada hal maalin ka hor.

•Safar maalinle ah ayaa laga yaabaa in lagu bixiyo iyadoo lagu salaynayo helitaanka.

& dibi;Dhammaan baabuurta ku qalabaysan wiishka kursiga curyaanka

& dibi; Adeegayaasha daryeelka shakhsi ahaaneed ayaa laga yaabaa inay raacaan si ay u caawiyaan rakaabka.

CORONAVIRUS XAALADDA GAAR AH EE CORONAVIRUS:
Adeeggu wuxuu u socdaa si caadi ah, iyadoo baabuurta si joogto ah loo jeermiyo si loo hubiyo badbaadada rakaabka. Hadda ma jiraan wax xaddidaad ah oo ku aaddan meesha uu rakaabku tagi karo ama uusan aadi karin si kastaba ha ahaatee waxaa aad loogu talinayaa in soo diruhu uu ogaado inta lagu jiro waqtiga boos celinta haddii safarku la xiriiri doono caafimaad.


AQOONSIYADA

Adeegyada waayeelka da'doodu tahay 65+ iyo shakhsiyaadka naafada ah da' kasta oo haysta shahaadada ADA. (Haddii aad leedahay xaddidaad ku meel gaar ah ama joogto ah, jireed, maskaxeed, muuqaal, garasho, ama xaddidaad kale oo naafada ah taas oo saameyn doonta awooddaada helitaanka adeegga baska dariiqa go'an, waxaa laga yaabaa inaad u qalanto Shahaadada ADA. Eeg qaybta hoose ee Gelitaankan wixii macluumaad dheeraad ah sida loo codsado shahaadada ADA.)



XAYAWAANADA ADEEGA Xayawaanka adeeggu waa inay ku jiraan xadhig ama suunka mar kasta. Xayawaanka adeega ayaa laga yaabaa inay fadhiistaan sagxada ka baxsan jidka. Xayawaanka adeegga ee ka yar shan iyo toban rodol ayaa laga yaabaa in lagu hayo dhabta rakaabka, laakiin ma xiri karaan dariiqa ama ma fariisan karaan kursi gaar ah.

Habka CODSIGA

Gaadiidka Sare:

•Qof kasta oo 65 jir ah ama ka weyn wuu isticmaali karaa adeeg mana loo baahnayn codsi ama shahaado. Si kastaba ha ahaatee, darawalku waxa uu codsan karaa caddaynta da'da marka uu fuulayo baabuurka.



Gaadiidka la xidhiidha naafanimada:

& dibi; Si aad ugu qalanto Helitaanka Go, waa in la buuxiyaa codsiga Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA). Codsigan waxaa laga heli karaa iyada oo loo marayo Guddiga Gaadiidka Degmada Ventura (VCTC).

•Marka codsiga la dhammaystiro oo loo gudbiyo isku-duwaha ADA, codsadaha waa lala xidhiidhi doonaa si loo go'aamiyo tallaabooyinka xiga ee helitaanka shahaadada ADA.



FARES
& dibi; $3.00 safarkiiba

DOCUMENTS LOO BAAHAN YAHAY
Gaadiidka La Xidhiidha Naafada:
& dibi; Shahaadada ADA
Gaadiidka Sare:
& dibi;Caddaynta da'da (65+)

SAYADA:
& dibi; Waa in aad wacdaa maalin ka hor si aad boos u qabsato.
& dibi; Markaad qorsheyneyso safarkaaga, fadlan ogow in raacitaankaaga lala wadaagi karo kuwa kale. Dareewalku wuxuu inta badan kaxeeyaa oo dejiyaa dadka kale jidka aad u socoto si wakhtiga safarkaagu uu uga dheeraado inta uu ahaan lahaa baabuur gaar ah ama tagsi ah.
& dibi; Waxaa jira fogaan qaadis ah 20 daqiiqo halkaas oo baabuurku iman doono 20 daqiiqo ka hor wakhtiga qaadista ama 20 daqiiqo kadib. (tusaale ahaan, haddii safarka loo qorsheeyay 8:30 subaxnimo wakhtiga qaadista, darawalku waxa uu iman karaa 8:20 subaxnimo ama 8:40 subaxnimo).

Telefoonada:
& dibi;Su'aalo iyo macluumaad dheeraad ah: 805-485-2319
& dibi; Codsiga VCTC ADA: 888-667-7001.
& dibi; Wac Isniin-Jimco 8:00 subaxnimo-5:00 galabnimo

*Xeerka Naafada Ameerikaanka (ADA) Shahaadada*
Waa maxay shahaado ADA:Xeerka Naafada Ameerika waa sharci ka mamnuucaya takoorka ku salaysan naafanimada xagga shaqada, adeegyada dadweynaha, gaadiidka, hoyga dadweynaha, iyo isgaarsiinta. Qaybta gaadiidka ee ADA waxay u baahan tahay in nidaamyada gaadiidka ee dariiqyada go'an ay tahay inay helaan kuwa naafada ah. Sharcigu waxa kale oo uu bixiyaa adeega paratransit kaaba haddii basaska aan la heli karin ama haddii naafanimadaada ama xaaladaadu ay kaa hortaagto isticmaalka gaadiidka dadweynaha ee mara jid go'an.
SHURUUDAHA LOOGU TALAGALAY SHAHAADADA ADA:Shakhsigu waa inuu leeyahay naafo ku meel gaadh ah ama mid joogto ah oo ka horjoogsata raacaha inuu isticmaalo adeega baska dariiqa go'an. Naafadu waxay u baahan kartaa in uu xaqiijiyo xirfadle daryeel caafimaad.
Si loo codsado shahaado ADA:Shakhsiyaadka doonaya shahaadada ADA waxay ku buuxin karaan arjiga onlayn https://www.goventura.org/getting-around/ada-certification/ama wacMobility Management Partners (MMP) at 888-667-7001dalbo Qiimaynta shakhsi ahaaneed ayaa loo baahan karaa marka codsiga la gudbiyo.
transportationagency_20_description: Waxay siisaa fursada waayeelka si ay u horumariyaan dano cusub oo ay u abuuraan saaxiibtinimo waara.
transportationagency_45_description: Gaadiidka Caafimaadka ee Victorville wuxuu bixiyaa jid-goynta iyo sidoo kale adeegyada gaadiidka albaabka albaabka loogu talagalay ambalaayada, kursiga curyaanka iyo rakaabka gurney. Waxaan ugu horreyn ka hawlgalnaa Los Angeles, Orange, San Bernardino, Riverside iyo Degmooyinka Kern (Magaalada Ridgecrest), 24 saacadood iyo 7 maalmood usbuucii. Waxaan ka soo qaadnaa macaamiisha guryahooda ama guryaha dadka lagu xanaaneeyo daawadooda caafimaad ee socota sida sifeynta, kemotherabi, daawaynta jireed, ballamaha dhakhaatiirta, ama meel kasta oo shirkadahooda caymisku oggolaadaan. Adeegani wuxuu u baahan yahay boos qabsi hore wuxuuna u baahan yahay nidaamka isdiiwaangelinta ka hor inta aan gaadiidka la bixin, fadlan wac 877-777-7153 wixii macluumaad dheeraad ah.
paratransit_204_description:
Agoura Hills Dial-a-Ride waa raacitaanka la wadaago, xannibaadda si loo xakameeyo adeegga ku saleysan boos sii qabsi.

U-qalmitaanka: Adeegani wuxuu siiya gaadiid dadka deggan Magaalada Agoura Hills oo ay doortaan meelaha deriska la'ah ee aan la wadaagin.

Boos sii qabsasho: Jadwal raacyada adiga oo wacaya 818-707-2005. Boos qabsi ayaa la soo jeediyay (ugu yaraan 2 saacadood ka hor), laakiin looma baahna.

Qiimaha safarka wuxuu u dhexeeyaa $1.50 ilaa $3.00 iyadoo lagu saleynayo masaafada la safray.
transit_319_description:
Thousand Oaks Transit (TOT) waxay ka shaqeysaa shan bas oo maxalli ah oo u adeegaya Kun Oaks.
Waxay bixisaa badbaado, tayo leh, mas'uul deegaan, iyo gaadiid isku dubaridan oo waxtar leh
adeegyada.

Dhammaan basaska waxay u qalabaysan yihiin inay dejiyaan kuraasta curyaamiinta iyo mootooyinka saddexda lug leh ee u hoggaansama ADA (Xeerka Naafada Mareykanka).
Haddii aad leedahay naafo joogto ah ama ku meel gaar ah oo uu xaqiijin karo xirfadle caafimaad, laakiin aadan haysan kaarka ADA, wac 888-667-7001 ama gal www.goventura.org/getting-around/ada-certification/ codsan

Qiimaha qiimaha:
Joogtada ah: $2.00
Dadka qaangaarka ah ee ka weyn da'da 65, iyo kuwa leh daryeel caafimaad ama naafo ah: $0.50
Carruurta ka yar da'da 5: bilaash

Saacadaha Adeegga Baska:
Isniinta ilaa Jimcaha: 6:00 subaxnimo-7:00 galabnimo
Sabti iyo Axad: 8:00 subaxnimo-7:00 galabnimo

Saacadaha Lobby ee Xarunta Gaadiidka:
Isniinta ilaa Jimcaha: 5:45 subaxnimo-7:15 galabnimo
Sabti iyo Axad: 8:00 subaxnimo-7:00 galabnimo

Wac (805) 375-5473 ama booqo https://www.toaks.org/departments/public-works/transit si aad u hesho macluumaadka jadwalka.

Gaadiidka
Gaadiid ayaa diyaar u ah booqashooyinka Dhakhaatiirta iyo soo-dejinta/qaadista oo keliya. Ballamaha iyo boos celinta waxa lagu samayn karaa 909-334-3271.

Waxaan nahay bulsho qani ku ah hiddaha, dhaqanka, iyo kala duwanaanta. Maanta, Chino waxay ka faa'iidaysanaysaa muuqaal dheeli tiran oo leh goobo la deggan yahay iyo goobo ganacsi, xaafado qurux badan, soo jiidashada magaalada, iyo aasaas ganacsi oo kala duwan. Waxaan kugu martiqaadeynaa inaad sahamiso boggayaga internetka. Waxaan dammaanad qaadeynaa inaad heli doonto in Chino ay tahay meel ay ku badan yihiin dhaqanka, samafalka iyo barwaaqada!

Xiriirinta Bulshadu waa barnaamij darawal iskaa wax u qabso ah oo hal-abuur leh kaas oo siiya gaadiid laga caawiyo albaabka laga soo galo dadka waayeelka ah iyo shakhsiyaadka naafada ah ee aan si fudud u isticmaali karin adeegyada kale ee gaadiidka. Barnaamijku wuxuu bixiyaa kharashka masruufka ee iskaa wax u qabso
darawaliinta si ay u qaadaan shakhsiyaad aad u jilicsan, jirran ama aan awoodin inay isticmaalaan
gaadiidka dadweynaha.

Yaa U Qalma?
Waayeelka iyo shakhsiyaadka naafada ah ee:
 Ha wadin
 Aad u daciif ah ama aad u xanuunsan in la kaxeeyo
 Ma haysan taageero qoys
 Ma heli kartid gaadiid
 Aan awoodin isticmaalka gaadiidka dadweynaha

U-qalmitaanka iyo nidaamka codsiga waa in ay dhacaan ka hor inta aan la helin adeeggan.

transportationagency_18_description:
DAV waa hay'ad samafal oo aan faa'iido doon ahayn oo siisa cimriga taageerada mujaahidiinta jiilka oo dhan iyo qoysaskooda, ka caawinta in ka badan 1 milyan oo mujaahid siyaabo togan, nolosha beddela sanad walba. Sannad kasta, ururku wuxuu bixiyaa in ka badan 600,000 oo raacitaanka ruug-caddaaga ka qaybgalaya ballamaha caafimaadka wuxuuna ka caawiyaa mujaahidiinta wax ka badan 200,000 oo sheegasho faa'iido.
DAV sidoo kale waa hogaamiye isku xidhka halyeeyada leh shaqo macno leh, marti galinta bandhigyo shaqo iyo bixinta agab si loo hubiyo inay fursad u helaan inay ka qaybqaataan Riyada Mareykanka allabaryadooda ay suurta galiyeen.
paratransit_12_description: SunDial waa dooxo ballaaran, asal ilaa halka loo socdo adeegga paratransit-ka loogu talagalay in lagu buuxiyo shuruudaha Sharciga Naafada Mareykanka (ADA). Ujeeddadu waa in la bixiyo adeegga gaadiidka dadweynaha ee maalinta xigta dadka aan awoodin inay isticmaalaan adeegga caadiga ah ee SunBus. Adeegga SunDial wuxuu diyaar u yahay 3/4 mayl u jira labada dhinac ee dariiq kasta oo SunBus ah (kuma jiraan Commuter Link 220 & North Shore Line 95). Fadlan ka wac Adeegga Macmiilka 1-800-347-8628 si aad u ogaato in meeshaad u socotaa ay ku jirto aagagga qaadista iyo soo dejinta.
paratransit_32_description: Wac toddobaad ka hor ballamaha la qorsheeyay (subaxyada oo keliya), qaar ka reeban ayaa loo sameeyaa xaaladaha degdegga ah iyo socodka. Darawalka iskaa wax u qabso ah ayaa waci doona rakaabka maalin ka hor safarka si uu ugala hadlo goobta laga qaadayo, ka soo qaado dhibcaha Cathedral City, iyo Palm Springs. (Ruug-cadaaga ambalaayada kaliya) Wac wixii faahfaahin dheeraad ah.
transit_30_description: Qiimaha saldhiga baska magaaladu waa $1.15, qiimaha saldhiga adeega Commutter Link waa $3.00. Beaumont Pass Transit waxa ay siisaa ruug-caddaa qiimo dhimis ah adeegooda gaadiidka baska ee dariiqa go'an (marka laga reebo Dial-A-Ride) dhamaan mujaahidiinta tusa darawalka tababaraha baska aqoonsiga saxda ah ee dawladu bixisay oo muujinaya heerka mujaahid.
transit_35_description:
Tareennada Amtrak waxay dejiyaan inta badan aaladaha dhaqdhaqaaqa taayirrada ee maanta la isticmaalo.

Cabirrada: Qalabku waa inuusan ka badan 30 inji (76 sentimitir) balac ah iyo 48 inji (122 sentimitir) dheer, waana inuu lahaadaa ugu yaraan 2 inji (5 sentimitir) oo nadiifinta dhulka ah.
Miisaanka: Xadka miisaanka ee aaladda dhaqdhaqaaqa taayirrada la haysto waa 600 rodol (273 kg).
Buug iyo batari ku shaqeeya: Amtrak waxa ay ogolanaysaa qalabka dhaqdhaqaaqa taayirrada gacanta lagu shaqeeyo iyo batari ku shaqeeya labadaba kuwaas oo buuxiya shuruudahan.

Amtrak waxay siin doontaa caawimada rakaabka naafada ah ee isticmaala qalabka dhaqdhaqaaqa taayirrada leh xaaladaha soo socda:
Platforms Sare: Amtrak ayaa kaa caawin doona inaad ka gudubto farqiga u dhexeeya masraxa iyo tareenka adoo isticmaalaya saxan buundada ah.
Nidaamyada Heerka-hooseeya: Amtrak waxay ku siin doontaa gelitaanka tareenka iyada oo la adeegsanayo wiishka mobilada ee saldhigga ku salaysan.
Tareennada Heerka-laba: Amtrak waxay ku siin doontaa wiish guurguura oo saldhigeedu yahay si loo helo marinka heerka hoose ee tareenka.

paratransit_318_description:
Magaalada Simi Valley waxay siisaa adeegyo gaadiid oo gaar loo qorsheeyay oo loogu talagalay waayeelka da'doodu tahay 65+ iyo gaadiidka la xidhiidha naafanimada kuwa haysta Shahaadada Sharciga Naafada Maraykanka (ADA).

CORONAVIRUS XAALADDA GAAR AH EE CORONAVIRUS:

Adeegga wuxuu u socdaa si caadi ah.



AQOONSIGA:
Gaadiidka naafada ah:
Adeegyada shaqsiyaadka naafada ah da' kasta oo wata shahaadada ADA.
(Haddii aad leedahay xaddidaad ku meel gaar ah ama joogto ah, jireed, maskaxeed, muuqaal, garasho, ama xaddidaad kale oo naafada ah taas oo saameyn doonta awooddaada helitaanka adeegga baska dariiqa go'an, waxaa laga yaabaa inaad u qalanto Shahaadada ADA. Eeg qaybta hoose ee Gelitaankan wixii macluumaad dheeraad ah sida loo codsado shahaadada ADA.)
U-qalmitaanka Gaadiidka Sare ee Simi Valley:
Shakhsiyaadka da'doodu tahay 65 iyo wixii ka weyn waxay u qalmaan gaadiidka Dial-A-Ride sida waayeelka. Waayeelka naafada ah waa lagu soo dhaweynayaa inay codsadaan shahaado ADA, maadaama raacayaasha ADA ee shahaado haysta ay leeyihiin mudnaan haddii ay fuuliddu gaadho awoodda.

XAYAWAANADA ADEEGA
Kaliya xayawaanka adeega shahaadaysan, ama xoolaha ku xidhan xambaara xoolaha la ansixiyay, ayaa loo ogol yahay baabuurta ADA/DAR.

AAGA ADEEGA
Dhammaan raacitaannada waa in 1) ka bilowdaan kuna dhammaadaan Dooxada Simi, 2) u wareejinta Los Angeles ACCESS ama nidaamka baska jid go'an, ama 3) u beddelashada adeegga baska VISTA. Safarrada kale ee u dhexeeya Simi Valley iyo magaalooyinka kale waxay isticmaali doonaan adeegga ECTA Connect Dial-A-Ride.



SAYADA:.
Adeegga gaadiidka waxa la codsan karaa in la waco Simi Valley Transit oo lala hadlo Transit Dispatcher ama ka tago fariin cod ah.
Markaad la hadlayso Diraha Gaadiidka, waxaa lagu weydiin doonaa macluumaadka soo socda:
& dibi;Magac
& dibi; Lambarka shahaadada ADA (haddii ay khuseyso)
& dibi;Taariikhda safarka la qorsheeyay
& dibi;Waqtiga ballanta, soo qaadida iyo ciwaanka meesha loo aadayo
& dibi;Tirada rakaabka
& dibi;Waqtiga soo celinta
& dibi;Haddii adeega guri-ka-albaab loo baahan doono
& dibi; Haddii fuushana ay wataan wax gargaar dhaqdhaqaaq dhaqdhaqaaq ah (sida lugeeyaha, kursiga curyaanka)
WAREEJINTA:
Safarrada u dhexeeya Dooxada Simi iyo mid kasta oo ka mid ah magaalooyinkan waxaa laga heli karaa adeega Isbahaysiga Transit Alliance Connect InterCity. Adeegyada Isku xirka InterCity waxaa heli kara rakaabka ADA-shahaadeysan iyo waayeelka da'doodu tahay 65 ama ka weyn.
& dibi;Kuman geed
& dibi;Moorpark
& dibi;Camarillo
& dibi; Degmada Ventura oo aan la wadaagin
Qodobbada wareejinta:
LOS ANGELES:
Simi Valley Dial-a-Ride waxa ay bixisa u wareejinta LA Access Dial-A-Ride ee saldhiga Chatsworth Metrolink. Way fiicantahay inaad ka ballansato safarka laga soo bilaabo barta wareejinta Chatsworth ilaa meeshaad ku taal LA iyada oo loo sii marayo LA Access marka hore, ka dibna aad ballansato lugta hore ee safarka laga bilaabo goobtaada Simi Valley ilaa barta wareejinta. Simi Valley Transit ayaa isku dubaridi doonta wakhtiga si uu rakaabku u joogo goobta wareejinta wakhtiga lugta labaad ee safarka.
ADEEGA BASKA VISTA:
Sharax marka la qorsheeyay raacitaanka Simi Valley Transit, in wakhtigu u baahan yahay in la isku duwo jadwalka baska VISTA.

Habka CODSIGA:
Naafanimada la xiriirta:
& dibi; Codsi khadka ah ama la xiriir Shuraakada Maareynta Dhaqdhaqaaqa (MMP)
Sare ee la xidhiidha:
& dibi;La xidhiidh Gaadiidka Dooxada Simi

DOkumentiyada loo baahan yahay:
& dibi; U qalmida iinta la xiriirta: ADA kaarka, kaas oo la bixiyo marka la dhammeeyo codsiga ADA.
& dibi; U-qalmitaanka waayeel ahaan: Caddeynta da'da (65 iyo ka weyn)

FARES:
& dibi; Qiimaha saxda ah, lacag caddaan ah oo keliya, ayaa looga baahan yahay adeegga ADA/DAR Transit ee Simi Valley.
& dibi; ADA Shahaadaysan iyo Rakaab Sare: $2.00 safar kasta oo hal-gees ah.
& dibi;Kaaliyaha Daryeelka Shakhsi ahaaneed ama wehelka/martida rakaabka leh waa in ay bixiyaan kharashka loo baahan yahay ee $2.00 safar kasta oo hal-gees ah.
& dibi; Wax lacag ah oo dheeri ah laguma dalaci Kaqaybgalaha Daryeelka Shakhsi ahaaneed haddii raaca u qalma ADA uu haysto ADA-shahaadad u oggolaanaysa Kaaliyaha Daryeelka Shakhsi ahaaneed. Dhammaan rakaabka waa loo oggol yahay inay keenaan rakaab/saaxiib marti ah. Ka dhaafida khidmadda waxay khusaysaa kaliya haddii shahaadada ADA ay ogolaato PCA-ga.

Telefoonada:
& dibi; Simi Valley Gaadiidka: 805-583-6464
& dibi;Ku xidh InterCity: 805-375-5467

Adeegga lagu bixiyo luqadaha soo socda:
Ingiriisi iyo Isbaanish

*Xeerka Naafada Ameerikaanka (ADA) Shahaadada*
Waa maxay shahaado ADA:Xeerka Naafada Ameerika waa sharci ka mamnuucaya takoorka ku salaysan naafanimada xagga shaqada, adeegyada dadweynaha, gaadiidka, hoyga dadweynaha, iyo isgaarsiinta. Qaybta gaadiidka ee ADA waxay u baahan tahay in nidaamyada gaadiidka ee dariiqyada go'an ay tahay inay helaan kuwa naafada ah. Sharcigu waxa kale oo uu bixiyaa adeega paratransit kaaba haddii basaska aan la heli karin ama haddii naafanimadaada ama xaaladaadu ay kaa hortaagto isticmaalka gaadiidka dadweynaha ee mara jid go'an.
SHURUUDAHA LOOGU TALAGALAY SHAHAADADA ADA:Shakhsigu waa inuu leeyahay naafo ku meel gaadh ah ama mid joogto ah oo ka horjoogsata raacaha inuu isticmaalo adeega baska dariiqa go'an. Naafadu waxay u baahan kartaa in uu xaqiijiyo xirfadle daryeel caafimaad.
Si loo codsado shahaado ADA:Shakhsiyaadka doonaya shahaadada ADA waxay ku buuxin karaan arjiga onlayn https://www.goventura.org/getting-around/ada-certification/ama wacMobility Management Partners (MMP) at 888-667-7001dalbo Qiimaynta shakhsi ahaaneed ayaa loo baahan karaa marka codsiga la gudbiyo.

paratransit_264_description:
OmniGo
OmniGo waxa ay ka kooban tahay saddex waddo oo adeega wareegtada ah oo u adeegaya bulshooyinka Chino Hills, Grand Terrace iyo Yucaipa. Adeegga OmniGo waxa uu leeyahay 16-baabuur oo rakaab ah iyo qiimo go'an, taas oo u sahlaysa dadka deggan bulshooyinkan in ay galaangal u yeeshaan meelaha waaweyn ee ay aadayaan, oo ay ku jiraan dugsiyada dhexe iyo dugsiyada sare, xarumaha waayeelka, iyo xarumaha wax iibsiga. Inta jeer ee wareegayaashu waxay u dhexeeyaan 30 ilaa 70 daqiiqo dhammaan dariiqyaduna waxay bixiyaan adeegga maalmaha fasaxa ah.

Jidadka 308/309/310 gudaha Yucaipa waxay shaqeeyaan Isniin-Jimce 6:00 subaxnimo-9:00 galabnimo

Wadooyinka 308/309 waxay shaqeeyaan Sabtida 7:00am-8:30pm iyo Axad 8:00am-6:45pm

Jidka 325 ee Grand Terrace wuxuu shaqeeyaa 5:15 subaxnimo - 8:30 galabnimo Isniin - Jimco; Sabtida laga bilaabo 7:15 subaxnimo - 6:15 galabnimo; iyo Axadda laga bilaabo 8:30 subaxnimo - 6:15 galabnimo.

Jidka 365 ee Chino Hills wuxuu shaqeeyaa 5 subaxnimo - 10 galabnimo Isniin - Jimco; Sabtida laga bilaabo 6 subaxnimo - 6:45 galabnimo; iyo Axadda laga bilaabo 6 subaxnimo - 5:45 galabnimo.
transit_268_description:
Ka daalay cunista maalinlaha ah? Waxaan kuu haynaa waddo bas ah. RTA waxay si sharaf leh u bixisa waddooyin kala duwan oo CommuterLink Express ah oo leh adeeg qaali ah oo la geeyo degmooyinka Riverside, Orange, San Diego iyo San Bernardino. U safar si raaxo leh iyo qaab halka kuwa kalena ay ku daalan yihiin taraafikada. Dhammaan basaska degdega ah ee RTA waxay la socdaan Wi-Fi bilaash ah, kuraas cufan, nalalka akhriska sare, boorsooyinka iyo raakidhyada baaskiilka, iyo dekedaha ku dallacaadda USB. Ma u baahan tahay sabab kale oo aad raacdo? Rakayaasha Metrolink ee wata tigidhada tareenka ee saxda ah waxay ku socdaan bilaash! Waxa kale oo aad qaadi kartaa baabuur bilaash ah wakhti kasta haddii aad tahay shaqaale City of Riverside ama haddii kulliyaddaadu ka qayb qaadato U-Pass ama barnaamijyada Go-Pass.
Qof kasta oo la kulma shuruudaha naafada RTA, keena kaarka Medicare oo ansax ah, ama dadka da'da ah ee da'doodu tahay 60 ama ka badan waxay xaq u leeyihiin qiimo dhimis dhammaan adeegyada marin-go'an ee RTA. Kaararka Medi-Cal lama aqbali doono. Macaamiishu waa inay muujiyaan aqoonsiga ku habboon mar kasta oo ay baska fuulaan si ay u helaan qiimaha la dhimay.
paratransit_103_description:
Waxay siisaa gaadiid lagu tago dukaamada tafaariiqda, goobaha qurxinta, maktabadaha, ballamaha caafimaadka, Xarunta Bulshada ee Downtown Anaheim iyo baayacmushtarka maxalliga ah oo u jira 10-mayl radius ee guryaha dadka waaweyn ee Anaheim. U-qalmitaanka waa 60 sano iyo ka weyn waana inuu yahay degane Anaheim. Ballan waa in loo baahan yahay si loo qaado. Dhammaan foojarooyinka waa in horay loo sii iibsadaa mid ka mid ah goobaha. Boos sii qabsigu waa in la sameeyaa ugu yaraan 48 saacadood ka hor raacitaanka.

Boos sii qabsasho:
Isniin-Jimce
9:00 subaxnimo - 4:00 galabnimo

paratransit_54_description:
BARNAAMIJKA WADAWGA TAXUXA (sidoo kale loo yaqaan Gaadiidka
Dib-u-celinta Escort Program, ama TREP) waxay siisaa lacag celinta masruufka shakhsiyaadka naafada ah ee ku tiirsan kuwa kale si ay ugu kaxeeyaan.

Ka qaybgalayaashu waxay doortaan darawalkooda, kaas oo ay ku jiri karaan xubin qoys, saaxiib, deris, ama daryeele. Kharashka laga bixiyo barnaamijka waxa ay dhimaysaa kharashka la xidhiidha bixinta gaadiidka, waxaana loo isticmaali karaa arrimo safar sida ballamaha caafimaadka, hawlaha gaarka ah, booqashada qoyska iyo asxaabta, ama shaqada aadista.

SIDEE U SHAQAYSAA?
Haddii aad u qalanto, waa inaad aqoonsataa qof diyaar u ah inuu darawal kuu noqdo.
Waxaad la socotaa meesha ugu fog ee aad uga soo safarto gurigaaga maalin kasta. Dhamaadka bisha, diiwaanadaada meesha ugu fog ee aad u socoto maalinta safarka waxaa lagu soo gudbiyaa foomka warqadda ama onlayn.
Lacagaha soo celinta waxa lagu shubaa koontada bangi ee darawalka, oo waxay u soo celiyaan darawalkooda. Dhammaan lacagaha dib-u-celinta waxaa lagu sameeyaa dhigaal toos ah; jeeg laguma bixiyo.

YAA U QARAN?
Shakhsiyaadka naafada ah ee deggan magaalooyinka Dooxada Bari ee Colton, Fontana, Grand Terrace, Highland, Loma Linda, Redlands, Rialto, San Bernardino, iyo Yucaipa ayaa u qalma barnaamijka. Barnaamijku waxa loogu talagalay shakhsiyaadka aan isticmaali karin gaadiidka dadweynaha qaar ka mid ah ama dhammaan safarrada, oo u baahan caawimada qof kale baahidooda gaadiid.

Magaalooyinka WEST VALLEY ee Chino, Chino Hills, Montclair, Ontaariyo, Rancho Cucamonga, iyo Upland waxaa u adeega Barnaamijka Darawalka Iskaa wax u qabso ee ay maamusho ADEEGYADA SARE EE BULSHADA. Shakhsiyaadka deggan Dooxada Galbeedka waa inay kala xidhiidhaan Adeegyada Waayeelka Beesha (909) 621-9900 wixii macluumaad dheeraad ah oo ku saabsan barnaamijkooda.

SIDEE ISKU DIIWAAN KARAA?
Dadka deggan Dooxada Bari waa inay kala xidhiidhaan Adeegyada Gaadiidka Gaarka ah (909) 379-7341 ama ctsa@omnitrans.org si ay u codsadaan codsi.
Dadka deggan Dooxada Galbeedka waa inay kala xidhiidhaan Adeegyada Waayeelka Beesha (909) 621-9900 wixii macluumaad dheeraad ah ee ku saabsan Barnaamijkooda Dirawalka Tabaruca.
transit_16_description:
Dhammaan basaska dariiqyada go'an waxaa lagu geli karaa qalabka socodka.
Mountain Transit waxay bixisaa qiimo dhimis ku socota adeega basaska ee dariiqa go'an ee loogu talagalay Waayeelka, Naafada, iyo Halyeeyada kuwaas oo tusa darawalka baska aqoonsiga saxda ah, wac Mountain Transit wixii faahfaahin ah: 909-878-5200
transit_34_description:
Dhammaan basaska dariiqyada go'an waa qalab la heli karo.

SunLine waxay siisaa qiimo dhimis waayeelka iyo naafada sita Aqoonsi habboon. Ka wac SunLine wixii macluumaad dheeraad ah: 1-800-347-8628
paratransit_55_description:
ADEEGYADA GAADIIDKA LIFT waxay bixisaa gaadiid aan degdeg ahayn oo bilaash ah oo lagu tago ballamaha caafimaadka dooxada oo dhan. Vans waa kursi curyaan oo la heli karo; adeegyadu waxay ku kooban yihiin bukaanka iyo daryeelaha. Fadhi badbaadada carruurta da'da ku habboon waa in la siiyaa carruurta. Adeegyadu waa ballan la qorsheeyay oo keliya.

Si aad u ballansato gaadiidka, naga soo wac 760.366.LIFT (760.366.5438).

Degmadu waxay isku xidhaa qaybaha kale ee gaadiidka ee gudaha Morongo Basin, sida Morongo Basin Transit Authority iyo Reach Out Morongo Basin, si ay u fududayso gaadiidka dadka degan balamaha caafimaadka ee aan degdega ahayn.
paratransit_58_description:
V.E.T.S. waa adeeg gaadiid VA oo bilaash ah oo ay bixiso VA Loma Linda Nidaamka Daryeelka Caafimaadka si ay uga caawiso Halyeeyga gaadiidka VA Loma Linda Nidaamka Daryeelka Caafimaadka balamaha caafimaadka. Barnaamijka VETS waxa uu iskaashi la sameeyay la-hawlgalayaasha bulshada maxalliga ah, oo ay ku jirto Wakaaladda Gaadiidka Riverside si ay isugu dubbarido qaadista dhibcaha saddexda goobood ee Degmada Riverside: Murrieta VA Clinic, Perris Station Transit Center, US Vets @ March ARB, iyo Moreno Valley Mall Center. Hadafka barnaamijka VETS waa in la siiyo mujaahidiinta safar wareeg ah oo badbaado leh, degdeg ah oo ku socda VA si loo caawiyo halyeeyada helitaanka adeegyada daryeelka caafimaadka.

Dhammaan mujaahidiinta doonaya inay adeegsadaan VETS waa inay wacaan lambarka soo socda si ay boos u sii haystaan oo ay u helaan tilmaamaha ka qaybgalka: 909-583-6475
